title: Amazon.eth ENS domain owner disregards 1M USDC buyout offer on Opensea
body:
On Tuesday, the Ethereum Name Service, or ENS, domain Amazon.eth [received](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x57f1887a8bf19b14fc0df6fd9b2acc9af147ea85/82229159103786399531023855469490700492269083837522026478948273323969890387800) an offer for 1 million USDC (a stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar) from an anonymous wallet address on OpenSea. The offer to buy the ENS domain went unanswered however, and no transaction took place. This is despite the last sale of the domain name being five months ago for 33 Ether (worth around $100,000 at that time).

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

It is unclear at the time of publication whether the owner simply was not informed of the offer, or did not consider it to be near fair value, or if the bidding and domain owner accounts were linked in an attempt to boost the price of the asset (in what is known as a "wash trade"). According to data from Opense, other bid offers for the ENS domain stand at just around $6,200 USDC. The domain name is verified as official by ENS and is owned by anonymous OpenSea user 4761BF.

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

ENS is a blockchain naming protocol that allows users to store avatars and profile images for use across devices and send or receive crypto and nonfungible tokens. To sell a .eth domain on OpenSea, users would first need to connect their wallet and register an address at manager.ens.domains then list it on their OpenSea account.

While many crypto enthusiasts took up interesting or creative names for the ENS service, others have embarked on the practice of domain-flipping. That is, registering ENS domains containing names of prominent entities beforehand and then later demanding a high price for the domain should the said entity wishes to enter the Web 3.0 space later on.

Since its inception in 2017, there have been over 1.67 million .eth domain registrations across approximately 482,000 owners. More than 154,100 registrations were made recentl between July 5 to July 18, partly due to [lower gas fees](https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-name-service-registrations-surge-by-200-amid-lower-gas-fees) and continued interest from entities seeking to enter the Web 3.0 space. To date, the ENS collection on OpenSea has witnessed approximately 46,200 ETH ($71.5 million) in cumulative transaction volume.

title: One tree becomes wood, ten trees become firewood
body:
In the early 1890s, in Houston, the southern United States, the cotton billionaire William Marshall Rice donated money to establish Rice University, which is one of the earliest private schools in the United States.

When the campus was built, Rice stipulated that not a single oak tree on the original site should be moved, and it should be carefully fortified. From the construction of the school to the completion of the school, there are no less oak trees, a total of 689 trees.

As a result, the school recruited 689 students in the first year.

People don't understand. Some people say that Rice has a problem with nerves, because according to the size of the school, it can recruit at least 1,000 students. Private schools, on the other hand, are supported by tuition fees, and there is no difference between a teacher teaching 50 students and 100 students.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9ixZCSeEK4PkrlzE7hSZ0.png?height=270&width=367)

Rice continued to ask teachers and students to cultivate oak trees and new oak trees in sections until the campus was "saturated". If oak trees are in the way of infrastructure land, oak trees must be transplanted to another part of the campus at any cost, and they must be guaranteed to survive, or enrollment must be reduced accordingly the following year.

If the enrollment plan for the next year increases, the first thing the school has to do is to plant a corresponding number of oak trees. If unfortunately some do not survive, a corresponding number of students will be unlucky.

At this time, some people seem to have realized something, while more people are more puzzled, and some people even say that Rice may be an "oak spirit".

By 1902, the campus was finally "saturated" with 4,890 oak trees. At this time, Rice, who was seriously ill, made a rule: no matter when, the number of students in the school should not exceed 4,890.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YaSY-tY4jLnOHKz3fw0xD.png?height=270&width=405)

After his death, people saw that Rice University became famous and became "Harvard in the South of the United States", and people erected a statue for him, "the supreme pioneer of American private schools".

Until 2008, there were 4,890 lush oak trees on the 325-hectare campus, and the total number of students in the school was 4,850, slightly less than the total number of oaks. In public schools, the 325-hectare campus has at least 9,000 students.

More than 100 years later, no matter how the times change, no matter how the economy develops, the number of students at Rice University is always less than the number of oak trees. There has been no question or objection to Mr Rice's rule.

In fact, the reason is very simple. Of course, the results of growing one tree in one square meter and growing 10 trees in one square meter are different: one tree becomes wood, and 10 trees become firewood. Regarding the possibility of personalized education for teachers on stage, the teaching effect of a classroom with 20 students and 50 students is of course different.

It's a simple truth, but there are always too many people who can't imitate it - the truth is also very simple: it is caused by the desire for profit.

Rice University only restricts the number of students. For world-class experts and scholars who are interested in teaching, it not only refuses to come, but also takes the initiative to throw "hydrangea" to them. The total number of students is less than 5,000, but the total number of teachers exceeds 500, and the teacher-to-student ratio is greater than 1:10.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qV0muijlmghrsjc_6aDcH.png?height=270&width=289)

In the 2007 U.S. university rankings, from the 1st to the 21st place are all private universities, and only from the 22nd place are public universities. At No. 22 is the public University of California, Berkeley, which is also far from No. 21 in strength.

According to the 2010 National University Rankings, Rice University ranked 17th. It is a public university with its close proximity to the University of Texas, but it cannot be compared with Rice University in terms of academic level.

There are many unchangeable laws in nature.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GUBssrs47m64OD9vU5Bta.png?height=270&width=342)

On the same piece of land, the oak trees that can thrive are limited, and the number of students a university can accommodate is also limited, breaking the harmony between students, teachers and school-running conditions, the decline of teaching quality and the decline of school reputation will inevitably, eventually It affects the long-term development of the school. In fact, Rice University takes the oak tree as its teacher and follows the objective laws of nature, and longevity is inevitable.

title: 太阳系公转速度发生变化，正以更快速度冲入银心，何时坠入黑洞？
body:
地球是隶属于太阳系的行星，所以一直围着太阳转，而太阳系的上级又是银河系，因此从本质上来说，**地球也在被太阳系带着围绕银河系公转。**

这是很正常的天体运行机制，可是当它无法维持正常数值的时候，就会带来不同的结局。

根据长时间的观察，**科学家发现太阳系的公转速度可能被推翻，这说明它正以更快的速度冲进银心。**那么，为什么太阳系的公转突然有了如此显著的变化？何时会坠入黑洞呢？

太阳系正带着我们公转

### 银河系与太阳系

首先，我们先来了解一下银河系的基本情况，以及太阳系在其中的位置。**银河系是典型的棒旋星系**，从科学家模拟出来的图就能看出，银河系当中有数以百倍计的“太阳系”，因此其**总质量达到了太阳质量的1.5万亿倍。**

银河系

银河系的结构由内至外可以分为五个部分，分别是**银心、银核、银盘、银晕、银冕**，并且由于是典型的棒旋星系，银河系拥有**四条明显的旋臂**，每条旋臂的位置相对对称，距离大概为4500光年。

咱们的**太阳系位于猎户座旋臂**之上，距离银河系的中心属实算不上近，可以说已经是在“五环开外”了。但实际上，这个位置还是比较好的，因为有时候**距离越近反而越不安全。**

太阳在银河系中的位置

由于宇宙当中的各个天体系统并不是保持静止不动的，所以想要知道地球随着太阳系运动到哪里了，我们就要搞明白**太阳系是怎么围绕银河系运动**的。

太阳系距离银河系银心的距离大约为2.7万光年，保持着**220公里/秒的速度公转。**在这种情况下，大概2.25亿年到2.5亿年就能绕行银河系一圈。

因此如果我们以太阳系45.68亿年的年龄来看，**它围绕银心公转也有20年了**，已经是驾轻就熟了。可是当大家认为太阳系就会维持这个速度运动下去时，现实却告诉我们，情况可能比我们想象的要复杂得多。

太阳带着自己的一众小弟围绕银河系公转

### 太阳系公转速度的变化

前文中咱们就提到，当我们按照宇宙系统的层级一点点往下推时，就会发现**地球和人类都身不由己**，因为在宇宙当中，是凭借“引力”说话的。在这种情况下，**我们只能被牵着鼻子走。**

地球和人类都身不由己

从前，太阳系一直维持着220公里/秒左右的速度在公转，而根据科学家的长期观察，发现这一数值有了变化。

简单来说，**太阳系的公转速度变快了**。

这一情况看起来似乎没什么影响，毕竟变快一点只要不被“甩出去”，就无所谓。可是公转速度变快，还会带来其他的变化，那就是**我们冲向银河系中心的速度也加快了。**

银心的构成

举个例子，如果说太阳系如今是在五环，那么在其速度加快的情况下，我们进入二环之内的速度也将加快。

毕竟从目前的数值来看，当太阳系每完成一次公转，那么我们就会接近银河系中心大约2000光年。日积月累之下，**未来太阳系的位置将会有明显的变化。**

大家可能会想，这不也挺好，毕竟原来我们住得远，未来能在自然变化下离得近一些，**居于银河系的核心位置**，地位不也就“水涨船高”了吗？可惜，宇宙当中并没有什么按区域、圈环划分房价的情况，而**太阳系靠近银心也不是什么好事。**

银河系中心存在黑洞

按照目前的研究结果来看，太阳系之所以正在加速冲向银心，是因为其**受到的引力发生了变化**。

上文中我们就说了，宇宙系统当中，谁的引力强，谁就有绝对的“掌控权”。不论是太阳掌管太阳系的八大行星还是银河系掌管诸多星系，总的来说都是因为引力有着显著的差异。

至于为什么说**越靠近银心反而越危险，是因为在银心当中存在黑洞。**这种会将万物吞噬，甚至连光都无法逃脱其控制的存在，一旦太阳系靠近它，那就是**坠入了万劫不复之地。**

这样的话，按照太阳系现在的运动速度，大概还有多久会坠入黑洞呢？

太阳系加速公转会使我们坠入黑洞

根据科学家计算，如果维持在现在这个速度不变，那么可能在**太阳系继续公转13圈之后**，我们就会坠入银河系中心的黑洞。公转13圈，少说也要20多亿年了，到时候地球可能早已是沧海桑田，都不知道换了几代文明了。

银河系中心的黑洞

值得一提的是，有人可能会想，如果那时人类还在，能否将这次靠近**当成一次“机遇”**呢？因为在电影《星际穿越》当中，可是有着**进入黑洞就能随意去往各个时空节点**的情况。

《星际穿越》中黑洞的内部

但这毕竟是科幻，在现实中一旦**靠近引力巨大的黑洞**，根本不会像大家想象中那样被“完整”地吸入，而是**在靠近的过程中就被扯碎了。**

所以，如果太阳系坠入黑洞时，地球之上还有生命存在，那也是无法存活的。那么，科学家是如何发现**银河系中心存在黑洞**呢？这一黑洞的变化，可能会给人类带来怎样的影响？

### 银河系中心的黑洞

**2020年的诺贝尔物理学奖**，颁发给了三位科学家，他们的**研究都与黑洞相关。**罗杰·彭罗斯曾与霍金共事，证明了黑洞形成是广义相对论的预言。剩下的两位物理学家哈德·根泽尔和安德里亚·格兹，分别发现了**银河系中心存在的超大质量致密天体**，简单来说就是黑洞。

2020诺贝尔物理学奖三位得主

其实**人类认识黑洞**，还是上个世纪的事情，所以最开始大家并未意识到在我们所处的星系当中也有黑洞存在。

后来，科学家在观测银河系中心的电磁波时，发现了射电源Sagittarius A\*，也可以称为人马座A\*，而它就是银河系中心的超大质量黑洞。

> 根据估算Sagittarius A\*在3.5 mm的真实角大小为0.126mas, 这对应于在银心处的线距离为1AU,或者相当于400倍太阳质量黑洞的史瓦西半径的13倍。采用绝对自行测量给出的SgrA＊质量下限约为40万倍太阳质量。

银河系黑洞所处的位置

至于这一黑洞变化带来的影响，咱们在上文中就说过了，黑洞会用自己的**引力驱使着周围的恒星不断靠近**它。目前来看，**太阳系还只是遥远的“备用粮”之一**，可是未来就不一定了。

并且由于黑洞进食的特性，其周围的物质到时会在引力的吸引下，呈现出高速涡旋的状态，而这种状态可能会**影响到周遭的星系。**简单来说，不仅是靠得近被吃的星系自身难保，就连周围的邻居日子都不好过。

太阳和银河系黑洞的距离

不过在过去的观测当中，科学家认为**银河系中心的黑洞虽然存在，但是似乎一直都未被激活**，换句话说它尚未进食。而此次太阳系公转速度的变化，可能从侧面反应了黑洞的变化，毕竟在1999年时，曾经公布过这样一条报道。

当时，**钱德拉X射线望远镜发现了一个来自银河系中心的超强信号**，这一信号可能就是来自于黑洞的视界。因此，有人认为**银河系中心的黑洞可能已经在苏醒了**，它当时的表现可能正在享用自己的开胃菜。

title: US Justice Department seized $500K in fiat and crypto from hackers connected to DPRK government
body:
The United States Department of Justice has seized and returned roughly $500,000 in fiat and crypto from a hacking group tied to the North Korean government, which included two crypto payments made by U.S. health care providers.

In a Tuesday announcement, the Justice Department [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/justice-department-seizes-and-forfeits-approximately-500000-north-korean-ransomware-actors) in conjunction with the FBI it had investigated a $100,000 ransomware payment in Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) from a Kansas hospital to a North Korean hacking group in order to regain access to its systems, as well as a $120,000 BTC payment from a medical provider in Colorado to one of the wallets connected to the aforementioned attack. In May, the FBI filed a seizure warrant for funds from the two ransom attacks and others laundered through China, which the Justice Department reported as worth roughly $500,000 total.

“These sophisticated criminals are constantly pushing boundaries to search for ways to extort money from victims by forcing them to pay ramsons in order to regain control of their computer and record systems,” said Duston Slinkar, U.S. Attorney for the District of Kansas. “What these hackers don’t count on is the tenacity of the U.S. Justice Department in recovering and returning these funds to the rightful owners.”

U.S. Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/speech/deputy-attorney-general-lisa-o-monaco-delivers-keynote-address-international-conference) in a speech for the International Conference on Cyber Security on Tuesday that authorities relied on victims from the private sector to report ransomware attacks and others “as soon as those crimes occur”:

> “If you report that attack, if you report the ransom demand and payment, if you work with the FBI, we can take action; we can follow the money and get it back; we can help prevent the next attack, the next victim; and we can hold cybercriminals accountable. Those companies that work with us will see that we stand with them in the aftermath of an incident.”

According to Monaco, the FBI and Justice Department traced the ransom payments [through the blockchain](https://cointelegraph.com/blockchain-for-beginners) in much the same way they [found and seized more than $2 million in crypto](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-officials-recover-2-3m-in-crypto-from-colonial-pipeline-ransom) following an attack on the Colonial Pipeline system in 2021. The Office of the Attorney General late [announced the formation](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-justice-dept-announces-launch-of-national-crypto-enforcement-team) of a National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team under the Justice Department, and a Virtual Asset Exploitation Unit under the FBI. Both teams were aimed at addressing cybercrimes used for “digital extortion” of funds, including crypto.

***Related: [US federal judge approves of Justice Dept criminal complaint on using crypto to evade sanctions](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-federal-judge-approves-of-justice-dept-criminal-complaint-on-using-crypto-to-evade-sanctions)***

Hacking groups connected to either North Korea and Russia have reportedly been responsible for many major ransomware and cyber attacks in the United States and globally. In April, the Treasury Department’s Office of Foreign Assets Control [named North Korean cyber-criminal Lazarus Group](https://cointelegraph.com/news/north-korean-lazarus-group-allegedly-behind-ronin-bridge-hack) as the entity behind a March 2022 hack of Ronin Bridge, in which more than $600 million in crypto assets were removed.

title: a happy direction in life
body:
There is a young man who always has a hard life. He has a stable job, but also has his parents who love him. He does not worry about food, clothing, or lack of love. However, he always felt that he had endless troubles, entangled in his heart, unable to break free or escape.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k__liI4CFCrXxRi4cKhrI.png?height=270&width=376)

How can people be so troubled? Young people are confused. One day, when he met a wise man, he expressed the confusion in his heart, hoping to get enlightenment.

After listening to the wise man, he smiled slightly and said, "The secular world, the wine pond and the meat forest, the human dance in the red dust, the famous locks and the locks, everything is tempting and confusing people. If you want to move, you will be excited, and you will naturally be troubled. Gains and losses, glory and shame, ups and downs... The more you care, the more painful your heart will be; on the contrary, the more you give up, the more peaceful your heart will be. "Let go" is to eliminate the root cause of troubles.

The young man nodded, if he understood something.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BQEGTouCkjVSpp5KsQMFZ.png?height=286&width=460)

Another day, he met a philanthropist. It is said that the philanthropist once made a lot of money, but then donated the money to others. Now, he lives happily.

The young man told the philanthropist his confusion again, hoping to get an answer from him.

The philanthropist said, I have had the same pain as you. However, since I learned to pay attention to others and to love others, the pain in my heart disappeared. Love is really an oar given to us by God, it can ferry us beyond the sea of ​​misery.

A selfish person will not get great pleasures in life. Only those who have love in their hearts can create ripples of infinite happiness in the echo of love. Sharing the pain of others can also relieve your own pain; showing your own warmth will also receive the warm gift of others. This is the magical power of love.

Yes, troubles, more often, are the result of selfishness. When a person has others in his heart and loves others, troubles will be lessened.

The words of a philanthropist make young people feel like they can see the sun through the clouds.

Once again, the unit organized a trip, and the young man saw an old woman pounding rice in a farm household. While pounding rice, she hummed a folk song. Looks very happy.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/StyiONxVh7g7jmObGno-W.png?height=270&width=390)

He also shared his confusion to the old woman, hoping to get a different answer from her.

trouble? The old woman frowned and looked at the young man and said, "I have been working from morning to night. I have been busy all my life. As long as I am working, I am singing and I am happy. I don't have time to worry.

The old woman paused and said to herself, maybe, only people who are free will be troubled.

Thinking of the words of wise men and philanthropists in the past, at that moment, young people suddenly became enlightened: It turned out that this world, unable to let go, no love in the heart, and boredom, will all be the source of troubles, and no matter what it is, it will become a spiritual source. The quagmire makes a person miserable.

When the young man understands this, it is natural that he also finds a happy direction in life.

title: #Winning
body:
This week I had planned to write on the topic of doxing, or more specifically, about the question of “to dox or not to dox”, and the choice for, or against, web3 anonymity. As inspired as I initially felt to explore it, once I sat down to outline it the work began to feel like a grind. Then, as I often do these days when feeling stuck, I turned my attention to twitter for a daily download of crypto news and DAOist musings. Somewhere in my feed, from someone I had never heard of, there appeared the following,

“You are the average of the 5 people you spend the most time with.
That’s why every quarter, I evaluate myself and my friends on 3 key criteria:

* Income
* Fitness
* Influence

Anyone who scores below me is cut off.
Complacency is the first step towards mediocrity.”

A day later, though I don’t recall all the details of my reaction, I think it a safe bet it included some combination of a furrowed brow, my best [gas face](https://slangdefine.org/g/gas-face-13ec.html) and nausea.  All of that before I fired back with the first thing to come to mind as a counter blow.

“Congratulations on a life devoid of either giving or receiving unconditional love. You’re winning though. 👊”

[https://twitter.com/HAshBrown_27/status/1548437771974348801?s=20&t=4QqD9qeeewCOpN7zYUJ16g](https://twitter.com/HAshBrown_27/status/1548437771974348801?s=20&t=4QqD9qeeewCOpN7zYUJ16g)

Soon after that I turned off my computer and went out for the day. Honestly, I don’t think it occurred to me that I would even look at the tweet again. To the contrary, as someone new to twitter this year, I expected my response would go largely ignored, joining my 20-or-so other tweets in the land of twitter oblivion. To my surprise though, when I returned home several hours later, I noticed my twitter notification bell ringing, alerting me to the fact that my response had close to 200 likes. 20 hours later that number is now up to 488. Not that I’m counting.

I’m new to this twitter thing, and as far as “likes” are concerned, have only facebook likes of posts of my kids, mountain views and fishing pictures to compare it to. 488 likes seems like a lot though. So while it may be small potatoes to seasoned tweeters with big followings, I’m a babe in the woods here, feeling pretty proud of that 488 thank you very much. Ooh, lookie there, just shot past 500. Am I going viral? LFG!!!

Seriously though, upon looking into the phenomena of my most-liked social media entry ever, I see the person I responded to has a lot of followers. 6,075 to be exact. And digging a little deeper I realize he likely intended his tweet as satire. Gas face rescinded. Perhaps the joke is on me for responding to it.

Satire or not, and irrespective of whether his friendship circles have anything to do with crypto and Web3, [@_mihir](https://twitter.com/__mihir?s=20&t=iOpvhasWZtEkPYiiXfkDYw) points to something very concerning to me about Web3 culture and the playing field of web3 identity. Playas gonna play. So how will Web3 define winning?

Before we get into all that I sense some context would be helpful.  A man in my early 50’s, I am at most a social media dabbler. I have a facebook page that I post on occasionally and to keep up with the lives of my 926 friends. I have created a few blogs over the years that I have enjoyed writing on but never broadcasted. Instagram? Ohhh hellll no….except to check in on the lives of my college-age children. I regard the notion of creating a web “identity” as near hostile to my bias for real-life interaction with others and time outdoors. And other than a short list of physical ailments, I can’t think of anything I’d like less than “followers”.

So what am I doing here worrying and writing about Web3 culture?  Fair question. What can I say except [orange pills](https://ryanslot.substack.com/p/what-it-means-to-be-orange-pilled#details) are a thing. [Green pills](https://www.forbes.com/sites/kylewestaway/2022/06/16/how-crypto-can-regenerate-the-world/?sh=7ed83b602fd3) too. I’ve fallen down a [crypto rabbit hole](https://garywoodfine.com/going-down-the-crypto-rabbit-hole/) and I can’t get up!

The truth is that while I wrestle with mixed emotions about getting involved, I am thankful for crypto’s role in opening my mind (🤯) and luring me beyond my comfort zone.  For every horror story of greed, theft and exploitation related to this new frontier, I find most of what I read about the space to be inspiring.  To quote the immortal words of Buffalo Springfield, [“Somethings Happening Here”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rQUj56sqicU), 2020’s style, and most days I want to be a part of it.

One example of this is an article, [“The Future of Work”](https://newsletter.banklesshq.com/p/the-future-of-work), by David Hoffman. David makes a strong case for why Digital Organizations (DO’s), enabled by the blockchain and tokenized incentives, will present unprecedented opportunities for humans to coordinate both our hearts’ and minds’ shared interests to do purposeful work together.  Among the many lines to strike a chord with me David writes,

“If you are a young person, looking for purpose, meaning, and eventually a salary, establishing yourself as a strong DOer is one of the best footholds you can establish for yourself….If you believe DOs are the future, you should start DOing now, so that you become the scarce resource for both DOs and people who need help DOing.”

Relative to the audience David likely had in mind I am not a “young person”. That said, aside from a rather curmudgeonly attitude toward social media, I pride myself at being young in spirit. I am DOing (and DAOing) now and, in time, aspire to be among the scarce, most valued resources of the space. So what game am I playing? And what was it about @_mihir”s tweet that bothered me so?

Though it has been over 20 years since I worked as an equity analyst at an investment brokerage firm, that work, and my short time in the industry, taught me some valuable lessons. The most memorable of them is the difference between the “game” of judging companies’ worth on the basis of quarterly performance vs. that of valuing them (or not) on the basis of fundamental strengths relative to longer-term investment horizons. The former game is played to generate transactions that pay brokers and their firms. The latter is played to maximize investors’ returns.

Web3 playing fields, DOs and DAOs included, will create whole new worlds from which to relate to the earth, token projects, and one another. There will be more games to go around than anyone can count in the space’s many arenas. Short-term trading, of crypto and people, can be fun, even profitable. Patient investment, in the people and projects that mean the most to us, can change the world. Web3 only wins by changing the world.

title: 秒杀黑洞的类星体，光芒贯穿半个宇宙，会撕裂银河系？
body:
在我们的认知当中，黑洞应该可以被称得上是整个宇宙中最为危险的天体之一。**由于黑洞本身的质量极大，因此它可以产生几乎一种无法逆转的吸引力。**大型的黑洞甚至可以在一段时间内把一整个星系吞噬殆尽，甚至连光线也无法逃离黑洞的捕捉。

但是在科学家们的研究过程中，人们逐渐发现了一种新的天体，这种天体相较于黑洞更为恐怖和神秘，它的名字就叫做**类星体**……

### 宇宙中的类星体

从类星体这个名字当中，**我们就可以看出这是一种与星体结构类似，但却并非是真正意义上“星”的天体。**

简单来说，类星体的结构与我们认知当中的恒星极为类似，**但它们却在某些方面与恒星有着显著的区别**，它们并不像恒星一样可以将自身的物质和进行压缩成一个球形，**只是以一种近乎于缥缈的状态存在于宇宙当中。**

而**类星体与恒星最为相似的地方，就是二者都能向外发射一种电波。**

我们也可以**把这种电波称之为射电源，恒星与类星体发射的射电源，在宇宙当中可谓是极其常见**，我们每天都能通过射电望远镜观测到这种电波的存在。**而那些我们无法弄清来源的射电波，其实就是来自于类星体。**

从这些描述当中，**我们能够看得出类星体是一种在宇宙当中极为特殊的存在**，但它的天体属性从单纯的描述来说无论怎样也称不上是恐怖，为什么天文学家们会对其感到畏惧呢？

### 类星体的三大恐怖之处

类星体的**第一大恐怖之处就是它的亮度**，2**015年，我国的天文工作者们发现了一个巨型的类星体**，这个类星体距离我们的地球足足有**128亿光年**的距离。

按理来说，在这样遥远的距离之下，任何物质都是难以被观测到的。而天文学家们之所以能够轻而易举的发现类星体，就是因为它的亮度实在是太过惊人，**根据数据分析，该类星体的亮度可以达到太阳的420万亿倍。**

**正因如此，我们才能够跨越100多亿光年的距离来对其进行观测。**

科学家们还发现：**类星体在宇宙当中的红移值都很高**，也就是说，**它们与地球之间的距离其实是在不断被拉长的**。如果我们的地球距离一个类星体过近的话，很有可能会对地球上的人类产生重大的影响。

类星体的**第二大恐怖之处就是其内部所蕴含的能量**，类星体的体型放在宇宙当中其实并不算大，一般都不会超过普通的星系，但是，**一个类星体内部所蕴藏的能量却要比普通的星系高上几千亿倍。**

从很大程度上来说，**类星体之所以能够有如此大的能量效应，是因其超高的亮度。**

如果我们把一块光伏电池板放置在距离类星体只有1亿公里的地方，**我们只需要从中接受一秒钟的光能，所接收到的能量总数就可以在理论上帮助人类的0.72级文明突破到二级文明。**

但这样的想法终究无法实现，因为**类星体周边的能量物质运动太不稳定，如果真的把探测器送到离它这么近的位置，无疑是自寻死路。**

类星体的**第三大恐怖之处是其违背物理学常识的运动速度。**“物质的运动速度无法超过光速”是物理学界一个不争的事实，但是**科学家们在观测类星体上的物质运动史，却发现其分离速度达到了288万公里/秒。**

直到今天也没有人能够说清类星体内部如此剧烈的物质运动和超高的速度转换究竟是什么原因。

### “秒杀”黑洞的天体

在天文学界**，类星体可以被称之为是能够秒杀黑洞的天体**。与黑洞一样，**类星体也有着对于周围物质的吞噬能力**，而且在类星体中心一般都有着一个巨星的黑洞存在，也就是说：**这两者之间是一种包含与被包含的关系。**

**在黑洞的帮助之下，类星体会吞噬周边的物质，并且在吞噬的过程中不断旋转物质产生摩擦**，类星体的发光原理基本上就可以被归类于物质摩擦时所产生的光能和热能。在这个过程中，**类星体甚至还能向外传送大量的热能辐射以及射线光波。**

所以不论从哪个角度来说，**类星体在宇宙当中的毁坏力都是要高于黑洞的，因为黑洞自身的运动速率并不算快，而类星体却可以以一种超快的速度在宇宙当中横行霸道，**吞噬周边的一切物质。

### 人类是否会受到影响？

那么我们人类是否会受到类星体这种天体的影响呢？这个问题的答案是暂时否定的，因为宇宙中的类星体距离我们都十分遥远，**哪怕放任不管，它们也要足足花上几十亿甚至几百亿年的时间才能够来到可能对地球产生威胁的位置。**

我们的**太阳系正处在一个难得的稳定期，人类可以在这个时间段大力谋求自身的发展。**目前的科学界普遍认为，类星体是整个宇宙当中毁坏力最为惊人的天体，它的出现以及高速运动在某种意义上限制了宇宙生命的发展。

**如果整个宇宙空间内没有类星体这种物质的存在，取而代之的就会是大量的恒星以及星系结构，生命也就能更容易的产生了。**

title: US Justice Department seized $500K in fiat and crypto from hackers connected to DPRK government
body:
The United States Department of Justice has seized and returned roughly $500,000 in fiat and crypto from a hacking group tied to the North Korean government, which included two crypto payments made by U.S. health care providers.

In a Tuesday announcement, the Justice Department [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/justice-department-seizes-and-forfeits-approximately-500000-north-korean-ransomware-actors) in conjunction with the FBI it had investigated a $100,000 ransomware payment in Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) from a Kansas hospital to a North Korean hacking group in order to regain access to its systems, as well as a $120,000 BTC payment from a medical provider in Colorado to one of the wallets connected to the aforementioned attack. In May, the FBI filed a seizure warrant for funds from the two ransom attacks and others laundered through China, which the Justice Department reported as worth roughly $500,000 total.

“These sophisticated criminals are constantly pushing boundaries to search for ways to extort money from victims by forcing them to pay ramsons in order to regain control of their computer and record systems,” said Duston Slinkar, U.S. Attorney for the District of Kansas. “What these hackers don’t count on is the tenacity of the U.S. Justice Department in recovering and returning these funds to the rightful owners.”

U.S. Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/speech/deputy-attorney-general-lisa-o-monaco-delivers-keynote-address-international-conference) in a speech for the International Conference on Cyber Security on Tuesday that authorities relied on victims from the private sector to report ransomware attacks and others “as soon as those crimes occur”:

> “If you report that attack, if you report the ransom demand and payment, if you work with the FBI, we can take action; we can follow the money and get it back; we can help prevent the next attack, the next victim; and we can hold cybercriminals accountable. Those companies that work with us will see that we stand with them in the aftermath of an incident.”

According to Monaco, the FBI and Justice Department traced the ransom payments [through the blockchain](https://cointelegraph.com/blockchain-for-beginners) in much the same way they [found and seized more than $2 million in crypto](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-officials-recover-2-3m-in-crypto-from-colonial-pipeline-ransom) following an attack on the Colonial Pipeline system in 2021. The Office of the Attorney General late [announced the formation](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-justice-dept-announces-launch-of-national-crypto-enforcement-team) of a National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team under the Justice Department, and a Virtual Asset Exploitation Unit under the FBI. Both teams were aimed at addressing cybercrimes used for “digital extortion” of funds, including crypto.

***Related: [US federal judge approves of Justice Dept criminal complaint on using crypto to evade sanctions](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-federal-judge-approves-of-justice-dept-criminal-complaint-on-using-crypto-to-evade-sanctions)***

Hacking groups connected to either North Korea and Russia have reportedly been responsible for many major ransomware and cyber attacks in the United States and globally. In April, the Treasury Department’s Office of Foreign Assets Control [named North Korean cyber-criminal Lazarus Group](https://cointelegraph.com/news/north-korean-lazarus-group-allegedly-behind-ronin-bridge-hack) as the entity behind a March 2022 hack of Ronin Bridge, in which more than $600 million in crypto assets were removed.

title: Source claims 3AC's Deribit exposure is worth much less than reported
body:
Court documents that describe the insolvency of failed crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital, also known as 3AC, may be overestimating the value of the firm’s remaining assets — specifically, its exposure to crypto options exchange Deribit. 

In a [1,100-page affidavit composed by liquidator Russell Crumpler](https://cointelegraph.com/news/3ac-liquidators-seek-time-access-to-headquarters-as-genesis-algorand-ties-are-untangled) and filed in a British Virgin Islands court, 3AC was described as “insolvent” and in need of being completely “wound up” because "Its management cannot be trusted to retain any remaining assets for the benefit of creditors." The documents also detailed 3AC’s remaining assets, which included shares of Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC), cryptocurrencies Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)), Avalanche ([AVAX](https://cointelegraph.com/avalanche-price-index)) and Near (NEAR), and shares of Deribit. Liquidators want access to these assets in order to facilitate creditors’ claims, which are [worth at least $2.8 billion](https://cointelegraph.com/news/3ac-allegedly-liable-for-2-8b-in-creditor-claims).

According to the affidavit, the Deribit shares are believed to be worth $500 million, or half of 3AC’s remaining assets. However, a source with knowledge of the matter told Cointelegraph that the value of 3AC’s Deribit shares is closer to $25 million rather than $500 million, suggesting that creditors will be left holding the bag on their loans to the failed hedge fund.

According to the source, who chose to remain anonymous, the discrepancy between the two amounts is due to the type of exposure 3AC has to Deribit. They claim that 3AC does not directly own shares in Deribit but instead owns shares in a Singapore Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) called 3AC QCP Deribit SPV. The largest shareholders of the SPV are 3AC and QCP Soteria Node, a holding company whose portfolio includes Algorand and PundiX, according to its website. The SPV’s directors include QCP Soteria Node founder Sherwin Lee, QCP Capital co-founder Darius Sit and [Three Arrows Capital co-founder Su Zhu](https://cointelegraph.com/news/su-zhu-s-cryptic-statement-as-rumors-swirl-of-3ac-liquidation-and-insolvency).

***Related: [Crypto Biz: 3AC’s founders are nowhere to be found](https://cointelegraph.com/news/crypto-biz-3ac-s-founders-are-nowhere-to-be-found)***

The source further explained that the SPV owns over 23% of Deribit, making it the largest external shareholder. Of that total, 3AC owns 16%, making it the largest shareholder in the SPV.

“The SPV shares are worth significantly less than direct Deribit shares due to several material encumbrances,” the source said, adding:

> “The owner of the SPV shares cannot sell or transfer the underlying Deribit shares without unanimous consent \[...\] This means that the owner of the shares will be stuck with the SPV. These are entrenched in SPV constitution.”

The source claimed that QCP Soteria Node also has certain contractual powers, including the right of first refusal and tag-along rights, on 3AC’s SPV shares based on a side letter agreement between the two parties.

Over the course of several years, 3AC had been selling portions of its 16% stake through “binding side letters to numerous parties who are now claiming that they have an ownership on the 3AC SPV shares,” they said. “There are at least four known parties who have these side letters and have put in their claims to ownership of the 3AC shares in the SPV. Some of them are on the liquidator's official list of creditors.”

***Related: [Liquidators can subpoena 3AC founders despite ‘tricky issues’ with crypto assets](https://cointelegraph.com/news/liquidators-can-subpoena-3ac-founders-despite-tricky-issues-with-crypto-assets)***

The source claimed that a “significant discount” would need to be placed on the value of their shares due to these underlying encumbrances:

> “A significant discount needs to be placed on the value of the 3AC SPV shares because any buyer of these shares would be subject to these encumbrances and would have significant difficulty monetizing the shares in the future and would also have to deal with the entire SPV which has close to 30 members.”

Three Arrows Capital represents one of crypto’s most significant falls from grace. Once the most revered hedge fund in the industry, holding over $10 billion in assets under management, [3AC began to implode](https://cointelegraph.com/news/three-arrows-capital-has-failed-to-meet-margin-calls-report) in the wake of the Terra ecosystem collapse. Among its missteps was placing a series of large directional bets on GBTC, LUNA (now LUNC) and Lido’s Staked ETH during the worst macroeconomic backdrop since the 2008 financial crisis. 

*Cointelegraph attempted to reach out to Three Arrows Capital on the matter, but did not receive a response prior to publication.*

*Author [Joseph Hall](https://cointelegraph.com/authors/joseph-hall) contributed to this story.*

title: Amazon.eth ENS domain owner disregards 1M USDC buyout offer on Opensea
body:
On Tuesday, the Ethereum Name Service, or ENS, domain Amazon.eth [received](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x57f1887a8bf19b14fc0df6fd9b2acc9af147ea85/82229159103786399531023855469490700492269083837522026478948273323969890387800) an offer for 1 million USDC (a stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar) from an anonymous wallet address on OpenSea. The offer to buy the ENS domain went unanswered however, and no transaction took place. This is despite the last sale of the domain name being five months ago for 33 Ether (worth around $100,000 at that time).

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

It is unclear at the time of publication whether the owner simply was not informed of the offer, or did not consider it to be near fair value, or if the bidding and domain owner accounts were linked in an attempt to boost the price of the asset (in what is known as a "wash trade"). According to data from Opense, other bid offers for the ENS domain stand at just around $6,200 USDC. The domain name is verified as official by ENS and is owned by anonymous OpenSea user 4761BF.

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

ENS is a blockchain naming protocol that allows users to store avatars and profile images for use across devices and send or receive crypto and nonfungible tokens. To sell a .eth domain on OpenSea, users would first need to connect their wallet and register an address at manager.ens.domains then list it on their OpenSea account.

While many crypto enthusiasts took up interesting or creative names for the ENS service, others have embarked on the practice of domain-flipping. That is, registering ENS domains containing names of prominent entities beforehand and then later demanding a high price for the domain should the said entity wishes to enter the Web 3.0 space later on.

Since its inception in 2017, there have been over 1.67 million .eth domain registrations across approximately 482,000 owners. More than 154,100 registrations were made recentl between July 5 to July 18, partly due to [lower gas fees](https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-name-service-registrations-surge-by-200-amid-lower-gas-fees) and continued interest from entities seeking to enter the Web 3.0 space. To date, the ENS collection on OpenSea has witnessed approximately 46,200 ETH ($71.5 million) in cumulative transaction volume.

title: 太阳系被一颗恒星入侵？人类担心：太阳是否会撞击其他恒星？
body:
**银河系是一个拥有数千亿恒星的巨大星系，而太阳只是其中之一**。如果从整体来看，太阳不是一颗特别突出的恒星，它与银河系中的许多恒星一起围绕着银河系的中心运行。这种情况下，越来越多的人开始担心，在如此多的恒星长时间运动后，太阳是否会撞击其他恒星。

从理论上来说，尽管这种撞击的几率相当低，但是对于太阳这种质量远不如大多数恒星的恒星来说，**如果有其他质量更大的恒星从它旁边路过，那么大质量恒星所带来的的引力，完全能够对于太阳系内部的诸多天体产生大量影响**。 
 

因此，尽管恒星之间的撞击可能不容易产生，但是某些恒星完全可以导致太阳系内部的小天体乱跑，从而产生撞击。

事实上，这种理论层面的担忧并非多余，因为科学家已经发现大约**70000年前**，太阳系被另一颗恒星入侵，名为**“阿克苏”**。这颗恒星严格来说是红矮星的一种，距离我们并不遥远，大概只有**20光年**。

观测数据表明，**该恒星的质量是太阳的0.095倍，半径约为太阳的十分之一**。此外，它还有一颗巨大的**伴星**，其**质量是太阳的0.063倍，是一颗棕矮星**。 
 

大家都知道，世界上的所有天体都在不断地进行着运动，它们运动的方式和规律并不相同，至少不可能全部与太阳相同，因此我们观察到的绝大多数天体或多或少都有一定的速度。

“阿克苏星”引起科学家注意的一个重要原因是，在我们看来，这颗恒星几乎没有**“切向速度”**，但它有一个相对较快的**“径向速度”**（**约82.4kms**），其方向远离我们。但是，如果回过头来看，在过去的某个时刻，这颗恒星曾经非常接近太阳。

在发现这颗天体的异常之后，科学家们仔细地通过其**距离、运动方向、速度和银河系的引力场**来模拟这颗恒星。经过几万次的模拟，结果发现，**大约70000年前**，这颗恒星进入太阳系的概率为**98%**，根据模拟结果，它与太阳的最近距离约为**0.82光年**。 
 

当时“阿克苏星”与太阳之间的距离不到**1光年**。大家应该知道，太阳系的真正边缘实际上是一个**半径至少为1光年的巨大球形星云**，这意味着如果是这样的话，这颗恒星实际上已经入侵了太阳系。

科学家们推测，“阿克苏星”及其伴星的总质量可以达到太阳的**15%**左右。如此大质量产生的引力必然对太阳系里里外外的各种小天体产生重大影响，因此我们在**70000年**后仍然可以找到一些线索。幸运的是，这颗天体看起来并没有对我们生存的星球造成任何伤害，否则地球上可能就不会存在人类。

当然，**仅仅通过计算机模拟就说太阳系被另一颗恒星入侵多多少少有些牵强。**为了提高这一说法的可信度，需要更多的证据。或许在不远的将来，科学家能够找到更为直接的证据。

title: clouds and winds are light
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IQck4Pbz0_dphwHj6n6Lj.png?height=266&width=430)

In my spare time, I always like to type on the keyboard in front of the computer, writing novels that others think are not novels. Even so, I still enjoy writing.

I especially enjoy writing when I'm feeling down. Because at that time, my sense of touch was the most sensitive, my thinking was also very active, and my thinking ability would also be enhanced. Even the editing and expression of words were far better than usual. I was able to get into the state of writing very well, I might even say it was a good state.

At that time, I could travel from this real life to another virtual world. There, I was like a god, a god who could overturn clouds and rain, and be omnipotent. I control the fate of all people, whether happy or sad, fortunate or unfortunate. I immersed myself in it and enjoyed it happily.

In this real life, I always like to observe every person around me in detail and everything that happens to them. When I am alone, I slowly crumble them, reshape them, and sneak them into my novels.

Whenever I see them dazed, confused, hesitant, helpless, tangled... irritable, my thoughts will become clearer and more organized.

I thought to myself, how would I be if he (she) was. After empathy, I will deal with it rationally in my novel, and then arrange various plots, scenes and later changes.

At that moment, I forgot my true self. Even in real life, I have the same troubles as the storyteller, but at that time, I put them all aside. At that time, all my attention and energy were placed on the people and events in the story.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hssrKiQ-nCpfDIzo61E6D.png?height=280&width=448)

A friend once talked to me about it, and he said, "This state is called obsession."

In fact, I don't know myself, is this state of obsession or an escape?

Perhaps, in this real life, I am a person who is melancholy and carries a lot of troubles. Entry to me is probably a way of getting out and getting away. Only in this way can I ignore the present moment and gain a temporary relief.

A friend said: "If this state is escapism, it is too narrow; if it is selflessness, it is very admirable; if it is obsession, then it is even more worthy of appreciation and praise."

Listening to his words, I laughed and teased him: "It is very likely that I am still transforming in these states. These should be the process of my evolution..."

After chatting with him, I suddenly came to a realization.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cLfJbFMeOI2OUSb2dNlsM.png?height=266&width=465)

Perhaps, many times, we can see ourselves as other people, both inside and outside the story. In the face of all the complicated and tricky things, we might as well step aside and be a quiet bystander emotionally and seriously, just like watching a movie or TV show. Finally, we combine objective vision, use rational thinking and the most effective way to solve problems.

Then I think that when we have such thoughts, mentality and ability, we should be able to calmly face all the difficulties and various tests in life at any time.

Therefore, the four words "clouds and winds are light", it no longer belongs to some people, we can also have it.

title: 币币圈｜项目挖掘｜Sui
body:
### 币币圈是区块链行业最快的资讯与空投发布平台。

**👀关注我们的推特：**<https://twitter.com/BBQclub_CN>

**🐾加入我们的电报及时了解最新动态：**<https://t.me/BBQclub1>

### 币币圈项目评级：★★★★★★

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1pK2f5iah9uVnEwHiK3ij.png?height=1080&width=3238)

一.Sui简介：
Mysten Labs 由 4 位前 Meta 工程师创立，于 2022 年 3 月公布其 Layer 1 公链项目「Sui」，并于 5 月公布该项目 Token SUI 的经济模型。Figment Capital 投资人 Trace 在个人社交媒体平台上从技术、Token 经济学、团队三个角度介绍了 Sui 这条新公链。

二.团队介绍
Sui 的开发团队是 Mysten Labs，一家为 Web3 构建基础设施的公司。创始人包括 Evan Cheng、Adeniyi Abiodun、Sam Blackshear、George Danezis、Kostas Kryptos，都在 Meta 参与过 Novi 和 Diem 项目。这些科学家和工程师是 Meta 许多创新背后的关键人物，包括 Move 编程语言以及现在正在其他区块链上实施的 Narwhal/Tusk 内存池和 BFT 共识。
技术：
基于 Meta（原 Facebook）多年研究开发的 Sui，不同于我们见过的任何区块链。首先，Sui 区块链具有极高的性能。在 MacBook Pro 上运行 Sui 节点的早期数据显示每秒能够处理超过 12 万笔 Token 交易。
Sui 性能的关键在于交易并行化（transaction parallelization）。在大多数区块链中，交易必须要排好顺序，并放入区块以循序执行。循序执行不必要地限制了这些链上的吞吐量，毕竟大多数交易互相独立。因为 Sui 要求明确说明交易的从属关系，所以它能够并行处理它们。在少数交易相互交织的情况下，Sui 仍然可以对它们进行排序并循序执行。Sui 通过两种不同的方式达成共识：

拜占庭式一致广播，用于独立的交易

BFT 共识，用于有从属关系的交易由于独立的交易可以并行验证，Sui 可以通过给每个验证节点增加更多设备来线性增加吞吐量，以此提升规模。 不仅具有高吞吐量，Sui 也拥有低延迟。它的共识算法专注于尽量减少验证节点之间处理交易所需的通信。这导致简单的交易几乎立即被验证，而复杂的交易可以在 2-3 秒内执行。当然，我们需要看看这个网络在公共部署中的表现，但早期结果极其振奋人心。Sui 使用 Move 虚拟机和 Move 编程语言来实现智能合约。Move 与 Rust 一样是内存安全的，但比其他智能合约语言更具表现力。我为 Move 写了一篇简短介绍。Sui 使用了 Move 的一个小变体来改善网络性能并简化开发人员体验。这篇文档会告诉你更多关于 Sui 的 Move 与普通 Move 的不同之处。虽然大多数区块链的存储都以帐户为中心，但 Sui 的存储是围绕对象设计的。每个对象由一个地址所拥有，默认情况下可变，也可设为不可变或在多个地址之间共享。Sui 的 Move 智能合约可以接收这些对象作为输入，对其进行操作，并将对象作为输出返回。这是一种完全不同于 Solid 或 Rust 的智能合约编程范式。 Token 经济学 SUI Token 的总供应量为 100 亿，将用于分配给创始团队、投资者、公售、Sui 基金会和未来的释放。确切的初始 Token 分发时间将在未来几周内公布。

Sui Token 有 4 个作用：

1. 质押/保护网络
2. 交易费
3. 治理
4. 账户单位/交易中介

由于网络需求的变化，大多数区块链受到 Gas 成本大幅波动的影响。为了使 Gas 费保持在低位并可预测，Sui 实施了一个新颖的 Gas 市场设计：Sui 以纪元为单位运行，每个纪元（24 小时）验证节点集都会改变。到那时，新纪元的验证节点会就整个纪元的参考 Gas 费进行投票。该协议会提供一些激励措施，鼓励验证节点在整个纪元将交易费用保持在接近参考价格的水平。通过提供更稳定的 Gas 费，提交给 Sui 的交易将以更可预测的速度执行，从而创造了更好的用户体验。但网络堵塞期间 Gas 费如何保持在低位呢？因为网络的吞吐量与更多的参与者成线性关系，验证节点可以根据网络需求的增加按比例增加更多的参与者，以此使 Gas 价格接近参考价格。

机构投资和融资情况： 由前 Meta Platforms 员工创立的 Wbe3 初创公司 Mysten Labs 正在寻求以 20 亿美元估值筹集至少 2 亿美元 B 轮融资，本轮融资由 FTX Ventures 领投，目前项目方已在该轮融资中获得 1.4 亿美元资金支持。此前，Mysten Labs 于 2021 年 12 月宣布完成 3600 万美元 A 轮融资，该轮融资由 a16z 领投，Coinbase Ventures、NFX、Slow Ventures、Scribble Ventures、Samsung NEXT、Lux Capital 等参投。

推特：@Mysten_Labs

Discord： [discord.gg/sui](http://discord.gg/sui)

title: 驳斥ETH的通缩悖论
body:
首先复述ETH2.0通缩悖论：

实现合并以后，ETH总量将进行年化1%～2%的通缩；通缩程度与ETH上活跃程度正相关；经济体的适度通胀能维持经济良性运作；ETH一直通缩将走向死路。

该悖论的诡计在于偷换概念：我们谈论ETH通缩是指ETH的总量下降。而经济学上的“通缩”是指“物价水平的下降”。要将ETH数量的通缩等同于ETH经济体的经济通缩，就要证明ETH数量的减少会带来ETH上服务与商品的价格下降。我认为是不能证明的。

货币理论里有一个非常重要的理论是费雪公式（**equation of exchange**）：PQ=MV。表明社会生产的总商品的标价应该等同于流通货币数量乘以货币流通速度。根据这个公式，M的下降，会影响价格水平P。但是，问题在于ETH生态上的M是指ETH的总量吗？我们能够对ETH上运行的WBTC，USDC，USDT以及其他ERC20视而不见吗？ETH上从来没有对生态的商品和服务强制使用ETH支付。

反而，我们能把M等同于ETH流通量的唯一环境只有ETH记账的场景。这正说明了ETH通缩会导致记账价格下降，最终形成新的供需平衡。

综上，ETH的数量通缩不会导致ETH的生态形成经济通缩。ETH的数量通缩会重新平衡。

title: wind outside the window
body:
Spring has come quietly, not too late, not too late. It came to me when the spring breeze blew through the window...

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/65GgsYJu35m6aLS-Ghmzm.png?height=270&width=405)

I was looking at the book by the window, the wind outside the window blew through the curtains and kissed my cheek, and naughty flipped the book in my hand. I only heard the sound of rushing, the book in my hand was turned a few pages, and the wind coming in from the window seemed to come in and tell me it was time to wake up. "Because a day's plan is in the morning, and a year's plan is in the spring." Spring is the season for sowing, and only hard work can bring harvest in autumn. Yeah, isn't my hard work today just to be rewarded in the fall?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Yi8VKc24ysugFLMJtKX5X.png?height=270&width=390)

At this time, the wind outside the window is not so soft, so light. It is not like the cold wind in winter, and it is not soft and quiet like the breeze in summer, but it is gentle in the rush, and strong in the soft.

In the early morning, the wind outside the window is like a quiet Jiangnan woman, always stroking the bamboo leaves outside the window gently and carefully. Under the sunshine of the morning sun, the bamboo leaves outside the window swayed gracefully under the accompaniment of pure music, carefully making a thin sound. Scattered shadows are reflected on the glass of the window, swaying gently in the soft sunlight. The wind outside the window blows so gently and quietly...

But slowly... the sun rose over the top of the mountain, the sun blew across the top of the mountain, and the wind outside the window was no longer so quiet, only the bamboo leaves outside the window rustled, and the bamboo leaves kept rustling in the wind. At noon, when the sun rises to the sky, the wind outside the window blows into the window and brings a stream of heat. It is not as boring as the heat in autumn. It is cool and warm, which makes people feel particularly warm. Very comfortable. The wind outside the window at noon is no longer pure music, but a simple piece of music. It immediately entered the window and woke me up, who was about to fall asleep. Listening to the rustling sound, I woke up a lot...

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Za4UdjGyz0CCdPTP0Wdne.png?height=270&width=390)

When it was almost dusk in the afternoon, the sun was about to set on the top of the mountain, and the afterglow of the sun shone on the bamboo forest outside the window. The sun is no longer so strong and harsh, but only a soft light is left. When I raised my head, I could look directly at the sun on the top of the mountain, instead of being unable to open my eyes in the sun like noon. By this time, the wind outside the window had not stopped since the early morning, but was more rapid, as if to catch up with the pace of the sun, so rapid that it could not stop for a moment. I could only hear the wind blowing the bamboo leaves and making a whistling sound. Not only the bamboo leaves were swaying, but the whole bamboo forest was shaking constantly. The whistling wind was accompanied by the rustling of bamboo leaves. The wind outside the window was so strong and powerful that it was desperately playing a majestic symphony. At this time, the wind outside the window was no longer so quiet, and the curtains were also jumping randomly, so I quickly got up and closed the window...

When night fell, it was pitch black outside the window, and the dark night was only accompanied by stars. At this time, the wind outside the window has quieted down, it did not go, but just stayed quietly in the bamboo forest outside the window. But I clearly felt its presence, and it quietly entered the window. Touching my face under the light, I felt a chill, and I immediately recovered from being in a daze. And the bamboo forest under the light outside the window did not continue to play music, they were whispering in rustling, and slowly became quiet...

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JGfN2VTnnVyZwy3aMImL1.png?height=266&width=456)

In the dead of night, I also slowly fell asleep under the caress of the wind outside the window. In my dream, there is a bamboo forest outside the window and the wind outside the window. I sit in front of the window, open the window, and quietly look at the bamboo forest outside the window. In fact, the bamboo forest outside the window is not alone, because Fenger has been accompanying them...

**[Orange DAO](https://orangedao.xyz/), a crypto collective created by Y Combinator alumni for backing Web3 startups, is excited to announce that it is allocating part of its treasury to [Cega](http://cega.fi), defi's first exotic options protocol in Solana.**

The first product of OrangeDAO was our fund to back web3 startups but now we want to support these exciting new protocols we invest in by using our treasury to become early users of their products. 

We believe in our vision so that is why we are deciding to put our money where our mouth is by creating our defi fund to allocate treasuries in founders that are building great things.

# What’s Cega?

Cega is defi's first exotic options protocol in Solana. Founded by [Arisa Toyosaki](https://www.linkedin.com/in/toyosaki/)(google/bitcoin.com), [Winston Zhang](https://www.linkedin.com/in/winstonzhang/) (YC), [Victor Zhang](https://www.linkedin.com/in/zhangvictorz/) (YC/Tesla) and [Felicia Chen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/feliciachen0/)(Anduril/Apple), a rockstar team. Their goal is to create high-yielding products with protection in mind for every person's financial security.

Their inaugural exotic options product is the Fixed Coupon Note. Fixed coupon notes (FCN) are a type of exotic option structured product that has both equity option and bond-like characteristics. You can learn more about their product [here](https://cega.gitbook.io/cega/products/overview/fcn/what-are-fixed-coupon-notes-fcn) 

Their [product](http://cega.fi) has 3 yield offerings.

![Cega's different yield pools](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Pk9fj7ENacKcl995cFWqt.png?height=1048&width=2626)

They just launched a couple days ago and already have $30M+ in TVL. The team is very clear about the risks and have different levels of APY depending on what you are comfortable with. 

# Allocating OrangeDAO’s treasury

We created a strategy/defi team that increases the yield the treasury of the DAO in a stable and secure way and also supports the protocols we invest in. 

As a macro strategy for our treasury, we have a combination of different levels of risk going from Aave protocol to exotic options. 

One of the frameworks we use to analyze these opportunities is the following:

* Who is the team behind this?
* Is this audited?
* Do we understand the business risks behind the protocol?
* TotalValueLocked

Cega was clearly a superb choice and decided to allocate part of our treasury in a combination of their different baskets.

We are looking for more yield opportunities, if you are building something please let us know at orlando@orangedao.xyz , alex@orangedao.xyz .

We want to be your first check and then one of your early adopters. 🍊

title: ☄️ An Intro to Balancer Protocol
body:
# 

# What are AMMs ?

Automated market makers (AMMs) are smart contracts that enable automated management of crowdsourced liquidity pools (LP), providing tradeable tokens to decentralized exchanges (DEX). AMMs are an important primitive in DeFi, as anyone can deposit their own tokens in an AMM LP, receiving a share of trading fees and the LP tokens in return.

How do AAMs differ from traditional finance? In the traditional trading model, buyers and sellers use something called an *order book*, where they write down what they want to trade in a huge list with everyone’s trades. The behavior of the buyers and sellers controls the market rates in the order book.

AMMs do not rely on humans to manage trades, which are controlled directly by algorithms. An AMM replaces the buy and sell orders in an order book market with a liquidity pool of two assets, both valued relative to each other. As one asset is traded for the other, the relative prices of the two assets shift, and the new market rate for both is re-calculated. 

The majority of AMMs use the *constant mean market maker equation *(also known as the constant product equation) to define how liquidity pools behave:

```
Balance of token A * Balance of token B = Constant product
```

For example, in a pool with 2,000,000 tokens A and 1,000 tokens B, the constant product is 2,000,000,000. This inverse correlation then determines the trading price of the assets at any moment, as the price of one token increases when the price of the second token decreases:

```
Market price for token A = Balance of token / Balance of  token A
```

The price curve is often utilized as a way to visualize this relation:

To find the swap price for the assets in a given pool (i.e., the amount of **token A** received when you exchange a certain quantity of **token B**), we calculate the balances for each token that are needed in the pool to keep the constant product unchanged after the swap:

```
Balance of token A - Quantity of token A received = (Constant product) / (Balance of token B + Quantity of token B paid)
```

The amount of **token A** received from this swap conveys the “buy price”, and it’s calculated from the relation above:

```
Quantity of token A received = (Balance of token A * Quantity of token B  paid) / (Balance of token B  +  Quantity of token B paid)
```


---

## Enter Balancer

Launched in 2018, Balancer introduced a protocol for configurable liquidity on the Ethereum blockchain and other EVM-compatible systems. With Balancer, users are able to create liquidity pools with up to eight different ERC-20 tokens, in any ratio. These pools can be thought of as automatically *rebalancing portfolios*, providing traders with what can be called a *decentralized index fund.* 

Balancer routes several pools together, allowing easy trades from one token in one pool to any other token in another pool. These multi-asset pools work using what is called *weighted math*, designed to allow swaps between any asset whether or not they have a price correlation. Balancer's price equation is a generalization of the constant product equation, accounting for multi-tokens and weightings that are not evenly split, so that prices are determined by the pools’ balances and weights.

Balancer’s core smart contract is called [“The Vault''](https://docs.balancer.fi/products/the-vault), and it controls and holds all tokens in each of the Balancer pools. The Vault’s architecture separates the *token accounting and management* from the *pool logic*, simplifying the pools’ contracts. In this architecture, [Balancer’s Protocol Swap Fees](https://docs.balancer.fi/concepts/fees) are the percentage of swap fees collected by pools defined on a contract named [ProtocolFeesCollector.sol](https://etherscan.io/address/0xce88686553686DA562CE7Cea497CE749DA109f9F#readContract). These fees include flash loan fees, and they are adjusted through governance by the Balancer’s DAO. 


---

## Balancer’s Flash Loan

Flash Loans are special smart contract operations that allow the borrowing of any available amount of assets (up to the total liquidity) without collateral. This is possible as long as the liquidity plus interests are returned within one block transaction. If the borrower is unable to repay the loan, the entire transaction is simply reverted. 

A common use of flash loans is on arbitrage algorithms, searching for profit by trading an asset on a first DEX and then getting back the asset plus gains on other DEXs. 

In the context of Balancer, a trader could borrow any amount of tokens available on The Vault to use on a flash loan. The logic for these types of transactions is specified in the [FlashLoans.sol](https://etherscan.io/address/0xBA12222222228d8Ba445958a75a0704d566BF2C8#code#F5#L20) contract, more specifically in the flashLoan function:

1\. This function starts with straightforward initializations, ensuring that the length of the token array and the amount array match, and assigning the zero address to the previousToken variable (to ensure the tokens are sorted and unique):

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UREh_nf-SFXdGe8LCFFVz.png?height=472&width=1136)

2\. The first loop over the tokens’ array is used to record the pre-balance of each token, calculate the loan fees, and transfer each amount of token to the receiver. Note the callback function on receiver, receiveFlashLoan, right after the loop:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cpvblxToE4608coCEetW0.png?height=458&width=1496)

3\. The second loop checks whether each token’s balance is equal or larger than their previous balance, then add any balance surplus as a fee in the receivedFeeAmount variable:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vx7_fibJIg6qIV5lZv2Yi.png?height=322&width=1436)

4\. This fee is then transferred to ProtocolFeesCollector:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dN_t1A4G-tuxZQYwpdRyp.png?height=106&width=622)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hTavNmYO706f6ctLALqKV.png?height=194&width=1084)


---

## Pretty neat, huh?

body:
最近行业内关于协议代币套用PE的文章逐渐多了起来，不谦虚地说，我在这方面研究得更早点，但心情比较复杂。

什么叫做PE估值
市盈率=每股市价/每股盈利，即PE(市盈率)=P(股价)/E(每股盈利)。其中，E的数值一般采用最近一个完整财年的每股盈利数据;而P的数值则是目前时点目标个股的最新股
价。作为国际成熟股市经过长期实践的一种估值方法，市盈率估值法最突出的特点，是其非常简洁有效。
协议代币能否套用PE估值
首先，目前所有的协议代币，几乎都为治理币，和收益权是分割的。若按传统股票来类比，股票=治理权+收益权，治理币=治理权，所以目前治理币的功效远输股票。当下各个知名协议的治理币模式，普遍的缺点有:


一、团队成本过高，动则几千万美金/年的成本，完全无法理解，如Makerdao运营成本$4200w/年;
二、国库收入分红提案均无法通过，个别人掌握太多的票数，较为中心化，如ENS;
三、风险有点高，国库即保险金，一旦有黑天鹅，国库赔付后，其金额会巨幅锐减，如借贷协议comp。

现实比较残酷，但依然乐观看未来。当下的缺点，有主客观因素，一方面是市场可选标的少，流动性丰腴下盲目买单，纵容了项目方胡作非为;另一方面受制于政策的影响，有的协议无法实现分红，以免归类为证券被追责。

乐观看未来，协议代币这件事最后若不能比股票更好，更能实现林肯的“民有民治民享”，那么则去中心化金融的使命是无法完成的。
web30那就还不如web20DAO那就还不如公司制。下一个周期中，叙事经济应减弱，治理和分红是最主要的项目模式设计，这一切会在牛熊中去转变，从投资者的投资逻辑，去反逼项目方的设计。

同时市场上也有一些协议代币，逐渐将治理权和收益权合体，或部分合体。抵押生息，这个“息”包含两部分，一部分是通胀的代币分发，二部分是协议的手续费分成。严格来说，后者才是真正的“息”，前者只是囚徒效应中的占比使然。

title: Governance Recap #1: Driving Long-Term Growth for Aura
body:
The past week has seen a whirlwind of temperature checks and draft proposals from core contributors, representatives of DAOs, and community members focused on driving long-term sustainability and growth for Aura. These proposals remain in draft stage, though will be taken to vote in this [next vlAURA voting cycle](https://snapshot.org/#/aurafinance.eth), starting Thursday July 21st.

This is the first of (hopefully) many somewhat-regular governance recaps, summarizing what members of the Aura DAO are thinking and will be bringing to vote in the coming voting cycles.

## \[AIP-2\]: auraBAL Reward Reallocation

Core contributors PhiJFry and 0xButterfield [are suggesting](https://forum.aura.finance/t/aip-2-aurabal-reward-reallocation/82/7) the redirection of rewards from the existing auraBAL liquidity pool to the new auraBAL gauge, recently approved by Balancer governance, along with Hidden Hand bribes for that same gauge. These rewards represent 10% of the total AURA supply, distributed over five years.

Butterfield and PhijFry suggest the proposal will consolidate and potentially deepen auraBAL liquidity, creating a better user experience for system participants.

The proposal has passed by the DAO and will be executed some time over the next day as of this article’s publishing.

## \[AIP-3\] Increasing AURA Float and Liquidity, while Building DAO Runway

Independent investor SmallCapScientist and BadgerDAO contributor Tritium, both of which have been advocates for Aura since its launch, [are supportive of](https://forum.aura.finance/t/aip-3-increasing-aura-float-and-liquidity-while-building-dao-runway/92/14) building a longer runway for the DAO.

The Aura DAO treasury currently has $400,000 of reserve assets, half of which are earmarked exclusively for an ImmuneFi bounty payout. A large tranche of leftover tokens from initial liquidity distribution and the airdrop, totaling 2,800,000 AURA, have also been returned to the treasury, creating a purported liquidity crisis where not enough AURA is circulating for DAOs and other participants to properly accumulate.

SmallCap and Tritium say 350,000 AURA should be diversified into USDC for the DAO to extend its runway, inject more AURA float into the market, and give a way for market participants to more easily acquire AURA

## \[AIP-4\] Boost protocol fee to auraBAL to increase Aura’s veBAL intake

Core contributor Butterfield is [proposing](https://forum.aura.finance/t/aip-4-boost-protocol-fee-to-aurabal-to-increase-aura-s-vebal-intake/100/9) to increase the protocol fees routed toward the auraBAL staking pool to entice more \[80/20 BAL/ETH BPT\] deposits, and thus Aura’s share of veBAL voting power. This fee increase will be funded by a general fee increase on BAL earned by the DAO, along with the BAL directed toward vlAURA depositors. 

vlAURA depositors are being compensated by the introduction of Balancer’s Core Pools proposal, which routed significant fees that would have previously gone to auraBAL holders to vlAURA holders. It is also argued that the long-term growth in Aura’s veBAL share will lead to greater system revenue overall, benefiting AURA.

## \[Temperature Check\] Aura Foundation Funding Proposal

Aura Foundation Advisory Committee member 0xsmtg is [requesting](https://forum.aura.finance/t/temperature-check-aura-foundation-funding-proposal/104) a grant of 300,000 AURA to cover the costs of establishing and operating the Foundation for 2022 and 2023.

The Foundation is a Cayman Islands entity that will be responsible for engaging in legal contracts on behalf of the DAO. The Foundation will also has a subsidiary company in the BVI responsible for hosting the Aura front-end, developing the Aura blockchain application, and maintaining social media accounts and general operations.

## \[Temperature Check\] TribeDAO airdrop redirection bug fix

Core contributor Butterfield is [petitioning](https://forum.aura.finance/t/temperature-check-tribedao-airdrop-redirection-bug-fix/106) for a redirection of AURA from the treasury to an address operated by Tribe DAO.

Tribe contacted Aura with redirection requests for the initial airdrop to Balancer, Convex, and LobsterDAO community members, though due to a small bug with the token allocation script (limited in scope to this allocation alone), the redirection was only partially applied, leaving 10.6k AURA un-claimable by the DAO.

This proposal would lock the AURA from the treasury on behalf of an address operated by Tribe.

## \[Temperature Check\] Deepening AURA/ETH Liquidity With Hidden Hand Bribes From DAO

Redacted founder 0xSami [believes](https://forum.aura.finance/t/temperature-check-tribedao-airdrop-redirection-bug-fix/106) Aura will benefit from deeper liquidity to allow for market participants to more easily scale in and out of the ecosystem. With AURA market depth still below that of other top DeFi coins, AURA from the treasury, initially slated to be used as liquidity, can be redirected to Hidden Hand to simultaneously deepen liquidity while rewarding committed market participants.

This proposal should also help to bootstrap a bribing ecosystem on Hidden Hand by making it more competitive for market participants seeking liquidity.

## What Can You Do?

Stakeholders interested in these proposals should join the conversation [in Discord](https://t.co/SExgX0nbty) and on our [forum](https://forum.aura.finance/). These draft proposals should be live on [our Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/aurafinance.eth) later this week, starting Thursday, with voting ending on Sunday. Use your vlAURA to help determine the future of Aura.

If you’re not interested in voting, please feel free to delegate your vlAURA voting power to an individual or DAO that is aligned with your views. You can do so on the [Aura application’s “Lock” page](https://app.aura.finance/#/lock).

The future of Aura relies on stakeholders. Get involved today!

title: 以太坊合并在即，加密市场有哪些潜在机会？
body:
> Tim Beiko 预计，以太坊的共识算法迁移到 PoS 的合并升级实施日期为 9 月 19 日。

7 月 15 日，以太坊核心开发者 Tim Beiko 在电话会议上表示，预计以太坊的共识算法迁移到 PoS 的合并升级实施日期为 9 月 19 日，社区对其提出的时间表没有异议。

该消息公布后，crypto 市场围绕以太坊合并的叙事主线就变得清晰起来：

* 以太坊供给端发生重大变化，减产 90%，带动以太坊价格重估。
* 以太坊流动性质押协议地位极大提升。
* 以太坊矿机退出，部分算力迁移到其他网络。
* L2 Summer。

## ETH：走向「通缩」货币

根据 ultrasound.money 数据，目前以太坊每年发行量 5.5 M，每年通过 EIP1559 燃烧量 1.0 M，实际年通胀率为 3.7%。以太坊合并之后，以太坊每年发行量 0.6 M，相比当前减产 90%。假设燃烧量不变，则合并后的年通胀率为 - 0.3%。

![](https://img.foresightnews.pro/202207/5-1658278511461.png)

*https://ultrasound.money/*

以太坊产量降低，需求端却日益增多，从最早的 gas 费逐步扩展到 DeFi、NFT、DAO、NFT 等越来越多的使用场景，大概率带来新一轮的价格重估。

此外，ETH 成为全球性数字债券的叙事正在被更多的人接受。Bitmex 首席执行官 Arthur Hayes 在今年 4 月的一篇雄文《[Five Ducking Digits](https://www.defidaonews.com/article/6740494)》详细论述了 ETH 作为永续债券的巨大价值以及取代美元国债的可能。

根据以太坊研究员 Justin Drake）预计，在合并后，质押者可以得到大约 8-11.5% 的年化收益率。使用 5 年、10 年、20 年和 30 年的收益率作为对比，极端情况下即便以太坊下跌 60% 以上依然可以在 30 年后取得超过美国 30 年国债的收益率。

![](https://img.foresightnews.pro/202207/5-1658278553244.png)

## 以太坊流动性质押协议成为新时代的「矿工」

以太坊转 POS 之后，实体矿机将会逐步退出以太坊网络，ETH 将由流动性质押协议的节点运营商产出，它们将取代矿工成为以太坊 POS 网络的新主宰。

目前去中心化的以太坊流动性质押协议代表性项目有 Lido、SSV Network、StakeWise、Rocket Pool、Ankr network 等。其中，质押在 Lido 的 ETH 超过 400 万，占据压倒性优势。

![](https://img.foresightnews.pro/202207/5-1658278570832.png)

流动性质押协议的商业模式是收取质押者佣金。以 Lido 为例，会收取质押者奖励的 10%，其中 5% 由 Lido 收取，另外 5% 给 Lido 的节点运营者。按照目前的数据，Lido 每年获得的收益大约是 1500 万美元。

流动性质押协议通常都会发行治理代币，不过目前这些代币除了治理功能以及奖励节点运营商外，对于持有者来说没有更多赋能。就像 UNI 一样，Uniswap 是好项目，但收益一分钱也不会分给 UNI 持有者。

尽管如此，我们不能否认治理代币的战略意义，尤其是细分赛道的头部项目。资本已经蠢蠢欲动，Dragonfly Capital 正在从 Lido DAO 财库中购买 1000 万枚 LDO，价格是 1.45 美元。按照这个价格，LDO 完全稀释后的估值是 14.5 亿美元。

## 以太坊矿工出路

退出的实体矿机有两部分，一部分是 ASIC 矿机另一部分是 GPU 矿机，前者只能转而挖 ETC，后者可以挖其他 POW 币种。ETC 在最近被资本炒作就有这部分原因，然而由于 ETC 区块奖励相比以太坊低得太多，除非有资金愿意继续拉升价格，否则难以承接以太坊算力。

此外，这些 GPU 显卡还可以用于其他高性能算力业务，比如渲染、机器学习等。这些业务不像原先挖矿那样赚钱，估计不太会吸引资本注意。

## Layer2 再受资本追捧

在 POS 支持者看来，合并将使以太坊离分片链更近一步，Layer2 将受到分片的积极影响，吞吐量显著提高。

在二级市场，Layer2 项目代币表现亮眼，Polygon 代币 MATIC 以及 Optimism 代币 OP 近 7 日涨幅均在 50% 以上，大幅跑赢 BTC。

在经历了 Arbitrum 奥德赛活动暂停事件后，尽管部分用户对 Layer2 泼冷水，但 Layer2 项目依旧在发力。7 月 18 日，Polygon 宣布将于 7 月 21 日推出 zkEVM，可提供「EVM 等效」解决方案。7 月 19 日，Layer2 扩容方案 Scroll 宣布上线 pre-alpha 测试网。此外，StarkWare、zksync 等项目也在全速进展，L2 Summer 的可能性更大了。
