title: 人在低谷，不要打扰任何人
body:
人生的路途漫长又曲折，在前行的路上有美好风景，也有艰难险阻。生活总是这样，不能叫人处处都满意，但我们还要热情地活下去。所以，生而为人，要学会坦然的面对人生的所有风雨，处在高峰时不骄不躁，处在低谷时不卑不亢。

这一生，没有谁的人生一直都是平淡无奇的，一时的风光，并不代表一世的风光，一时的低谷，也不意味着你会一辈子处于低谷。每个人都会经历高潮，也会遇见低谷，这是命中注定的强求不得。

人在低谷时，往往感到疲倦不堪、失落无助，所以都渴望有人能拉自己一把，可世事难料，再深的情谊终究敌不过人情冷暖。自古以来，人心隔肚皮，有时候，平时亲密的朋友以及亲人，都不一定会给予你困难时的关怀。

人生的起起伏伏，不尽人意在所难免，你要做的，是坦然面对。这世间，没有几个能够真正同甘共苦的人，多的是虚情假意之人，少的是真情实意之人；常见的是锦上添花的人，而雪中送炭的人并不多见。 
 

人生就是如此，当你风光时门庭若市，落难时举步维艰。没有落难是总觉得自己处处是朋友，当跌人深渊时才明白人间冷暖，世态炎凉。所以人在低谷时，不要打扰任何人，因为这个时候，看你笑话的人多，鼓励你的人少，你只能靠自己。

人生无常，今天的你，也许意气风发，明天的你，很可能跌入谷底。要敢于面对人生路上的所有风雨，意气风发时，不向任何人炫耀，人在低谷时，不要去打扰任何人，这才是人生真正的大智慧。

在低谷时，别逢人就倾诉自己的不幸，因为这个世上每天真正感同身受的人也许你的不幸在别人看来根本就不重要，你越倾诉得越多，别人只会更加笑话你甚至远离你。人海漂流本就不易，每个人都有自己的选择，何苦用自己的不幸，去为别人呢。 
 

人在低谷时，要懂得自知，不要去打扰任何人，人生再苦再累，都要靠自己坚持，有些苦难，自己撑一撑也就过去了。有些事别人能帮你一时，也帮不了一世。所以你必须要懂得自救，调整好自己的心态，去努力改变，不要去打扰任何人。 
 

人在低谷的时，要学会沉默，你说法再多，别人也不一定会信，甚至还会把你所说的当作笑柄。这个世界，每个人都很忙，每个人都不容易，谁又会在乎你的感受呢？还不如保持沉默，不要去打扰任何人。

每一个漆黑的夜里，能够真正治愈孤独，帮助我们走出低谷的人，永远只是自己，人生中最害怕的不是孤独，而是习惯了别人的陪伴。一个人真正的强大，就是从不依赖任何人开始。没有任何人的依靠，依然能让自己的世界变得绚丽多彩。 
 

人在低谷时要懂得自救，努力做最好的自己。太过期望别人的帮助，反而让自己陷入痛苦之中，人生低谷并不可怕，可怕的是自己选择了放弃，面对困境选择了妥协。没有人的人生是一帆风顺的，总会经历一些磨难，低谷也是人生的一种考验，只要不放弃，坚持努力。总会有出头之日。

人在低谷时，才真正的看清人间冷暖，苦难时你的寻求帮助，未必能够得到别人的关怀。即便对方对你很是关心，也并不代表着他内心深处愿意为你分担痛苦。更何况谁也没有义务分担你的痛苦。唯有靠自己控制好情绪，调整心态。别把所以的希望寄托于他人。就自己独自承受吧，不要去打扰任何人。

人在低谷时，给自己勇气，把所有的困境当作新的起点。只要有足够的勇气，就没有战胜不了的困难，一个人真正的成长，往往在艰难险阻之中。现在的痛苦、无助，是为了以后的坚强和独自面对。没有人能够一直帮助你，你能信赖的只有自己。

**正如佛语有云：悲喜自渡，他人难悟。** 
 

人生的低谷，不可避免。面对着人生的不尽人意，你要相信，上天有它最好的安排。它给你关上了一扇门，便会为你开一扇窗。遇到低谷，便别再去打扰他人了。依靠自己，走出低谷，是一种态度，更是一种能力。你曾有过的经历，除了你自己之外，其他人无法感同身受。

人在低谷时，你要明白摆脱悲伤只能靠自己，只有你自己才最了解自己，如果遇到困难就把希望寄托于他是，那终究只会让自己跌入深渊。处在低谷时，不要期待有人搭救你一程，更不要卑微的依附于任何人，不打扰是最后的体面

人与人之间的关系，都需要建立在合理的界限感基础上。再亲近的人，也没有有义务一直做你的情绪垃圾桶。不要随意把伤疤揭开给别人看，别人看的是热闹，而痛的是自已。不要把自己的脆弱展现在他人面前，没有人能给你坚强。

title: 看涨情绪发酵 BTC出现领涨趋势 ETH价格上升 汇率回归正常 — 2022.7.20
body:
当前总结：最近24小时出现了大量的BTC链上地址的变化，交叉对比后得出的结论是更多的交易所在频繁的调动冷钱包的筹码以应对不断增加的提现行为，另外由于BTC价格的上涨OTC的数量相对之前的价格下降时期也有了很大的提升。尤其是昨天晚上开始在ETH的带动下BTC从跟涨转变为了领涨。

而目前的宏观情况依旧没有明显的变化，美股的走势在通胀见顶的预期下继续保持着上涨的趋势，尤其是美股闭盘后由于Netflix超出预期的表现使得纳指期货开盘就在上涨，这也预示着今天美股高开的可能性在增加，而美国的持续走强必然会引发更多的观望资金下场，对于风险产品都有利好的作用。

Twitter @Phyrex_Ni

截止到今天早晨八点的BTC持仓价格分布，昨天美股开盘前的数据就看到了大量的BTC在链上波动，通过对比数据后发现更多的可能还是来自于交易所的内部互转，而转眼到了今天早晨发现这种情况还在继续蔓延，甚至有了愈演愈烈的趋势，仿佛价格的上涨将BTC枯竭已久的流通性开始调动起来了。

相对于流通性枯竭容易引发暴涨暴跌的情况不同，流通性的兴盛代表了用户对于交易BTC的需求开始提升，经常会发生在价格变动或者情绪变动较大的时候，LUNA时期，40,000美金砸破30,000美金，以及30,000美金砸破20,000美金的时候都出现过阶段性的流通量增强，而这一次在价格上升的情况下出现。

则说明更多的投资者选择了“抄底”，而正是因为出现了大量的购买行为所以交易所需要较为频繁且大量的从冷钱包调取BTC来供应热钱包的提现，不但如此，非实体控制地址的BTC链上地址的变化截止到今天早晨八点也走出了近两三个月非极端价格变化下的高风。该数值里减去转移到交易所的抛压后可作为OTC的参考。

从两边的极端价格来看，远古持仓和高位套牢的BTC都发生了强烈的变化，两者的转移量之和已经超过了31,000枚BTC，不论有多少是用户所为或者是交易所的互转，该变化势必会大幅度影响长期持有者的数据，而长期持有者主动或被动的投降也是为市场增加了流通量，促进了换手率。

而24,000美金上方的亏损筹码的变化量也有了大量的提升，从昨天美股开盘后到今天早晨八点就已经有将近46,000枚BTC发生了地址变动，是近期数据变化的五倍以上。而相对大量筹码从各个价格集中到当前的争端价格，致使目前筑底价格的存量大大增持，从18,000美金到23,000美金之间的存量已经超过260万枚BTC。

从截止到今天早晨八点的BTC转移进入交易所的数据来看，抛压相对昨天同期确实是降低了，这也为上边判断的更多筹码的地址变化并非是抛压提供了证据，甚至可以从日线中发现，最近三周只要是BTC的价格上涨，必然会引发较大的抛压，而价格下跌时则正好相反。这恰恰说明了前期抄底的用户对于后市的看衰。

而从交易所转出提现的继续增加则代表了现在投资者的心态，出于对美股上涨以及对美国通胀见顶的预期，开始出现部分投资者倾向于目前的BTC已经是底部价格，尤其是ETH最近的大幅上涨使得大量踏空的小伙伴纷纷下注在BTC上，认为ETH的利好势必会带动BTC价格的提升，情况也确实在向这方面转变。

通过转入抛压和转出提现的细节数据分析，可以看到从昨天晚上18点到今天上午9点30分的数据中，BTC的抛压第一阶段主要抛压都是在晚上的23点左右，而随着价格的提升从今天上午6点开始就出现了较大的抛压，而在今天早晨8点半之后则出现了更大的抛压，也使得BTC的价格出现了短时的震荡。

而从交易所提现的数据中可以发现，相对于抛压来说，最近两天从晚上23点以后BTC从交易所的提现就几乎没有停过，虽然并未出现大量的一次性提现的情况，但高频小幅度的提现反而说明了相对于巨鲸，中小散户的购买欲望在提升。即便是到了美亚资金转换的时间，购买力依然保持着旺盛。

也正是因为购买力的强势以及对于BTC上涨的预期，交易所的存量经过一周的积累出现了下跌的迹象，这一方面说明了提前转入到交易所的筹码在逐步的离场，另一方面也表现出新转入的筹码可以实现快速的换手，所以从成交量来看，虽然在零手续作用下有对敲的成分，但持续上涨的价格还是让成交量有了较大拉升。

而从交易所的存量细节来看，强势的购买力与大量的抛压对比下，在美国的主力交易时间确实消耗了大量的BTC库存，但早晨8点30分新转入的大量抛压依然推高了交易所的库存，但从购买力的趋势来看目前亚洲的资金也有了被FOMO的倾向，而更加需要注意的仍然是北京时间15点左右的价格和成交量的变化。

和BTC相同的情况是ETH的转入近交易所的抛压也有了较大的下降，这也说明了更多的投资者已经认可的合并引发的ETH上涨的行情，并且将短期反弹的情绪拉长，开始期待9月份的合并前后的高点。从昨天下午18点到目前的数据来看，在今天早晨7点40分之前ETH的抛压已经有了大量减少的趋势。

而只有7点40分才出现了超过10万枚ETH的抛压。但仅仅间隔最多十分钟就可以看到有明显大量的提现从交易所转出，尤其是在早晨8点左右非常的大量且密集，也正是因为这个原因才使得提现的数据有了较大的提升，从此而看出ETH的购买力并没有随着BTC价格的上升而减弱，依然保持着强劲的情绪面。

受此影响交易所的ETH库存量也在持续的下降，尤其是今天终于将存量降低到了LUNA事件高峰存量的下方，也使得一直担心的ETH大量抛压得到缓解，如果宏观情况不出现更加恶劣变化的话，ETH很有可能会保持不错的走势直至合并，但正因为宏观情况是会变化，并且距离可能会变化的时间越来越近才需要更加谨慎。

购买力的强势必然是出自于资金量上升的推动，从截止到早晨八点的日线数据来看，转入交易所的USDT确实有了较大的提升，从细节数据来看主力依然是来自于欧洲时区的资金，而相对来说，今天凌晨5点和早晨8点40分左右新转入的资金正好也可以对应上相对时间即高的抛压，从而得知目前抄底的期望还是很高的。

相对于爆发的USDT来说，反而是昨天同期爆发的USDC今天又陷入了低潮，从细节数据中可以明显的看到USDC截止到目前又是不出工也不出力，只有零散的几笔稍大一些的资金量，而更多的时候则处于旁观的状态。

从最近48小时的BTC和ETH整体抛压以及USDT和USDC的转入交易所资金量来看，到今天早晨9点之前，资金量和购买力都处于相当旺盛的阶段，尤其是资金量的提升更使得BTC和ETH双双走高，而从目前的价格趋势来看，BTC也已经从跟涨转变成为了领涨。

而需要注意的是，当前的宏观情况并未得到好转，价格的上涨依然是在预期通胀到顶以及美联储加息75个基点的情况下。而尤其是后者，虽然现在市场已经接受了75个基点的加息，但并不代表加息后就不会对盘面造成影响，纵观美联储的每次加息都会提前对市场吹风，即便是在六月的噤声期内都会通过媒体来表达。

而每次“预期”后的加息，依然也都会引发较大规模的风险资产下跌，其原因还是因为美金指数的受到的影响，从而影响到美债，进一步影响到资金的选择，所以可以毫不客气的说，只要是加息就一定是利空，三月份第一次加息25个基点的时候就已经预示了随着利率的提升，必然会逐步的增加对市场资金的冲击。

而目前的美金指数因为欧元的上涨开始出现了下跌的情况，这也属于正常，毕竟上次DXY冲击109的时间也正是欧元和美元汇率跌破1:1的时候，所以随着欧元价值的回升，目前的下跌趋势也是正常的。但不正常的情况依然出现了，美债在殖利率普遍超过3.1%之后竟然没有出现明显的下跌，甚至短期美债收益超过了3.2%。

这情况说明了资金开始从美债撤离，但是从币市的三大稳定币市值来看，撤离的资金暂时还尚未进入到币市，如果能保持持续上涨的势头，相信离场的资金会有回归的时候。尤其是目前USDT的市值并没有在继续降低，而和USDC以及BUSD的汇率也回到了高于1:1的正常情况，对于USDT的担心可以暂时放下了。

差点忘记了，从美债的数据来看两年期的美债收益和十年期的美债收益倒挂再继续增大，目前已经超过了21个基点，持续扩大的倒挂从近美国近50年的历史数据来看，意味着经济衰退的到来。

从BTC的永续合约数据来看，资金费率虽然继续保持着持续的看多，甚至周内几乎都是看多的身影，但是目前的资金费率值距离行情的大幅逆转还有很大的差距，从近两年内的数据中可以看到，当前的资金费率只是处于比较“正常”的小幅看涨趋势。

title: 保持一种淡然，是人生最美好的姿态
body:
常言道：人心简单就快乐，生活知足就幸福。若能一切随他去，凡事只求问心无愧，得失荣辱皆不介怀，自然也能落得清闲自在。人生不如意十有八九，只要我们看得开，拿得起，放得下。便能让心灵获得释然，把心放平，人生就能获得快乐。

在这纷纷扰扰的世间，得失之间，难求完美。倘若你事事要求圆满，只会让你深陷计较的泥潭，无法自拔**。**保持一种淡然，是人生最美的姿态。人之所以会烦恼，痛苦和焦虑，就是因为心胸不够开阔，观念不够通达。

每个人的人生道路都不是一帆风顺的，路途中会遇到很多荆棘。失败时，无需垂头丧气，更无需号啕大哭。聪明的人不会给自己哭泣的时间，因为他们心中淡泊，所以他们不会在意得失，只会从失败中总结经验，调整方向重新出发。 
  
 

人心宽路就宽，心窄路就窄。能得到人们的尊崇的人，自然是不争的人。凡事能忍则忍，学会适应他人，对人友善，别人也能友善地对待你。帮助他人的人，也会获得他人的相助。在灯红酒绿的时代，如若凡事斤斤计较、争名夺利，只会让自己心身疲惫。人们烦恼时，总是怨天尤人，抱怨老天的不公，却从不从自身找根源。 
 

陶渊明就是拥有淡然的姿态，不管世事如何变迁，他总能心淡定依然。一切随心所愿，潇洒自安。不计较境遇的好坏，挥洒无数佳美诗篇。在滚滚红尘中，能让自己拥有一份淡淡的情愫，过着淡淡的闲情逸致生活，这就是人生悠然自得的美。 
 

看淡世事沧桑，内心安然无恙。人生活的就是心情。看淡了，心就释然了。不悲叹人生的聚散离合。一切随缘自在，不悲不喜，便是晴天。人就应具备淡然的心态，受挫时不消沉，顺达时不张狂。以洒脱娴静的心态，面对人生的潮起潮落。

如果是平庸的人，就会贪恋凡俗的奢华，享受舒适并安逸的生活，最终忘了赶路，而优秀的人，在沉默的时光中，忍受着平淡与寂寞，从不言苦。每一段时光，有他独特的美。只要你用心去品味，就能体会到它的灿烂与芳华。 
 

人生在世要心怀欢喜与感恩，常言说：“有人帮你是你的幸运，没人帮你是公正的命运。”学会坦然面对，这个世界没有人该为你做什么，生命本是自己的，得为自己负责任。人生必须要学会接受无常，放下执念。人生就是这样只有跌倒低谷时，必将是人生高峰的开始。 
 

**延参法师曾说：“人生就是一场修行，给你磨砺，让你变得坚强，给你别离，才会感知聚的喜悦，经历失去，让你懂得拥有时的珍惜，经历失意，让你学会从容的选择。”**岁月沉淀智慧，心性渐自淡泊。生命的最后，不是你活得繁花似锦，而你是洗尽铅华后的一颗丰盈平淡的心。

保 持一种淡然，是人生最美的姿态。人生有得意就有失意，失意时要懂得心宽。有成功就有失败。失败也并不可怕，只要能够坦然面对、努力拼搏，失意也会变成得意，失败也能带来成功。如能淡看得失，自会扭转命运。

漫漫人生，每个人都会遇到很多事情，当你想要放下的时候，其实也是重新的开始，尘世间，纵使千般相遇，万般苦恼，学会淡然面对，一切都会变得美好。生命中的许多东西是可遇不可求，刻意强求的得不到。做一个淡淡的人，不浮不躁，不争不抢，淡然地过着自己的生活，不要轰轰烈烈，只求一份安心。 
 

保持一种淡然，是人生最美丽的姿态**。**欣然每一个日出，释然每一个日落。过去的一切，苦也好，乐也罢，都已成为过去，放自己一条生路，也包容别人的过失。世上没有不平的事，只有不平的心。

有人说人生不过是一张清单，记得太清楚，往往只会徒增烦恼。别总想着掌控所有的事，随缘而行。人生往往你越执着什么，往往就容易失去什么，当你不在意的时候，反而一切变得顺顺利利。

人生路，你走过的每一步，不一定是正确的，但是一定要让自己心里踏实，不去讨好谁，更不要卑微了自己，努力活成自己想要的模样。不管外面的风风雨雨，惊涛骇浪。不管世事变幻沧海桑田。永远保持平静的生活彩，给生活一丝坦然，给生命一份真实。只要人甘于平淡，快乐就很容易。 
 

闲看庭前花开花落，漫随天外云卷云舒。当你看淡了无所谓的东西，才会发现更美好的东西在等着你。得不到的东西，别执念太深，这样只会让自己心累。带着智慧与慈悲面对生活中的人和事，亦会有不一样的收获。

人生是需要经受各种苦难的 ，当你觉得快忍不下去的时候，也许下一秒就是胜利的时候，苦痛和欢乐本就是结伴而行的，忍受得了苦难，欢乐也会执念于你。人生本就无常，如果没有了伤痛，生命也就少了炫彩和厚重。人生中的一些磨难是激励你前进的基石，而不是制约你灵魂的枷锁。

人生保持一种淡然，是最美好的姿态，看得透的人，处处是生机，看不透的人，处处是困境，以什么样的心境对待生活，生活就会以不一样的方式回报你

title: The snow in the northern country
body:
Most of the snow is fluttering in the Northland. To be precise, snow is a unique sight in the Northland in winter.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kIW8P9VHJJ-yW3jJtJpV_.png?height=266&width=448)

The snow in the northern country comes very early, and sometimes the snow can't wait to come as soon as the footsteps of autumn are firm. The snow at this time is generally very small and sporadic. Although people have not enjoyed the joy of the autumn harvest, they will not be annoyed by the snow that arrives early. After all, the northerners love snow.

The posture of the snowflakes flying is admirable. You see, the snowflakes are dancing gracefully in the air. The light dance is so graceful and unrestrained, who would not say it is beautiful. When the snow falls for a few hours, the little snowflakes are like stars in the sky. It is best to float such snow at night. Looking at the snow under the street lights from a distance, you will be amazed at how there is such a spectacular meteor shower. When the snow is heavy, people like it even more. The fluttering snowflakes are like white lotus petals and goose feathers. Some people compare it to a jade butterfly. The dancing posture is really similar. Some people likened it to white plum blossoms, "Snow is like plum blossoms, and plum blossoms are like snow. It's amazing whether it looks like it or not."

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Vqle_1cjJwtj-J5qrVK1x.png?height=266&width=473)

The most beautiful moment under the snow is still in the spring and March. The spring in the northern country is like a shy little girl. It is always late. There are no flowers and no grass. "Bai Xue thinks that the spring is late, so it wears the trees to make flying flowers." In the spring, the snow is generally heavy, and in an instant, everywhere is bright white, and the dead branches are suddenly decorated by snowflakes into trees full of white flowers. Just as the poem describes, "Suddenly the spring breeze comes in one night, thousands of trees and pears bloom." Children also love the snow at this time. The snow in spring is soft, snowmen are easy to form, and snowballs will roll very well. very big. The weather at this time is also much warmer than the winter, and it will be more enjoyable to play than the winter when you can't reach out. Those who like photography will not let go of this gratifying snow scene at this time, focus on each beautiful picture, and carve it into eternity.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/77fUjUyOayAYxbgmYeKYr.png?height=266&width=474)

I not only like the dance of snowflakes, but also its color. The whiteness of snow is unmatched by other whites, the whiteness of white clouds is not clear enough, the whiteness of catkins is slightly darker, and the whiteness of various white flowers is not eye-catching enough. I think only snow is worthy of the word "white". Under the sunlight, it is dazzling and white.

I think the northerners love snow not only because of the beauty of the snow, but also because of the spirit of not being afraid of the cold. Come". Can you say that northerners don't love snow?

title: 真正舒服的男女关系，不是秒回微信，而是有这几种感觉
body:
经常有咨询者说：男朋友经常很久才回信息，甚至不回信息，是不是男朋友不爱了。其实这种人是内心极其缺乏安全感的人，认为这个时代手机不离身的，信息不秒回，就是不爱自己了或者说心里有其他人了。

很多人为了能够让关系看起来更和谐，于是变得卑微的去讨好对方，这样只会弄得对方厌烦，也把自己弄得疲惫不堪。其实真正舒服的关系，不需要刻意去讨好，而是需要两个人懂得经营感情。也不需要为对方牺牲多少，最重要的是两个人在一起相处舒服。

两人的关系程度不应该以回信息的速度来衡量，如果能无时无刻回复你信息的人，不能说明他有多爱你，只能说明他很闲，空闲时间多的人，总能第一时间看到微信，才能秒回信息。 
 

每一段感情都会经历一段磨合期，总喜欢以回复消息的速度来判断他对方在乎自己的程度，成年人的生活都不容易，每个人都在为了生活而忙碌，所以需要彼此去体谅，如果因为忙碌而没有秒回信息闹矛盾的话，这样只会淡化彼此的感情。所以真正让人感到舒服的关系不是秒回，而是能让你有这几种感觉。

**自在且随意** 
 

感情里，总有一些人，爱得很卑微，和对方在一起总会变得小心翼翼，就算对方做些令自己反感的事情，也不敢去反驳，这样时间长了，爱得卑微的哪一个就会心累。其实，对方是否秒回你的微信不重要，重要的是你在他面前可以真实做自己。相处起来轻松随意，不需要刻意伪装成他喜欢的样子，更不需要装善解人意。真正爱你的人，一定会爱你最真实的样子，而不是你故作讨喜的样子。

**苏岑说：“如果一段感情，一个人，得让你耗费巨大精力来取悦，这已注定不是能陪你到最后的缘分了。”**

真正好的关系，彼此一定是自由的，在彼此面前可以无所顾忌地做自己，彼此包容。因为彼此真心相爱，所以即使对方有诸多的不完美，在彼此心中都是独一无二的。每个人都是多面性的，面对不同的人，会有不同的面孔，所以在不同的关系之间就会呈现不一样的面貌，在爱人的面前，做自在随意的自己。

真正舒服的关系是内心踏实，因为彼此信赖，所以也安心，因为信赖才能以身相托。无论任何时候，彼此都不会离弃对方。当对方身处泥潭是，也会及时伸以援手。

在爱情中，每个女人都希望拥有美好的爱情，更希望自己的另一半，能够给足自己安全感，而这份安全不是来自嘴上，应该来自对方的行动上。秒回信息，也许会让你内心有一种踏实感，但这不应该是你对爱情追求的唯一标准。 
 

真正的踏实感，即使对方没有及时回复信息，但你知道对方看得信息一定会回复，此时只是在忙碌而已。这种踏实感是，你们可以随时相互分享和表达，出现任何问题也能站在对方的角度去看待问题，能够彼此面对问题，一起寻求问题的答案。如今的社会，虚无缥缈的爱情随处可见，让人踏实可靠的关系确实难寻。

男女之间真正舒服的关系，就是可以在彼此面前随意表现自己，无论对方是什么样子也都能接纳。真正舒服的关系，会让彼此变得更好，爱情变得更幸福。

**彼此懂得** 
 

**张小娴说：”我们都是孤独的，直到我们遇到了另一个人，让我们知道人生是可以没那么孤独的。**

世上好的感情，虽然不一定是彼此心灵相通，但是都能够彼此懂得。其实有时候感到孤独，并不是对方不在身边，而是说了所以的事情，对方却不懂。彼此之间如果能够互相理解，彼此懂得，那关系也就会越来越融洽，相处起来也会心身愉快。

人生中能够遇见彼此懂得的人，是非常珍贵的。任何时候都无需多言，只要需要一个眼神，就知道对方需要什么。这样的关系，真的是可遇不可求，因为遇见爱很容易，遇见性也很容易，但是遇见了解和懂得，实在是件稀罕事。

**彼此有说不完的话** 
 

两个真心喜欢的人，相处起来有说不完的话，如果两个人在一起，经常处于无话可说的状态，那这段感情是长久不了的。如果两个人每次相处还需要想着聊些什么样的话题，这样的关系只会让两个人尴尬。

相处舒服的关系，必定有聊不完的话题，每次见面，都是想听听他不同的见解，而不是彼此玩自己的手机。沟通是人心与心之间的桥梁，如果不沟通，就不明白对方心里的真正需求，时间长了，内心的隔阂也就产生了。同时彼此也会觉得两个人在一起不适合，最后会是分道扬镳。

**彼此很默契** 
 

人海茫茫，遇见的人很多，但是能遇到一个灵魂真正相通的知己是见多不容易的事情，真正的灵魂伴侣，在一起是很默契的，举手投足之间，就能明白彼此的心意，处处也都很合拍，这才是最舒服的关系。 
 

如果彼此都没有感觉，更别说默契了，两个人总是处处唱反调，即使你说明事情对你很重要，对方也根本不重视，甚至在生活中根本走不到一块儿，连三观都不一致的两个人，相处起来一定会很累。 
 

只有跟有默契的人生活在一起，才能舒心快乐，才是真正灵魂相通的人，不管你做什么，对方都会支持你，两个人有共同的爱好，相处起来也会更融洽。

真正舒服的男女关系，要么是相濡以沫的恋人，要么是彼此懂得的知己，无论是哪种关系，都会让人产生一种自在感和踏实感。在这段关系中，你无需在意对方是否秒回信息，不要纠结对方是真心还是假意，也不会担心对方背叛你。这样的关系才是最舒服的，也是令人向往的，遇到了请珍惜。

title: Quest3 黄金猎人冒险快拿15个NFT技巧
body:
**Quest3** 是Hogwarts Labs孵化的 Web3 任务和事件平台（Showme是Hogwarts Labs孵化的第一个Web3应用）。 用户可以通过参与任务和活动来获得代币和 NFT 徽章。 Quest3致力于为GameFi、DAO、社区和项目提供各种无权限链上链下任务，持续惠及用户，繁荣传播生态，实现Web3原生价值传递于。

前天（7.18）刚上线，需要邀请码注册

主要面向社区早鸟用户（Early Bird role）,大V，项目方

我早先参加了社区活动拿到了早鸟身份，所以也是第一时间体验了，包括刚开启的“**黄金猎人冒险**”活动，下面就讲一下自己的一点小收获，可能对你快速集齐15个NFT有帮助。

**黄金猎人冒险活动介绍**

淘金者通过完成一系列活动任务集齐15个NFT

活动比较常规：普遍是关注推特，转推，进DC群。注册应用等基本是实时审核，个别需要截图的审核时间不定。

活动详情 [quest3.showme.fan/topic/661105359566737470](https://quest3.showme.fan/topic/661105359566737470)

活动时间：7月19日16:00至7月31日16:00（UTC+8）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dy83xOkaus4xnatDCjfvk.png?height=625&width=1366)

15个NFT需要完成90个任务才能全部集齐

这一听，好反人类，把用户当机器，频繁加DC群，退群，关推取关，会不会对账户不好等等

吐槽归吐槽，作为大热的web3任务平台

Quest3抢先版的第一个活动还是可以做一下，当然也有些**技巧(重点)**

**1、**所有任务完成之后都可以claim NFT，目前有BSC,ETH,Polygon链的，有知名项目如CyberConnect,ENS，也是很多没太听过的，**那NFT要不要挨个去Claim呢？**

**备注：**完成相应数量(总量90个)的任务解锁15个黄金猎人NFT的Claim(只需完成任务即可，任务相应的NFT是否claim,不要求)

所以大家懂了吧：只要完成任务即可在Claimable看到到，不要求Claimed

(当然最终是否要Claim ,自己决定，比如有些没发币的大项目，或者限量很少的，白名单NFT。。)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bZPbIsqEq1KUklynVTu21.png?height=625&width=1366)

**2**、所有50个项目都创建了自己的Communities，也就是进每个项目Community去根据任务要求完成，每个项目至少有1个任务

比如第一个**Mask Network**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oEFPTfabNEwHLAgtcbCFo.png?height=625&width=1366)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/G8nXV4gH8mLHb0MDig5Yq.png?height=625&width=1366)

**那么重点来了》**

Quest3自己的Community为第个项目也都创建了一个任务，任务要求无外乎都是关注某项目的推特，DC社群等。

它是不是跟上面有重合，那做1个项目实际你就至少完成2个任务

**所以每做完1个项目,不要急着去取关，退DC群等，要记得先去Quest3自己Community找到它再点一遍Verify**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jiy5ZqJa2aHBY67RfZRhM.png?height=625&width=1366)

**3、**大家关的DC，推特账户问题

90个任务要做40-50个项目，几乎每个都有关推，进DC群有关，DC如果没开会员只能进100个群，如果担心DC账户问题，建议不要集中一两天做，也不要进了立马退群，总共2周时间，自己把握好节奏。

**Claim 15个猎人NFT**

每个都有相应任务数量要求，达到之后可claim，这15个NFT才是这次活动的重心

目前我集了4个都Polygon链,后面应该也都是

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y2Fo5k8_b2w0ajGfbg2Gf.png?height=625&width=1366)

接下来，大家肝吧

title: Across保姆级空投教程
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_xp66pRXy7LySA-b-I7MC.png?height=116&width=735)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nnG3yKs4gD-ngfW8MF5PB.png?height=116&width=735)

项目介绍部分我们先跳过，直接先说空投怎么拿

## 如何获得空投

### 跨链部分（推荐）

和其他跨链桥项目一样，Across跨链时产生的bridge fee将会计算成能够获得的空投，目前是每消耗0.1美元的bridge fee获得1个代币，Across的代币名称是ACX。

同时Across存在一个推荐机制，这个推荐机制并不会减少被推荐人奖励。相反，在使用了推荐链接之后，被推荐人的奖励是增加的。

按照现有规则，被推荐人将获得25%的推荐奖励，也就是说在使用推荐链接之后，被推荐人可以获得一部分的返佣，参照规则，返佣比例受推荐人等级影响，最低获得百分之十返佣，最高则能获得百分之二十，看着不多，但是蚊子腿也是肉嘛。

[across.to?referrer=0x7d26A20479505d910aF9D32Bafb8CC754459bd7e](http://across.to?referrer=0x7d26A20479505d910aF9D32Bafb8CC754459bd7e)

这里放上我自己的推荐链接，用一下8求求辣！

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k3u_TJjL8c8rVjRo9egUL.png?height=1080&width=1920)

首先点击链接进入Across的网站，然后点击右上角的connect，就可以看到跨链的页面。

这里推荐from选Ethereum也就是我们熟悉的eth，to则选择另一个明牌空投的大热L2项目Arbitrum，在现在arb未来arb奥德赛开放的时候这样做也算是一鱼两吃。

跨链金额则推荐是越大越好，毕竟这个项目会有多少币都直接说出来了，没有后续的话小号浅刷一下，大金额在做好隔离的情况下主刷一两个地址就行。

另一个推荐用较大资金去刷的原因则是由于跨链桥整体费用是包括两个部分的，一般我们可能把他都说成是gas，但是事实上这里包括了gas fee和bridge fee两个部分。其中gas fee的花销是不加入代币获得的计算的，当金额较小的时候gas fee比重是很大的。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i1G5odR25B9zfjO9Eh_wL.png?height=754&width=502)

比如现在。我输入了跨链0.1eth，可以看到预测的gas fee是bridge fee的两倍左右，也就是说每个ACX的成本将会去到0.3美元左右，这显然有悖薅空投低成本高回报的精神。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YY4UigTZ8xLI9cNsF-vn5.png?height=776&width=531)

当我输入1eth时呢，可以看到预测的gas fee没有改变，而bridge fee变成了之前的十倍，可以说是相当显著地降低了成本，现在一个ACX的成本降到了大约0.12美元。结合上被推荐人获得的至少百分之十推荐费用，一个ACX的成本可以达到0.11美元，继续放大金额的话则可以降到0.1美元以下。

以上就是通过跨链获得空投的方式，这种方式是我比较推荐的，因为用这种方式可以一次至少交互两个项目，同时资金还可以利用arb的“低gas”去继续交互别的项目，这时不但去体验参与了其他项目还算是继续在arb上产生交互，达到相同的钱做更多的事的目的。

### 组建lp提供流动性（不推荐）

首先说明不推荐组建lp的原因，第一呢组建了lp就意味着这么多钱只能做这一个项目，资金利用率低；第二，Across提供的apy……低的有点可怜；第三，组建lp就意味着风险，比如被黑比如rug比如比如，只有想不到没有发生不了。

![当前apy高达1.97%预计的apy更是高达1.27%](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RnNu2shpX2rVSNVnYVdL5.png?height=846&width=523)

当然不推荐不代表我不写，虽然我自己没这么做吧就是，添加流动性的方式也很简单，同样是点击链接进入网站，点击右上角的小横杠，在冒出来的列表里选择第二个“pool”。

再放一遍链接

[across.to?referrer=0x7d26A20479505d910aF9D32Bafb8CC754459bd7e](http://across.to?referrer=0x7d26A20479505d910aF9D32Bafb8CC754459bd7e)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UHku_eApjHOeMxZJd2ig5.png?height=1080&width=1920)

然后就可以看到上图这个页面，然后在select pool页面选择一个就好，目前Across有eth、weth、usdc、dai、wbtc、boba（一个L2）、badger（经常听说但这是个嘛啊）、uma（Across尊敬的父亲的币）八个流动性池，apy基本上是大同小异，在我看的时候预计apy最高的是dai，高达2.76%。

选择好添加哪个币的流动性之后在下面Add页里选择amount，输入数量就好然后点击Add Liquidity。这样就算是完成了lp的组建

而需要移除lp时呢，就选择Remove，同样是输入数量，然后点击Remove liquidity。

以上呢就是获取空投的方式了，Across很早就宣布了自己的代币ACX，并且一直以来都可以通过跨链或组建lp提供流动性的方式去获得，但是之前并没有公布具体的领取时间，今天Across官方表示，ACX将于本年度三季度末开放领取，并且目前没有对空投领取作出限制（按照北京时间7/20上午十点半的规则）

同时Across宣布会有空投三倍获取的时间，但目前还没有公布具体时间，可以关注我的推特，我会（争取）在第一时间同步官方的通知

[https://twitter.com/zheningxiu](https://twitter.com/zheningxiu)

最后最后，由于psp、hop和op几个崽种珠玉在前，很难说现在这些发空投的项目会不会进行猎巫，我觉得小审核恐怕每个项目都要有，即使项目方没有进行审核的主观想法，投资人会不会有这种要求呢？所以在Across上面我觉得还是尽量少地址精撸，毕竟你都能看到自己拿多少ACX了，而且Across官方也有说明，放在下面了（两张图是同一段话上面是原文下面是翻译）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ygqMZEo6_xz8xgsLibmya.png?height=154&width=736)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZObEM0YvNrKD8sA8ft6ie.png?height=116&width=735)

以上就是全部内容了，如果用我的推荐链接的话可以去推特私信我获得来得过早的新年祝福，要是还能点个关注那真的人生圆满了，祝看到和没看到这个教程的家人们都早日实现梦想财富自由光吃不胖身体健康家庭幸福事业圆满。

title: Quest3 黄金猎人冒险快拿15个NFT技巧
body:
**Quest3** 是Hogwarts Labs孵化的 Web3 任务和事件平台（Showme是Hogwarts Labs孵化的第一个Web3应用）。 用户可以通过参与任务和活动来获得代币和 NFT 徽章。 Quest3致力于为GameFi、DAO、社区和项目提供各种无权限链上链下任务，持续惠及用户，繁荣传播生态，实现Web3原生价值传递于。

前天（7.18）刚上线，需要邀请码注册

主要面向社区早鸟用户（Early Bird role）,大V，项目方

我早先参加了社区活动拿到了早鸟身份，所以也是第一时间体验了，包括刚开启的“**黄金猎人冒险**”活动，下面就讲一下自己的一点小收获，可能对你快速集齐15个NFT有帮助。

**黄金猎人冒险活动介绍**

淘金者通过完成一系列活动任务集齐15个NFT

活动比较常规：普遍是关注推特，转推，进DC群。注册应用等基本是实时审核，个别需要截图的审核时间不定。

活动详情 [quest3.showme.fan/topic/661105359566737470](https://quest3.showme.fan/topic/661105359566737470)

活动时间：7月19日16:00至7月31日16:00（UTC+8）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dy83xOkaus4xnatDCjfvk.png?height=625&width=1366)

15个NFT需要完成90个任务才能全部集齐

这一听，好反人类，把用户当机器，频繁加DC群，退群，关推取关，会不会对账户不好等等

吐槽归吐槽，作为大热的web3任务平台

Quest3抢先版的第一个活动还是可以做一下，当然也有些**技巧(重点)**

**1、**所有任务完成之后都可以claim NFT，目前有BSC,ETH,Polygon链的，有知名项目如CyberConnect,ENS，也是很多没太听过的，**那NFT要不要挨个去Claim呢？**

**备注：**完成相应数量(总量90个)的任务解锁15个黄金猎人NFT的Claim(只需完成任务即可，任务相应的NFT是否claim,不要求)

所以大家懂了吧：只要完成任务即可在Claimable看到到，不要求Claimed

(当然最终是否要Claim ,自己决定，比如有些没发币的大项目，或者限量很少的，白名单NFT。。)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bZPbIsqEq1KUklynVTu21.png?height=625&width=1366)

**2**、所有50个项目都创建了自己的Communities，也就是进每个项目Community去根据任务要求完成，每个项目至少有1个任务

比如第一个**Mask Network**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oEFPTfabNEwHLAgtcbCFo.png?height=625&width=1366)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/G8nXV4gH8mLHb0MDig5Yq.png?height=625&width=1366)

**那么重点来了》**

Quest3自己的Community为第个项目也都创建了一个任务，任务要求无外乎都是关注某项目的推特，DC社群等。

它是不是跟上面有重合，那做1个项目实际你就至少完成2个任务

**所以每做完1个项目,不要急着去取关，退DC群等，要记得先去Quest3自己Community找到它再点一遍Verify**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jiy5ZqJa2aHBY67RfZRhM.png?height=625&width=1366)

**3、**大家关的DC，推特账户问题

90个任务要做40-50个项目，几乎每个都有关推，进DC群有关，DC如果没开会员只能进100个群，如果担心DC账户问题，建议不要集中一两天做，也不要进了立马退群，总共2周时间，自己把握好节奏。

**Claim 15个猎人NFT**

每个都有相应任务数量要求，达到之后可claim，这15个NFT才是这次活动的重心

目前我集了4个都Polygon链,后面应该也都是

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y2Fo5k8_b2w0ajGfbg2Gf.png?height=625&width=1366)

接下来，大家肝吧

………………………………………………………………………………………………………………

熊市只有不断抛弃偏见、学习，牛市来了才能捡钱。欢迎一起交流。

Discord：Touba#9264

title: NFTGo.io의 새로운 고래 추적 기능으로 최신 고래 민팅 활동 확인
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kJQBQJDugEOBkCgLlsxhK.png?height=444&width=1296)

NFTGo.io의 새로운 고래 추적 기능을 이용하면 NFT 고래와 함께 파도를 탈 수 있다.

현재 고래들이 NFT 세계를 휩쓸고 있다고 해도 과언이 아니다. 고래 보유자 수는 NFT 프로젝트를 평가하는 표준 지표다. 

고래는 NFT 프로젝트에 자신의 자본과 명성을 가져다준다. 고래가 가지고 있는 지렛대는 NFT 프로젝트의 성장을 가속화할 수 있다. NFTGo.io의 새로운 고래 추적 옵션은 NFT 고래의 민팅 활동을 분석한다.

## 심층 민팅 활동

데이터 중심 의사 결정을 내리려면 데이터에 대한 심층적인 정보를 알아야 한다. 민팅 섹션의 세부 사항은 고래의 민팅 활동에 대한 모든 세부 사항이 포함되어있다. 민팅 활동 데이터를 주관적으로 분석함으로써 다음 민팅 전략에 대한 실용적인 정보를 얻을 수 있다. 본사는 두 가지 관점에서 고래 민팅 활동을 추적한다.

* 컬렉션
* 고래들

## 컬렉션 관점

### 블루칩 민팅 경쟁에서 승리하는 것

고래 민팅 표는 NFT를 민팅한 고래의 수를 기준으로 NFT 프로젝트의 순위를 매긴다. 최소 시간 간격은 15분이다. 이를 통해 고래 민팅 활동에 대해 누구보다 먼저 알 수 있다! 시간 간격을 좁혀 시장에서 진행 중인 민팅 상활을 파악할 수 있다.

![데이터 출처: NFTGo.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XBC3KP8__x0r5uY97ptZ1.png?height=590&width=2458)

이는 지난 15분 동안의 데이터다. NFTGo.io는 민팅 트랜잭션에서 가장 중요한 데이터를 다음과 같은 7개로 정리하였다.

* 고래들
* 민팅된
* 민팅 볼륨
* 민터
* 토탈 가스
* 퍼스트 민트
* 포모 고래

위는 선택한 시간 범위 동안 해당 컬렉션에서 NFT를 민팅한 고래의 수가 표시된다. 이는 고래들 사이에서 컬렉션의 인기를 보여준다. 이는 고래의 렌즈를 통해 민팅을 할 수 있는 최신 프로젝트를 들여다보는 데 도움이 된다. 이러면 훌륭한 프로젝트를 조기에 발견할 가능성이 높아진다.

## 민팅된

이는 고래가 주조한 NFT의 합계를 나타낸다. 이는 고래들이 해당 프로젝트에 얼마나 많은 믿음을 가지고 있는지를 보여주는 지표다. 엄청난 양의 NFT를 민팅하면 고래들은 프로젝트에서 가장 높은 위험을 감수한다.

![데이터 출처: NFTGo.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LVAMvA4cmZRJBhMCSmMGI.png?height=450&width=1942)

지난 주 동안, 키퍼(Keepers)컬렉션에서 99개의 NFT가 오직 2마리의 고래에 의해 민팅되었다.

## 민팅 부피 및 민터

민팅 볼륨은 NFT 수집 가능 프로젝트와 에어드롭을 구분한다. 해당 숫자는 ETH에서 고래가 만든 거래량(거래 활동)의 합이다.

![데이터 출처: NFTGo.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QH__FcK_NRhEdnyWw6zmv.png?height=594&width=1762)

지난 24시간 동안 대부분의 볼륨이 두드펑크(DoodPunk)로 흘러갔다. 고래가 돈을 쓰는 두 번째 프로젝트는 유니스와프 포지션(Uniswap in positions)이다.

## 토탈 가스 및 퍼스트 민트

![데이터 출처: NFTGo.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Vb6t4ePCaHFiv_SMau_07.png?height=984&width=1768)

위의 표는 지난 24시간 동안의 최신 고래 민팅 활동을 보여준다. 해당 자료는 대부분의 고래들이 fees.wtf컬렉션을 구입하고 있음을 보여준다. 해당 고래들은 지난 24시간 동안 해당 컬렉션을 민팅하는 데 총 369 ETH(약 120만 달러)를 가스비로 사용했다. 이 가스 요금은 총 29개의 NFT를 발행하여 발생하였다. NFT는 해당 컬렉션에 대해 자유롭게 청구할 수 있기 때문에 고래가 만든 물량은 없다. 3,432명 이상의 사람들이 해당 NFT 에어드롭 받았다고 했다!

## 포모

때때로 인간의 심리는 엄격한 분석과 데이터 도구에 방해가 된다. 비록 수학이 추정에 도움이 되긴 하지만, 궁극적인 답이 되지는 않는다. 그리하여 NFTGo.io는 NFT 프로젝트에서 FOMO를 발견할 수 있는 솔루션을 제공하고자 한다. 누락에 대한 두려움(일명 FOMO)은 한 사람이 NFT 민팅을 하게 되는 강력한 이유 중 하나다. 고래들은 계속해서 인기 있는 NFT 프로젝트를 찾고 있고 그들은 새로운 블루칩 NFT에 대한 투자를 놓치고 싶어하지 않는다. 프로젝트의 인기는 시간이 지남에 따라 가치가 상승할 가능성을 높인다. 비록 온체인 데이터가 직접적으로 FOMO 신호를 주지는 않지만, 그를 통해 분석하고 추정할 수 있는 수치를 준다.

NFTGo.io에서는 모든 프로젝트를 아래와 같은 3가지 수준으로 FOMO를 고려한다.

* 없음
* 낮음
* 높은

최근 15분 동안의 민팅 활동을 기준으로 프로젝트를 분류한다. 아래와 같은 숫자를 기준으로 FOMO의 순위를 분류한다. 0 -> 없음 1 - 50 -> 낮음 51 - 100 -> 중간 100 + -> 높음

## 고래의 관점

상위 고래 민터 표는 각 고래의 조폐 활동 수를 기준으로 한다. 가장 많거나 가장 적은 양의 민팅 작업을 기준으로 데이터를 정렬할 수 있다.

### 다양화

어떤 투자 전략을 분석하든 다각화를 고려하는 것은 가장 좋은 방법다. NFTGo.io는 고래가 민팅 활동을 일으킨 컬렉션의 수를 알려준다. 이를 통해 그들의 새로운 NFT가 시장 전반에 걸쳐 얼마나 다양한지를 쉽게 발견할 수 있다.

![데이터 출처: NFTGo.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3Nb4orF5nU9Kphgm4FR21.png?height=490&width=2038)

지난 24시간 동안, 해당 주소는 가장 다양한 주조 포트폴리오를 가지고 있었다. 그들은 5개의 컬렉션에 걸쳐 49개의 NFT를 민팅하기 위해 총 5.45 ETH 가스를 사용했다.

민팅 볼륨 \[형식 누락된 것으로 예상됨\]

볼륨은 민팅 옵션을 분석할 때 고려해야 할 중요한 지표다. 고래가 민팅 목적으로 지출한 ETH의 총량을 수집하여 시장 역사상 가장 많은 금액과 비교한다.

![데이터 출처: NFTGo.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/T0_V6BdpilzgtPRDfm7xJ.png?height=490&width=1654)

지난 달 동안 해당 주소는 74개의 NFT를 구매했으며 그 금액은 300ETH($992.5)를 초과했다.

### 토탈 가스⛽

고래 또한 기름값이 잔인하다는 것을 알고 있다. 그들은 가스 전쟁에서 이기기 위해 기꺼이 더 많은 가스 요금을 지불하고 정말 원한다면 NFT를 민팅한다. 이는 고래에게 NFT를 홀드하는 것이 얼마나 중요한지를 보여준다. 여기서 첫 번째 주소가 15 ETH 이상의 가스 요금을 지불했으며 실제 NFT에 4 ETH만 지출한 것을 볼 수 있다. 대조적으로, 2위는 거의 3배 더 많이 소비했다.

![데이터 출처: NFTGo.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pnD0xHBs742jg7k3JJtNU.png?height=378&width=1588)

### 라스트 민트 및 민트

마지막 두 열은 최근 민팅 활동과 선택한 기간 동안 민팅한 NFT 수에 대한 자세한 정보를 제공한다.

## 어떻게 하면 성공할 수 있는가?

전략적으로 민팅 활동에 대한 결정을 내리는 것은 막대한 수익을 창출할 수 있다. 오늘날 우리가 알고 있는 모든 NFT는 처음에는 만탕을 위한 새로운 NFT 컬렉션에 불과했다. 크립토펑크 같은 것들 중 일부는 민팅이 자유롭다. NFTGo.io의 새로운 고래 추적 기능은 고래의 민팅 활동을 분석하기 위한 포괄적인 도구다.

title: a16z青睐的新公链项目Aptos，有什么秘密？
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ix-PkW2IxuG3NvchDEbNN.png?height=183&width=275)

**1. 前言-从a16z说起** 

1\.01 Andreessen Horowitz（a16z）成立于 2009 年，成功投资了包括 Facebook、Groupon、Skype、Twitter、Zynga、Foursquare 在内的互联网公司。2013 年，a16z 领投了 Coinbase 的 2500 万美元 B 轮融资，正式开启了其在 Web3 行业的投资布局。

1\.02 据公开信息统计，a16z 投资的 Web3 领域公司或项目数量超过了 90 个，包括了公链、Layer 2、DeFi、NFT、游戏、元宇宙等几乎所有的 Web3 赛道。在公链赛道，其投资的7个项目，如Solana、Avalanche、Near等已成为Web3世界中的头部项目。

1\.03 目前，a16z 领投了公链项目Aptos于 2022 年 3 月完成的 2 亿美元融资，让我们来一览这个宣称希望成为"人民"公链的Aptos（Aptos在奥龙尼语中意为“人民”，与其愿景相呼应）。

![aptos生态图谱](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vxWjDI632ldEU9JX0AKcg.png?height=4096&width=1421)

**2. 项目背景** 

2\.01 Aptos作为Layer1区块链，其愿景是为所有人构建更可靠和可扩展的区块链。 创始团队强大，Aptos是由Meta（原 Facebook）稳定币项目 Diem 前团队成员发起 融资成就非凡，投资方包括a16z、Binance Labs、Multicoin Capital、FTX Ventures、Coinbase Ventures等顶级VC

![币安为aptos官宣](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2tw5C5xFtBsS9-kjaDj5C.png?height=2200&width=1242)

2\.02 告别Web2，拥抱Web3：当创始团队还在Diem工作时，由于隶属于Meta公司，团队成员总是被Web2大公司的官僚主义和繁文缛节所困扰；离开Web2，创立Web3项目Aptos之后，团队的创新思维不再受到限制，而是在Web3的世界里敢想敢为

**3. 项目特性** 

3\.01 新的区块链语言：Diem团队开发了Move区块链语言，Aptos继承了Diem的衣钵，也由Move语言构建；Move语言相较于ETH的Solidity语言具备更强安全性和可靠性，同时Aptos计划兼容Solidity，让更多的ETH区块链开发者能更容易的迁移到Aptos中来。

3\.02 更强的容错机制：在过去的三年中，团队对Aptos的共识机制-拜占庭容错 (BFT)进行了四次迭代，提升了交易确认速度和这个区块链的稳定性，在三分之一的验证结点故障时，仍能保证稳定运行。

3\.03 更高效的可扩展性：Aptos设置了有效的机制，来方便社区投票和快速执行升级，在过去几年中成功执行了多次重大升级而没有停机，确保部署安全可靠，从而大大地提高了Aptos的迭代速度。在日新月异的Web3世界中，占据了时间上的先机。

3\.04 密钥更换：为防止账户私钥被盗而导致资金损失，Aptos中设置了帐户密钥恢复和轮换协议，支持任何帐户轮换其私钥。同时为了防止密钥丢失，Aptos 还在开发可直接集成到区块链账户模型中的密钥恢复新技术。

3\.05 多币种gas：Aptos可以使用多币种来支付gas，从而避免了钱包中只有一种非gas代币，而导致无法进行交易的尴尬。其原理为将其他代币按链上汇率标准化为Aptos Coin，然后根据标准化后的gas价格对所有交易进行排序并确认需执行的交易。

3\.06 举例说明如下： 小白发送了一笔交易， gas_price 是 10， gas_currency 是 “小白Coins” ，小蓝在相同时间也发送了一笔交易，gas_price 是 20，gas_currency 是 “小蓝Coins”

3\.7 若此时链上“小白Coins”对 Aptos Coins 的汇率是 2.1，而链上“小蓝Coins”对 Aptos Coins 的汇率是 1，则小白的交易标准化 gas 价格是 10 \* 2.1 = 21 ，小蓝的交易标准化 gas 价格是 20 \* 1 = 20 ，因此小白付出的gas高于小蓝，小白的交易将排在前面进行确认。

**4.比较优势**

4\.01更快更强：近期有机构对各大公链的速度进行了测试，结果如下图所示。可以发现Aptos的理论最大TPS达到了160k超过了Solana的120k，也远远高于其他项目的TPS，同时Aptos交易确认时间（Time to finality）小于1s，优于其他公链。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-I0ErlIwZA0mWvWQCJH51.png?height=562&width=816)

**5. Aptos公链生态建设** 

5\.01 野心勃勃的计划：在过去几个月里，Aptos 与数百名开发商、品牌和公司进行了沟通，这些机构计划在 Aptos 上构建下一代社交媒体平台、NFT 、Web3 游戏、媒体和娱乐业务、支付、DeFi 集成的金融科技产品等。

5\.02 在Aptosde 社区中已有很多著名的公司，如 Anchorage、Binance、Blockorus、Coinbase、Livepeer、Moonclave、Paxos、Paymagic、Rarible 和 Streaming Fast，这些公司的开发人员已经在 Devnet（开发者测试网）上提供反馈和贡献代码.

5\.03 Pontem：部署在Aptos上的第一个DEX（去中心化交易所），使用Move语言开发，目前已有将近5万的独立用户.

**6.路线图规划**

* 2022年第一季度（3月15日）—开发者测试网启动（已完成）
* 2022年第二季度——激励性的测试网启动（已接近尾声）
* 2022年第三季度 - 主网启动（待启动）
* 2022年Q4-2023年Q1 - 在Aptos主网部署下一个主要版本

**7. 不可能三角-去中心化、安全性、速度**

7\.01 目前整个公链的发展都受到不可能三角的限制，各类区块链模型无论采用哪种共识机制来决定新区块的生成方式，都难以同时兼顾去中心化、安全、速度这3项要求，只能三者取其二。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CKie22W6uHN6hzewPD8fZ.png?height=636&width=900)

7\.02 Aptos在目前的测试网上有100个验证结点，相较于ETH的将近6000个验证结点，去中心化程度不够，但呼应官方一直宣传的安全性和高速度，去中心化程度不够也是理所当然

**8.面临诉讼**

Aptos创始人Mo Shaikh目前面临Glazer家族成员Shari Glazer 10亿美元的诉讼，指控Shaikh 违反协议，阳奉阴违寻求风险投资，秘密成立新的公司（Matonee Inc.）并且通过欺诈性行为剥夺了Glazer在Venture中的合法所有权，要求其做出相应赔偿，若诉讼案成立则会对Aptos的前程蒙上一层阴影。

**9.总结**

Aptos具备区块链从业经验丰富的创始团队，作为a16z、Binance等多家顶级VC看好的L1公链项目，同时Aptos的发展前景看起来无疑是一片光明，但由于目前尚处于测试网阶段，主网上线后表现如何还需进一步观察，同时还面临着诉讼的风险，这也对Aptos的发展埋下了隐患。

title: ‘Stray’ — the videogame where you play as a cat — is breaking the internet
body:
The cat is out of the bag — and probably all over your Twitter feed. 

“Stray,” a new videogame for Sony’s [SONY, +3.42%](https://www.marketwatch.com/investing/stock/SONY?mod=MW_story_quote) PlayStation and Microsoft [MSFT, +2.08%](https://www.marketwatch.com/investing/stock/MSFT?mod=MW_story_quote) Windows, lets players explore a subterranean, cyberpunk city as ginger tabby that’s trying to claw its way back to its family. 

The $29.99 third-person platform adventure and puzzle game — from French development studio BlueTwelve, and published by Annapurna Interactive — has drawn plenty of hype since it was first teased during the 2020 PS5 reveal event. (A newer trailer released on June 2 has already been viewed more than 1.7 million times on PlayStation’s YouTube account.) 

And now the long awaited “cat game” is here — and players and their feline friends are already obsessed. 

Some mild spoilers follow: The gist of the game is that you play a lost, stray cat navigating a subterranean city populated by robots. The goal is to get back to the surface world, where your feline friends live. Your stray soon teams up with a sentient drone named B12 (who can talk to the humanoid robots for your cat character), and the two of you explore the city and solve puzzles to find your way home, discovering what happened to all of the humans along the way — while also avoiding hungry monsters who want to eat this cute kitty up almost as much as the players do.

title: Optimism | Governance Fund Cycle 3 Proposals
body:
## TL;DR:

* Voting cycle 3 (or round two Phase 1 of the Optimism Governance Fund) concludes on Jul 20, 2022. Nine proposers requested \~4.1m $OP tokens worth \~$3.1m USD at time of drafting this post
* As an Optimism delegate, I voted **FOR** four proposals and **AGAINST** five. For this round of proposals, I’ve beta tested a scorecard methodology to evaluating proposals (explained within this post)
* Although not relevant to the Governance Fund, I want to support the Optimism ecosystem due to what I perceive to be a sound “one commandment” commitment to Retroactive Public Goods Funding (RPGF)

Optimism governance voting takes place on [Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/opcollective.eth), governance overview information is organized on [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/overview), and proposal submission and feedback takes place on [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/).

If I got anything wrong or for anyone who would like to collaborate to improve or influence my governance approach as an Optimism delegate, reply to this companion [TWEET](https://twitter.com/rasmuky/status/1549412642607038464?s=20&t=NjMvOFJ4ZkkPsxZsr3qhZg).


---

## Optimism token and governance fund overview

### Why Optimism for me

My current favored L1 nation is Ethereum and I’m in the process of making Optimism my L2 neighborhood. I am drawn to the Optimism commitment to maximize [Retroactive Public Goods Funding](https://medium.com/ethereum-optimism/retroactive-public-goods-funding-33c9b7d00f0c) (RPGF). If Optimism is able to maximize “good” MEV capture and remain economically and technically competitive to other chains, I think that would be a great outcome for the network and ecosystem writ large and create public goods for the masses. Providing economic incentives to build public goods should support mass adoption and long-term use of the ecosystem.

I plan to spend more time with Arbirtrum, Polygon, and the zero knowledge L2’s coming online soon, but Optimism appears to be committed to a “[one commandment](https://thenetworkstate.com/the-one-commandment)” (a la the [Network State](https://thenetworkstate.com/preamble)) focus on RPFG. I like RPGF as a single commandment.

I also plan to dive deeper into Cosmos and it’s app chain / IPFS ecosystem at a future date as it sounds like there are a lot of interesting possibilities with that architecture as well.

### The Optimism token allocation

The Optimism token dropped end of April 2022 and is broken down as follows:

![https://community.optimism.io/docs/governance/allocations/#](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w7CP_dEbs1bNmloFWnfvy.jpeg?height=1440&width=2880&&&size=medium)

For the purposes of this post, I’ll focus on the Governance Fund (GF, 5.4% slice) under the Ecosystem Fund (25% slice) above. Live proposals on Boardroom and Discourse all relate to phase one, which ends in two days (Jul 20, 2022).

## Governance fund phase 1 overview

### General guidance

There is a good overview of the GF and more specifically Phase 1 [HERE](https://community.optimism.io/docs/governance/gov-fund/). The highlights are:

* Any project launched on Optimism is eligible to submit a proposal
* Proposals must include a plan for how the tokens will incentivize growth on Optimism
* Although not a strict requirement, the Optimism Foundation recommends that each project submitting a Governance Fund proposal include a commitment to match OP token incentives with their own project incentives
* Proposals are reviewed and approved by the Token House (OP holders, or their delegates)
* When a project gets a proposal approved, they are still eligible to apply for further proposals
  * Recommendation is that projects distribute their initial allocation of tokens before requesting further tokens
  * Projects are also encouraged to reference data from the success of their initial distribution to strengthen their case in future proposals

### Amount of tokens requested by proposers

Below are two tables I created to frame the magnitude of the nine proposals in relation to the total governance fund:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tf1o1GXn8GjiNdH3VEKgC.png?height=2880&width=5760&size=medium)

Assuming I’ve interpreted the various governance docs correctly, phase 1 proposals currently up for vote (cycle 3) represent 1.7% of the total GF (for a total of \~$3.1m USD at time of drafting on Jul 18th, 2022). Assuming Phase 0 was fully allocated to the cap, there is still 65.2% of the GF to allocate in future phase 1 cycles.

### Overview of delegators and the token house

The token house is comprised of all $OP token delegates. Holders of $OP = delegates if the holder agrees to the responsibility of acting as a delegate and participating in governance. If a holder of $OP chooses to not participate in governance, that holder may delegate their tokens to a proxy delegate. I have self delegated and plan to participate in governance going forward.

Here is an overview of how the token house fits into the broad Optimism governance structure, for reference:

![https://community.optimism.io/docs/governance/](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/G1U4xGL_l3jcVPitYDizm.jpeg?height=822&width=1216)

## Rasmuky’s proposal evaluation scorecard approach

### Scorecard overview

In an attempt to evaluate proposals in a consistent way and in line with guidance provided by the Optimism core team, I developed a basic scorecard:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fPSu_ty1wSBs-7HfP3P2m.png?height=284&width=444)

I’ll iterate on the approach for future processes, but conceptually:

* Factors developed based on guidance from Optimism Collective, reading through comments on Discourse from other delegates, and considering factors that matter to me personally or that I feel are positive for the network
* Weights were subjectively developed and will be reevaluated for future phases or future proposals
* I plan to rank each factor on a 0-10 scale, with a **hurdle of 5.0** for a **FOR** vote.
* For parameters which appear more binary (i.e., project on Optimism)
  * No will render as 0
  * Yes as 5 so as to not negatively impact hurdle score of 5.0
  * If it’s obvious the project is heavily invested in Optimism, can scale up from 5 to as high as 10
* The respective weights will be applied to the 0-10 score and then aggregated to produce a weighted score

All of this is very subjective, but this approach is likely less subjective than just saying “I like the project, yes vote from me.”

### Expected evolution of scorecard process

I only recently began to immerse in the Optimism governance process, so this scorecard and broad approach will be refined for future phases or proposal cohorts. Ideally, I would have spent more time engaging on Discourse with the proposers for this tranche, but alas.

With more time to research and engage more with proposers, I would likely include other factors like protocol decentralization, open source codebase, chain of custody of digital assets, approach / emphasis on security, evaluation of grant size request relative to other historical proposals, robust assessment / diligence of on chain metrics (across all chains), etc.

The diligence of on chain metrics is factor and value add to the Optimistic Collective I’m most excited about. I believe I could provide an objective analysis of proposer protocol use and growth which all Optimism delegates could use for their proposal evaluation process. Data and analytics diligence is what I currently do in Web2, so I’m very comfortable objectively analyzing data, engaging with management teams to stress test my interpretations, and then packaging outputs for intuitive interpretation by a wide range of user profiles.

If other delegates choose to deploy a scorecard style approach, ideally delegates would decide the parameters that are most important to them, develop their own weights, etc. A diverse set of approaches to governance is healthy, this is simply the approach I chose for this round.

## Overview of phase 1 proposal evaluations

As I was late to the party for this round of proposals, I’ll be brief. Also, at snapshot I only held 1.6k $OP tokens and had none delegated to me, so no vote I cast will move the needle on proposals in this round.

I expect to increase my future phase vote impact (i) as I accumulate my own $OP stake and (ii) by earning $OP token holders support as a prudent and thoughtful delegate. [DM me on Twitter](https://twitter.com/rasmuky) if you would like to discuss delegating to me.

### Proposal A | Superfluid

[Superfluid](https://www.superfluid.finance/home) is a protocol which enables payment streaming (e.g., high frequency settlement, like salary payments every day). I voted **FOR** for this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IiGpH0RR2DRXSQIoARcp_.png?height=282&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Plan for how tokens will incentivize growth (+)** - Products like Superfluid tend to be very sticky once organizations / people begin to program payments or streams. I’m not sure of the adoption or competitor set, but relative to more mercenary capital / temporary use cases, I think there is more potential for long-term Optimism adoption and growth with Superfliud
* **Transparency of proposer to end recipient (+/-)** - A portion of $OP tokens will be utilized to subsidize fees to set up and execute streams, which should be pretty easy to observe and directly benefit Optimism. A separate portion will be allocated to developers to support migration of treasuries and other activities to Optimism. It would be very challenging to validate or verify that use of GF grant is to the benefit of the Optimism network in the case of developer compensation (the developer could have been working on a different chain)
* **Money on chain / alternative to TradFi (+)** - I’m a big believer that creating boring use cases to lure retail users away from TradFi banks and get them on chain will drive adoption. I don’t think I’ve ever met someone who genuinely likes their retail bank, huge opportunity. Creating set it and forget it programmed payments and receipts platform which would improve money fluidity and access is in line with this concept

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHg2MjVlNzBkY2ZmMzViZTA0Mjc3ODY4NGQ2NmNiM2UyNGVmZDM1YmRjNDIyMmQyNjMwNDdhZmQyNjk5MTg4ZmI2) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-superfluid/2314).

### Proposal B | Kromatika

[Kromatika](https://kromatika.finance/) is a swap DEX with an optimized approach to limit orders. I voted **FOR** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/o61ULQ_SoS1ZYLp30yKNO.png?height=283&width=551)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism** - I do think that limit orders are a relatively basic building block of finance and markets. I haven’t used the product (I will soon), but if the platform works well I can see it being a sticky protocol
* **Rewards / incentives transparency (+/-)** - Marketing and especially influencer marketing tends to carry a negative connotation in Web3, but I think it is important and leveraging high quality educational influencer material is a good choice. While the ecosystem is very small, organic growth based on word of mouth is achievable. As the ecosystem continues to grow, I think fluency in marketing will be very important. However, I don’t have a clear view of how influencer marketing spend or early user drops will be traced into actions on Optimism
* **Money on chain alternative to TradFi** - As mentioned, limit orders is a relatively basic use case so I suspect many retail users would benefit from Kromatika. If I thought more average retail TradFi users were actively trading with limit orders this factor would have carried more weight

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgwMzdlNDE0OGNmOGZlYjcwNmMwMjMxMDhlMWM4MmY5ZDc2NWE2YzYyMTdkY2VmOWFlMzY3YTY3MjY4MzgyMGU5) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-kromatika/2650/11).

### Proposal C | Hundred Finance

[Hundred Finance](https://hundred.finance/) is a lend borrow protocol for DeFi. I voted **FOR** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yJqqJf8EbN26c4jTp6hA0.png?height=283&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism (-)** - Incentives appear to be majority based on yield farming emissions which generally attracts mercenary capital
* **Proposer funded incentives (+)** - Proposer committed to substantial co-incentives to generate attractive yields for users. Ranges provided where quite wide, so some refinement or monitoring of co-incentives would be a good check
* **New to Optimism (+)** - Slight positive based on cross chain lend / borrow activity as that sounds like a unique product to me. Unclear how that may impact activity on chain (is cross chain positive for Optimism or not?), but sounds interesting to test

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHhlM2Y0NzEzY2ExZGNmZThlOWUzZTNmNTk1NjBlMjg4OTVhODg5NWI1NTljYzFmMjMzMWNhNDAxY2U1MTEyNWY0) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-hundred-finance/2733).

### Proposal D | Biconomy

[Biconomy](https://www.biconomy.com/) appears to be a diversified Web3 / Crypto exchange and dApp creator. The proposal appears to center around [Hyphen](https://www.biconomy.io/hyphen-page) (bridge protocol) and [Gasless](https://www.biconomy.io/gasless-page) (partner protocol test subsidizer).  I voted **FOR** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3dQoYtC9RqWDnQLulvIdS.png?height=283&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism (+)** - Liquidity incentives to support bridging to Optimism and gasless incentives to incentivize testing of dApps on Optimism has potential to be a tailwind for growth. Also, the fact that the Biconomy is open to collaborating with the token house to select worthy dApps is a good gesture as well
* **Proposer match (+/-)** - Score is simply the match ratio as stipulated by the proposer
* **New product / demand need (+)** - The Gasless product is very versatile in that it can incent users to migrate to Optimism to utilize a wide variety of dApps, presumably many of which would be new to the Optimism network

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgyYTgzZDA0OTA1NDI4NWNjN2JiOWM4OTU5OWQ0NjkwNDViNzZkMjlkN2FjZTk5MjhhYjJiMDViZDAxYTcyYWVk) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-biconomy/2880).

### Proposal E | Dope Wars

[Dope Wars](https://dopewars.gg/) is an MMO (massively multiplayer online) game in line with Grand Theft Auto. This is not an area of the ecosystem which I’m fluent in, though Dope Wars presents as committed to making Optimism it’s home base. I voted **AGAINST**, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-mC5bzOopZ-n_L0hTPtjD.png?height=283&width=550)

Highlights:

* **New product / additional demand (+)** - Blockchain gaming is not prevalent on Optimism to my knowledge, but can definitely drive a lot of volume if the respective game achieves solid traction
* **incentives / rewards transparency (-)** - A portion of the incentives are slated to go into the project treasury, which is likely to be very opaque and hard to correlate to growth on Optimism

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHhhNDk3YWYxMWFiMzFlNjM4ZDM4YmNmNmQ1NzY4OWE1NzI5YmY2NmVlMWMzZmQ4OWYyMGJjZDdkOWU2ZmE2ZDRi) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-dope-wars/2722).

### Proposal F | Infinity Wallet

[Infinity Wallet](https://infinitywallet.io/) is a multi-chain desktop focused crypto wallet with robust native integrations with various dApps. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/S0NPKuOZW6k-_vGXgBf9R.png?height=282&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism (+)** - A dApp native integration approach could be very sticky if the UI / UX is positive. I have not used the product, but do see value in the concept
* **New product (-)** - There are multiple wallets operational on Optimism. The native dApp integration sounds interesting, but I’m underwhelmed about the braggadocio of being desktop focused. Humans are mobile
* **Incentives / rewards transparency (-)** - 80% of the incentives / rewards are earmarked for developers, which is generally great. Validating what developers are working on is no easy task, so I suspect confidence of prudent spend would be challenging to verify or get comfortable with

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgxY2I1NWI3ZGFjYTM4YTM3ZGZkMjUwNzIxODMyOWZiNWQ3OTEyYWM1YjIzNzg1OWM1NDdkY2VhMDExNTIzMWQ3) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-cycle-3-proposal-infinity-wallet/2713/95).

### Proposal G | Dexguru

[DexGuru](https://dex.guru/token/0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2-eth) is a crypto trading platform. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_px_1f_6ElI4V_YfP040y.png?height=283&width=551)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism and incentives transparency (-)** - Incentives primarily go to developer resources in the DexGuru DAO. Understanding how those incentives translate into time and attention on developing the Optimism ecosystem would be a challenge in my opinion

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgzYzU2MDM1MjJkNmE5NTdiMjQ0NWY2OTBmNjk1MjI5MGQ1Y2MwZWZiMGEyOGViM2UxZjQ0YWY1OTliYTk2OTNm) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-dexguru/2536).

### Proposal H | Overnight.fi

[Overnight.Fi](https://overnight.fi/) is the creator of USD+, a high yield rebasing token backed with USDC. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/71o4zcSOxXBhYnJDglgs6.png?height=282&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism (-)** - Proposal plan is to provide incentives to increase LP liquidity / yield farming, which tends to attract mercenary capital. I think the long-term growth on Optimism from these types of strategies is uncertain at best
* **Proposer incentives - USD+ (-)** -  Produces yield as a result of yield farming strategies, but the proposer team has not matched incentives to further drive growth on Optimism

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHhiMzIxYTBjYjE5MTQ3YTc1Y2NjYTQxZDQ4MjU5NGQ3ODU2NzNiNzY3NTkzYTBkMjU5NjRjN2VjOWEzMzU4MTI4) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-overnight-fi/2816).

### Proposal I | Saddle Finance

[Saddle Finance](https://saddle.finance/#/) is a token swap platform focused on stable coin liquidity and which caters to traders and LP pools. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2Hvf-T2CxcFeL_mUJw1Zm.png?height=283&width=551)

Highlights:

* **Incentivization of growth of Optimism (-)** - The incentives are largely liquidity mining incentives, which typically are more mercenary in nature. It sounds unlikely these incentives would result in meaningful long-term growth for the Optimism ecosystem
* **Rewards transparency (+)** - Although the stickiness of the rewards are uncertain, transparency as to use of funds should be clear if visible on chain via yield farming
* **Forum engagement (-)** - It’s hard to conclude in many cases with no background knowledge, but my general thought is that when an organization is asking for a grant they should go out of their way to to be as cordial, productive, and positive as possible in the discourse. Everyone absolutely deserves the right to defend themselves and their organization, but reiterating data driven positive elements of their proposal and staying on topic is what I look for from a proposal team

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgzNmNkZjI4MGZlOGMzNzYwNTYxZTc2ZDU3YTllNzAyMmNiMzgzZTc4OWNlODBiNzBlZDc5MWM2YTY4MTY2YWZi) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-saddle-finance/2842).

## Outro

There are definitely some protocols / projects which appear to be value accretive to Optimism in this Governance Fund cohort. I look forward to engaging with the next cohort of proposals in cycle 4 and refining my evaluation approach.

Let me know what you think I got wrong in this companion [TWEET](https://twitter.com/rasmuky/status/1549412642607038464?s=20&t=NjMvOFJ4ZkkPsxZsr3qhZg)! I want this approach well oiled to do my part to contribute to the Optimism ecosystem.

title: Optimism | Governance Fund Phase 1 Proposals
body:
## TL;DR:

* Voting cycle 3 (or round two Phase 1 of the Optimism Governance Fund) concludes on Jul 20, 2022. Nine proposers requested \~4.1m $OP tokens worth \~$3.1m USD at time of drafting this post
* As an Optimism delegate, I voted **FOR** four proposals and **AGAINST** five. For this round of proposals, I’ve beta tested a scorecard methodology to evaluating proposals (explained within this post)
* Although not relevant to the Governance Fund, I want to support the Optimism ecosystem due to what I perceive to be a sound “one commandment” commitment to Retroactive Public Goods Funding (RPGF)

Optimism governance voting takes place on [Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/opcollective.eth), governance overview information is organized on [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/overview), and proposal submission and feedback takes place on [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/).

If I got anything wrong or for anyone who would like to collaborate to improve or influence my governance approach as an Optimism delegate, reply to this companion [TWEET](https://twitter.com/rasmuky/status/1549412642607038464?s=20&t=NjMvOFJ4ZkkPsxZsr3qhZg).


---

## Optimism token and governance fund overview

### Why Optimism for me

My current favored L1 nation is Ethereum and I’m in the process of making Optimism my L2 neighborhood. I am drawn to the Optimism commitment to maximize [Retroactive Public Goods Funding](https://medium.com/ethereum-optimism/retroactive-public-goods-funding-33c9b7d00f0c) (RPGF). If Optimism is able to maximize “good” MEV capture and remain economically and technically competitive to other chains, I think that would be a great outcome for the network and ecosystem writ large and create public goods for the masses. Providing economic incentives to build public goods should support mass adoption and long-term use of the ecosystem.

I plan to spend more time with Arbirtrum, Polygon, and the zero knowledge L2’s coming online soon, but Optimism appears to be committed to a “[one commandment](https://thenetworkstate.com/the-one-commandment)” (a la the [Network State](https://thenetworkstate.com/preamble)) focus on RPFG. I like RPGF as a single commandment.

I also plan to dive deeper into Cosmos and it’s app chain / IPFS ecosystem at a future date as it sounds like there are a lot of interesting possibilities with that architecture as well.

### The Optimism token allocation

The Optimism token dropped end of April 2022 and is broken down as follows:

![https://community.optimism.io/docs/governance/allocations/#](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w7CP_dEbs1bNmloFWnfvy.jpeg?height=1440&width=2880&&&size=medium)

For the purposes of this post, I’ll focus on the Governance Fund (GF, 5.4% slice) under the Ecosystem Fund (25% slice) above. Live proposals on Boardroom and Discourse all relate to phase one, which ends in two days (Jul 20, 2022).

## Governance fund phase 1 overview

### General guidance

There is a good overview of the GF and more specifically Phase 1 [HERE](https://community.optimism.io/docs/governance/gov-fund/). The highlights are:

* Any project launched on Optimism is eligible to submit a proposal
* Proposals must include a plan for how the tokens will incentivize growth on Optimism
* Although not a strict requirement, the Optimism Foundation recommends that each project submitting a Governance Fund proposal include a commitment to match OP token incentives with their own project incentives
* Proposals are reviewed and approved by the Token House (OP holders, or their delegates)
* When a project gets a proposal approved, they are still eligible to apply for further proposals
  * Recommendation is that projects distribute their initial allocation of tokens before requesting further tokens
  * Projects are also encouraged to reference data from the success of their initial distribution to strengthen their case in future proposals

### Amount of tokens requested by proposers

Below are two tables I created to frame the magnitude of the nine proposals in relation to the total governance fund:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tf1o1GXn8GjiNdH3VEKgC.png?height=2880&width=5760&size=medium)

Assuming I’ve interpreted the various governance docs correctly, phase 1 proposals up for vote represent 1.7% of the total GF (for a total of \~$3.1m USD at time of drafting on Jul 18th, 2022). Assuming Phase 0 was fully allocated to the cap, there is still 65.2% of the GF to allocate in future phase 1 cycles.

### Overview of delegators and the token house

The token house is comprised of all $OP token delegates. Holders of $OP = delegates if the holder agrees to the responsibility of acting as a delegate and participating in governance. If a holder of $OP chooses to not participate in governance, that holder may delegate their tokens to a proxy delegate. I have self delegated and plan to participate in governance going forward.

Here is an overview of how the token house fits into the broad Optimism governance structure, for reference:

![https://community.optimism.io/docs/governance/](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/G1U4xGL_l3jcVPitYDizm.jpeg?height=822&width=1216)

## Rasmuky’s proposal evaluation scorecard approach

### Scorecard overview

In an attempt to evaluate proposals in a consistent way and in line with guidance provided by the Optimism core team, I developed a basic scorecard:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fPSu_ty1wSBs-7HfP3P2m.png?height=284&width=444)

I’ll iterate on the approach for future processes, but conceptually:

* Factors developed based on guidance from Optimism Collective, reading through comments on Discourse from other delegates, and considering factors that matter to me personally or that I feel are positive for the network
* Weights were subjectively developed and will be reevaluated for future phases or future proposals
* I plan to rank each factor on a 0-10 scale, with a **hurdle of 5.0** for a **FOR** vote.
* For parameters which appear more binary (i.e., project on Optimism)
  * No will render as 0
  * Yes as 5 so as to not negatively impact hurdle score of 5.0
  * If it’s obvious the project is heavily invested in Optimism, can scale up from 5 to as high as 10
* The respective weights will be applied to the 0-10 score and then aggregated to produce a weighted score

All of this is very subjective, but this approach is likely less subjective than just saying “I like the project, yes vote from me.”

### Expected evolution of scorecard process

I only recently began to immerse in the Optimism governance process, so this scorecard and broad approach will be refined for future phases or proposal cohorts. Ideally, I would have spent more time engaging on Discourse with the proposers for this tranche, but alas.

With more time to research and engage more with proposers, I would likely include other factors like protocol decentralization, open source codebase, chain of custody of digital assets, approach / emphasis on security, evaluation of grant size request relative to other historical proposals, robust assessment / diligence of on chain metrics (across all chains), etc.

The diligence of on chain metrics is factor and value add to the Optimistic Collective I’m most excited about. I believe I could provide an objective analysis of proposer protocol use and growth which all Optimism delegates could use for their proposal evaluation process. Data and analytics diligence is what I currently do in Web2, so I’m very comfortable objectively analyzing data, engaging with management teams to stress test my interpretations, and then packaging outputs for intuitive interpretation by a wide range of user profiles.

If other delegates choose to deploy a scorecard style approach, ideally delegates would decide the parameters that are most important to them, develop their own weights, etc. A diverse set of approaches to governance is healthy, this is simply the approach I chose for this round.

## Overview of phase 1 proposal evaluations

As I was late to the party for this round of proposals, I’ll be brief. Also, at snapshot I only held 1.6k $OP tokens and had none delegated to me, so no vote I cast will move the needle on proposals in this round.

I expect to increase my future phase vote impact (i) as I accumulate my own $OP stake and (ii) by earning $OP token holders support as a prudent and thoughtful delegate. [DM me on Twitter](https://twitter.com/rasmuky) if you would like to discuss delegating to me.

[Superfluid](https://www.superfluid.finance/home) is a protocol which enables payment streaming (e.g., high frequency settlement, like salary payments every day). I voted **FOR** for this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IiGpH0RR2DRXSQIoARcp_.png?height=282&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Plan for how tokens will incentivize growth (+)** - Products like Superfluid tend to be very sticky once organizations / people begin to program payments or streams. I’m not sure of the adoption or competitor set, but relative to more mercenary capital / temporary use cases, I think there is more potential for long-term Optimism adoption and growth with Superfliud
* **Transparency of proposer to end recipient (+/-)** - A portion of $OP tokens will be utilized to subsidize fees to set up and execute streams, which should be pretty easy to observe and directly benefit Optimism. A separate portion will be allocated to developers to support migration of treasuries and other activities to Optimism. ![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-mC5bzOopZ-n_L0hTPtjD.png?height=283&width=550)

Highlights:

* **New product / additional demand (+)** - Blockchain gaming is not prevalent on Optimism to my knowledge, but can definitely drive a lot of volume if the respective game achieves solid traction
* **incentives / rewards transparency (-)** - A portion of the incentives are slated to go into the project treasury, which is likely to be very opaque and hard to correlate to growth on Optimism

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHhhNDk3YWYxMWFiMzFlNjM4ZDM4YmNmNmQ1NzY4OWE1NzI5YmY2NmVlMWMzZmQ4OWYyMGJjZDdkOWU2ZmE2ZDRi) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-dope-wars/2722).

### Proposal F | Infinity Wallet

[Infinity Wallet](https://infinitywallet.io/) is a multi-chain desktop focused crypto wallet with robust native integrations with various dApps. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/S0NPKuOZW6k-_vGXgBf9R.png?height=282&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism (+)** - A dApp native integration approach could be very sticky if the UI / UX is positive. I have not used the product, but do see value in the concept
* **New product (-)** - There are multiple wallets operational on Optimism. The native dApp integration sounds interesting, but I’m underwhelmed about the braggadocio of being desktop focused. Humans are mobile
* **Incentives / rewards transparency (-)** - 80% of the incentives / rewards are earmarked for developers, which is generally great. Validating what developers are working on is no easy task, so I suspect confidence of prudent spend would be challenging to verify or get comfortable with

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgxY2I1NWI3ZGFjYTM4YTM3ZGZkMjUwNzIxODMyOWZiNWQ3OTEyYWM1YjIzNzg1OWM1NDdkY2VhMDExNTIzMWQ3) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-cycle-3-proposal-infinity-wallet/2713/95).

### Proposal G | Dexguru

[DexGuru](https://dex.guru/token/0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2-eth) is a crypto trading platform. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_px_1f_6ElI4V_YfP040y.png?height=283&width=551)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism and incentives transparency (-)** - Incentives primarily go to developer resources in the DexGuru DAO. Understanding how those incentives translate into time and attention on developing the Optimism ecosystem would be a challenge in my opinion

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgzYzU2MDM1MjJkNmE5NTdiMjQ0NWY2OTBmNjk1MjI5MGQ1Y2MwZWZiMGEyOGViM2UxZjQ0YWY1OTliYTk2OTNm) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-dexguru/2536).

### Proposal H | Overnight.fi

[Overnight.Fi](https://overnight.fi/) is the creator of USD+, a high yield rebasing token backed with USDC. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/71o4zcSOxXBhYnJDglgs6.png?height=282&width=550)

Highlights:

* **Growth on Optimism (-)** - Proposal plan is to provide incentives to increase LP liquidity / yield farming, which tends to attract mercenary capital. I think the long-term growth on Optimism from these types of strategies is uncertain at best
* **Proposer incentives - USD+ (-)** -  Produces yield as a result of yield farming strategies, but the proposer team has not matched incentives to further drive growth on Optimism

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHhiMzIxYTBjYjE5MTQ3YTc1Y2NjYTQxZDQ4MjU5NGQ3ODU2NzNiNzY3NTkzYTBkMjU5NjRjN2VjOWEzMzU4MTI4) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-overnight-fi/2816).

### Proposal I | Saddle Finance

[Saddle Finance](https://saddle.finance/#/) is a token swap platform focused on stable coin liquidity and which caters to traders and LP pools. I voted **AGAINST** this proposal, scorecard output:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2Hvf-T2CxcFeL_mUJw1Zm.png?height=283&width=551)

Highlights:

* **Incentivization of growth of Optimism (-)** - The incentives are largely liquidity mining incentives, which typically are more mercenary in nature. It sounds unlikely these incentives would result in meaningful long-term growth for the Optimism ecosystem
* **Rewards transparency (+)** - Although the stickiness of the rewards are uncertain, transparency as to use of funds should be clear if visible on chain via yield farming
* **Forum engagement (-)** - It’s hard to conclude in many cases with no background knowledge, but my general thought is that when an organization is asking for a grant they should go out of their way to to be as cordial, productive, and positive as possible in the discourse. Everyone absolutely deserves the right to defend themselves and their organization, but reiterating data driven positive elements of their proposal and staying on topic is what I look for from a proposal team

For reference, [Boardroom.io](https://boardroom.io/optimism/proposal/cHJvcG9zYWw6b3B0aW1pc206c25hcHNob3Q6MHgzNmNkZjI4MGZlOGMzNzYwNTYxZTc2ZDU3YTllNzAyMmNiMzgzZTc4OWNlODBiNzBlZDc5MWM2YTY4MTY2YWZi) and [Discourse](https://gov.optimism.io/t/ready-gf-phase-1-proposal-saddle-finance/2842).

## Outro

There are definitely some protocols / projects which appear to be value accretive to Optimism in this Governance Fund cohort. I look forward to engaging with the next cohort of proposals and refining my evaluation approach.

Let me know what you think I got wrong in this companion [TWEET](https://twitter.com/rasmuky/status/1549412642607038464?s=20&t=NjMvOFJ4ZkkPsxZsr3qhZg)! I want this approach well oiled to do my part to contribute to the Optimism ecosystem.

title: 如何避免死亡螺旋？
body:
### 薯条

### 问题1：如何看待行业现状？

**Jimmy：**

判断gamefi行业冷热，我们主要关注3个指标：项目、用户、融资情况。

【项目】 39条链上了 Gamefi 的项目，从跨链用户数量来说，前两名是HIVE和WAX。2021年年底，项目总数有1140个，现在GameFi项目有1500多个，增长了30%左右，在熊市的状态下，增速相对较慢 1500+ 个Gamefi 项目，比去年增长一倍，最近熊市增长30% 。

【用户】 截至去年12月底，日活用户数量120万，今年5月底已经跌倒100万，这两天日活数量已经跌倒了74万，从侧面说明现在行情和赚钱效应都在走下坡路。

【融资】 今年总融资额达到37亿美金，而去年下半年融资额达到30亿美金，增长量非常小。今年4月份融资额达到24亿美金，占上半年融资额的65%，2022年其他几个月的融资情况很不乐观，特别是5月份。 总融资数量有160个，比较去年下半年增长了18%。3月份融资数量达到最高峰值45笔，也是历史上融资数最高的一个月。种子轮融资代表了风投对这个行业看程度，而截至目前，种子轮融资数量较少。去年下半年35个项目进行非种子轮融资，今年有78个非种子轮项目融资，以此来看，非种子轮融资项目增长显著，而种子轮增长缓慢。 今年GamFi项目融资的数量和质量增长，但增速放缓。

更多详细信息可以看我们出的【行业赛道研究】专题报告： [《DeGame & Footprint Q1 GameFi Report》](https://www.footprint.network/@DeGame/DeGame-Footprint-Q1-GameFi-Report?exchange=Binance)

**Min：**

我从微观角度来说一说：

我们的平台可以看 “社区规模”,“在线人数","评分","下载", 用户可以根据整体数据分析项目。目前社区规模最大的依然是Axie Infinity,达到170万，第二名Sandbox，第三Stepn。目前社区实时在线人数排名第一的是Stepn。不管是分析项目还是炒币，分析项目数据十分关键。

### 薯条

### 问题2：目前 X2E 对于未来 P2E 项目发展，有什么启发和建议？

**Oscar：**

X2E的历史可以追溯到更早时候，从公链的各种pures节点开始，比如US的节点和质押，和DeFi 的质押也算是一种2E的方式。去年开始，P2E模式大量出现，Axie Infinity作为一个典型，而到今年开始X2E的场景更加多元化。 启发目前有两个点：过度强调E的项目会快坍塌，，一旦E不能长久，就会快速崩盘，所以GameFi更多强social部分和for fun部分。Token是P2E发展的核心要素，所以需要拓展游戏正外部性，游戏里面可以增加广告，变现，和品牌合作，以此增强GameFi项目的生命周期。

### 薯条：

### 问题3：如何避免死亡螺旋的存在？

**fusion：**

P2E 要回归到游戏本身。 现阶段 StepN 是顶峰了，资金盘起家快，但难以收尾，承受不住既得利益者的抛压。是逃脱不了思维螺旋的。

未来的游戏看到几种可能：

1、小游戏平台，能够持续出新品，吸引用户注意力的项目，引入竞争、打榜模式，奖惩机制来消耗 token，而非单项输出

2、大型网游，结合游戏本身的公会、打金系统来设计，借鉴梦幻西游的经验，能实现金主老板、打金战队等多方玩家形成正向循环。

**瓜田：**

我的观点是可以避免死亡螺旋。但是现在的代币经济模型行不通。stepn虽然运营和爽点方面做的好，但是改变不了本质。现在的 S 级的游戏在传统市场赚的很多，不需要上链游。一些正在链改的大型网游，可能会是 A 级或者A-的游戏，品质比很多游戏强很多。

传统游戏优秀的原因：

* 是让玩家得到更多的爽点，也就是游戏原生价值的体现，而非纯 earn。
* 游戏如果不那么优秀，可以使用多层套娃模式，例如卖地吸引模拟经营的玩家，开放性世界吸引玩家，在开放世界中的物品、怪兽可以组队PK，可以买卖.，每一层套娃都可以成为玩家留下的原因、消耗代币。
* 横向套娃玩法：根据故事情节横向拓展套娃，增加游戏情节复杂程度，游戏好玩度是第一位。
* 还有另一种可能：多种多重游戏联动，并联成更大的元宇宙游戏。
* 博弈类模型：模式参数设定很重要，例如将德州扑克游戏，确保公平性 总结：在术上面增加套娃，在DAO上面做元宇宙，博弈类模型。提高内生因素（好玩），留住老玩家，同时提高外生因素。

  ### 薯条：

  ### 问题4 ：对于传统游戏行业进入web3 进行链改，有什么建议吗？

**Jimmy：**

Web3 将改变生产关系，也必将改变生产力、带来创新，让更多人愿意为其付出。 
 目前大型游戏在自己的生产关系很舒服。暂时没有动力做这个事情。 
 但这就像传统车企做不了电动车，反被特斯拉、小鹏这样的新企业颠覆

所以从终局来看，我相信新的创新和生产力也必定为这个行业带来变革。

一个团队进入 Web3 所能解决什么问题：

* 基于区块链自身的经济网络，无需版号和授权。
* 早期通过发币覆盖制作成本（特别是相对独立的制作人）

所以如果制作团队是把来链上赚一波钱、发展更多用户作为目标，很可能做不下去。

**麻辣烫：**

建立 token 经济体系不能是目标，而是工具。

在传统游戏中，有人氪金，能为系统带来外部收入。 
 但 x to earn 的模式下，玩家更多是投资者，来是为了赚钱而非玩。因此从财务报表上看是 stakeholder 而非消费者。 
 所以一个能否发展好的核心，还是需要有一批外部来消费的人，才能支持这个系统发展。

那 Token 能起到什么作用呢？ 
 1、拉新 
 2、分配外部获得的利益给持有者

Token 理想的状态是不断接近于股票，模糊玩家和投资人。 
 但同时当项目的利润 Token 化时，有机会获得远超于股票的市盈率和估值，因此能为持有者带来更大收益。 
 对于项目方，得要先赚钱，再把利益分配给 token 持有者

**Fusion：**

为什么大游戏厂商要入 Web3 ？ 有一个理由是：Web3 的玩法可以释放巨大的可能性，例如双向交易、人性博弈的玩法、通过智能合约保证规则的公平性、游戏道具的二级市场。一旦这个潘多拉魔盒打开，web3 的游戏就有各种手段可以拿捏人性，变成真正的“成人的游戏”。（对于项目方而言，会有更多手段，换着花样套利） 同时一旦 Web3 的游戏完成【玩家的数据、道具】归玩家的变革后，可能也会从现在的游戏管理玩家，变成玩家们组织起来反过来运营游戏。 项目方的责任也就演变为：如何吸引玩家加入这个游戏获取其底层基建和制度？而非如何通过强权去运营。

### 薯条：

### 问题5：投资人如何看 GameFi 项目？比较看好的项目有哪些？

**Oscar:** 
 【投资考虑指标】

* 1、团队
  * 过去有没有大型游戏开发经验？
  * 是否有大型游戏公司、区块链项目经验？

  2、游戏本身
  * 可玩性、视觉效果、平衡性、创新性、简单上手性怎么样？
  * 是否能吸引、留存用户？

  3、经济模型设计

  4、优秀投资机构投资
  * 如果有优秀的投资机构投资，成功率更大。
  * 如果有DAO或打金公司在初期支持是好的

  5、游戏底层的基础设施
  * 选择了怎样的链？
  * 能支持多大的用户规模？

相对于单款游戏，我们更关注的是游戏工作室和平台，以及底层基础设施，例如游戏公链。 
 游戏可能生命周期短，但工作室能持续产出。 
 在我们投种子轮时，会非常看人：看他们是否证明过自己、是否有作品，并且有web3经验。 
 其次就看产品本身的竞争力和差异性

**看好的项目：**

【Joyride】 
 团队在硅谷，创始人来自迪斯尼。优秀的投资机构支持。 
 是一个平台，有很多款游戏。 
 打算自己开发30%，开放SDK 和工具给游戏工作室，期待未来70%由生态伙伴开发

**瓜田：**

看好一些链改手游（正在测试，即将上线） 
 我的看法乐观，未来一年内会有1-2 款高品质链游上线。 
 这些高品质链游套娃多、可玩性题设、对于web2门槛降低，将链游带动一大波发展。

### 问题6：如何看估值？

Oscar:平台类有Demo 有产品的情况下，第一轮 3000-5000W 美金。 
 Gamefi 单款游戏 500-1000W 的都有

**BillyWen：**

3000-5000W 美金可能有点高。 
 需要有社区、初步成果了才能达到这个估值。

### 问题7：对未来的展望？

**BillyWen：**

在2007年的时候，人们无法想象未来手机游戏能发展出这么大的产业。而今天的区块链就像1993年的互联网一样，所有人都在想象也都在见证未来。。

Web2 的游戏是厂商开发出来，如果你觉得好玩就掏钱。 
 Web3 则是用户告诉开发者我们需要什么，厂商去开发。而用户也能够决定整个游戏的发展、生死，因为一旦无法被满足，用户可以用脚投票（砸盘）

用户的分两种，一种是赚钱的用户，一种是真正去体验游戏的用户。不一定需要将两者混淆，但破局点一定在于：如何将以娱乐为目标的的这群人吸引进来。 
 一旦 GameFi 探索出一款产品，能够恰到好处的兼顾经济系统，同时能够吸引大量娱乐需求的用户，就有机会带来整个行业的一波发展。但可能还要等待几年探索。到时候整个生态中会有很多爱玩游戏的玩家，也会有打金工会这样可以赚钱的用户存在。

**26×14：**

关于如何达到突破口，降低门槛获得更多用户？有几个可能性：

* 将稳定币接入经济系统，降低参与门槛
* 不一定必须是双代币系统，也可以加上积分、体力值等系统
* 对于游戏类型，SLG / RPG 代币销毁机制更强。mobie 、吃鸡类 的DAU更大。后者的经济系统可能虽弱一些，但能很好的带领web2 的用户进来。

  **Jimmy：**
* 如果去看更广义的 token 经济系统，我们其实有机会将更多线下的场景、需求、服务搬到线上、链上来。本质上就是解决一个效率问题，和美团滴滴一样 
 例如 谷歌地图让用户拍摄线下地点，给到奖励。这种项目是否可以上链？已经有团队在做了。 
 我们期待：web3 能实现数据贡献者、生产者、采集者都能获得收益，这是我们期待看到的

title: WHAT IS A AIRDROP?
body:
# The Great Airdrop Debate

## A New Airdrop Adventure

As I am embarking on another journey into unfamiliar territory, I am reflecting back on the best and the worst airdrops I have been a part of. The Arbitrum Odyssey just kicked off and it appears to be a super exciting event, spanning across eight weeks and multiple NFT airdrops. Will this be a successful series of airdrops? Will it meet the expectations of both the builders and users across this growing ecosystem? Honestly, I can not wait to find out; especially, because I have not explored Ethereum and its Layer 2 protocols and dApps. If you are interested in joining this Odyssey, I have left links in the Sources section below the article to get you started.

## The Best Airdrop

Not surprisingly, being an avid experimenter, I have participated in and received nearly a hundred airdrops. In the process, I have developed a short list of what qualifies as a successful token airdrop (fungible or non-fungible).

Here it is:

* the protocol or dApp has defined, communicated, and stood by the airdrop distribution criteria
* the distribution supports the future value of the protocol
* the airdrop is designed to avoid a “sell and dump” of the token event
* upon releasing the airdrop, there exists functionality in the protocol or dApp
* the airdrop recipient should be required to engage with the blockchain, protocol, or dApp.

Why am I proponent of having to work for your drop? Why not just distribute it wide and far? Because, those events make up my short list of the worst airdrops I have participated in.

## The Worst Airdrop

Here is that list of what I think makes for a forgettable airdrop event:

* the airdrop criteria are poorly communicated
* the airdrop criteria are changed, after the announcement communication has been released
* the airdrop comes with a bribe that negatively affects another team of builders or group of users
* the airdropped tokens are released all at once
* the protocol or dApp airdrop functionality does not work or crashes
* congestion and transaction delays lead to frustration
* drops using whitelists (borrowing from today’s Wordle, that is simply an “awful” name, which exemplifies misplaced exclusivity)
* there is no utility in the protocol or dApp when the airdrop is released.
* the airdrop comes with a staking requirement; yet, there is no introduction of use cases from the protocol or dApp for many months thereafter.

All these types of events inevitably result in an extremely short-term rapid rise in the price of the airdropped token and a subsequent prolonged drop. User engagement disappears as quickly as the value of the token.

Instead, let’s look at some examples of the types of airdrops that I thought were really cool, super interesting, and resulted in positive experiences for both the users and the builders.

## Phased Airdrops

The airdrops that are divided into distinct phases are very effective. They make the user come back again and again to interact with the dApp. This method also ensures that the token is not bombarded with massive amounts of sell pressure, all at once.

The most successful of these events I have personally experienced were those that tied receiving a portion of the airdrop to specific launches of dApps on the protocol, new functionality implemented in stages, or milestones reached. For example, I have seen numerous DeFi protocols use the following approach:

* Phase One — launch the token and enable staking
* Phase Two — open the swap functionality
* Phase Three — open the liquidity pools
* Phase Four — commence incentivized farming.

Of course, if extended periods of time pass between these phases, the effects are diluted and user engagement is weakened.

## A Task Oriented Approach

I really like this type of an airdrop, because working for the free tokens is the way to ensure user engagement with the products.

Specific examples of the task oriented approach include:

* transfer the tokens across a bridge
* stake some of the tokens
* participate in a governance vote
* swap some of the airdropped tokens to another token that interacts with the blockchain, protocol, or dApp.
* supply collateral to a lending dApp.
* mint a stabletoken.

As a user, I want to perform multiple tasks, because that way I really learn how the protocol works and what is possible with the technology. Usually, it also leads me to try other products, inject additional funds, or increase my engagement.

## Implement Utility First

One of my pet peeves is receiving tokens in an airdrop and excitedly going to the dApp to see what is offered and finding….nothing!

You all know who you are: ghost chains, protocols under construction, and invisible dApps floating around in the crypto universe that have tokens and nothing else. What is the point of releasing a token if you are not going to have utility ready and deployed first?

New builders, can you please make sure you have utility implemented when you release your airdrop? If that seems daunting, I have seen plenty of chains launch testnets, airdrop tokens on the testnet, get lots of user interaction, work out all the bugs, and subsequently launch successfully on the mainnet to a wider audience.

## NFT Drops

Nothing puzzles me more than new NFT projects that generate lots of community engagement with amazing marketing campaigns, launch a successful genesis NFT collection with beautiful designs, just to go silent for months and not do a thing.

Why not take advantage of all that excitement and have multiple, additional functionalities and products ready to deploy in the weeks and months following the genesis drop? I have seen plenty of great airdrop ideas for this concept, including:

* airdrops of auxiliary collections to the genesis NFT owners
* airdrop loot NFT’s to the genesis NFT owners
* have the NFT unlock opportunities in a game
* launch a secondary collection and use the same airdrop strategy
* use NFT airdrops to users that perform tasks in the dApps.

And since I am such a staunch opponent of those exclusive “reservation lists”, here is another idea that I have seen work with great success. Launch a token, which the prospective owners of the NFT can purchase, stake, and farm it in order to receive a ticket to the minting event. Who needs a “exclusionary list” when you have a ticket machine?

And then there is the whole concept of reward NFT’s being developed, literally as we speak. These NFT’s could also be airdropped, but the tokens are received over time as rewards, which are tied directly to the NFT.

## Novel Approaches

The protocols that come up with the most unique approaches to getting their tokens in circulation via airdrops are the ones that I believe have experienced the most success.

Besides the ones mentioned above, I have encountered additional (more complicated) examples, including:

* requiring tokens to be bonded and farmed
* vesting of tokens with a steady stream of rewards
* locking up tokens with a promise of future rewards
* paying out increasing amounts of rewards depending on the length of the lock-up periods
* providing liquid derivative tokens in return for staking tokens.

All of these methods ensure the longevity of the protocol and the stability of the token.

## Executing for Success

As I embark on a new adventure, one that once again involves airdrops, I wanted to share some of my thoughts on the subject with you. Obviously this is not an exhaustive list and I would love to hear from you what other effective airdrops you have participated in.

There are as many different points of view on how to successfully execute an airdrop, as there are protocols in the crypto universe. Therefore, I suspect that the Great Airdrop Debate will rage on. But, next time when you participate in that airdrop for a token that has no utility, you know what to do. And those that do have utility, that encourage you to learn something unexpected, experience something unique, and allow you to engage with people across the globe, they are the keepers.

Hopefully, I have been able to share some valuable points of view in this debate; in the meantime, I look forward to exploring Arbitrum’s Odyssey and having some cool NFT’s airdropped to me as a reward for my enthusiastic participation.

Het avontuur gaat door — Opa.
