title: The State of Filecoin
body:
As the centralized services have become an increasingly critical part of how we live our lives online, so the need for alternatives becomes ever greater. Humanity will need a better internet that can harness the web infrastructure far more efficiently. That’s where [Filecoin](https://www.filecoin.com/) comes in, let’s dig in!.

# Demystifying Filecoin

Internet is increasingly centralized, fragile and inefficient. Most cloud storage services are provided by companies that have absolute control ([centralized data monopolies](https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/amazon-web-services-outage-cloud-b1762074.html)) over the data stored on their servers and suffers from vulnerable choke-points (poor data safety).

This model requires users to trust the service provider. [They must trust the company](https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/06/technology/amazon-apple-facebook-google-antitrust-report.html) to not modify the stored data nor censor them by denying access to the service. Furthermore, the users have no way of verifying that the data has not been manipulated since it was uploaded unless they have a copy of the original data.

Thanks to its decentralized nature, the power of the network lies in its community. Filecoin itself isn't the gatekeeper for storage, the community is. In short, Filecoin allows anyone to rent-out free space on their computer to other users who are looking to store data. It can be thought as similar to the Airbnb model, which allows anyone to rent out a room in their house or even the entire house. 

Filecoin is a decentralized peer-to-peer network that allows its users to store and retrieve data on the internet, robust foundation to store the world most valuable data sets and alternative to conventional cloud storage services. An alternative to costly cloud storage with open platform and a market economy that allowing users to take advantage (store, request, and transfer data) of its unmatched network capabilities via a verifiable marketplace.

The four key features that Filecoin bundles together:

1. **Connects clients with storage providers**

   Clients and storage providers make deals (i.e., storage agreements) to store or retrieve data using [FIL as the medium of exchange](https://docs.filecoin.io/about-filecoin/how-filecoin-works/); connects people who have excess storage space with people who want to store data, efficiently priced (minimizing financial barriers) and geographically decentralized storage.
2. **The network is completely [open-source](https://github.com/filecoin-project/community#forums)**

   Enabling people from all over the world to participate, meaning that anyone can store data on the network or become a storage provider. The price of storage depends on supply and demand.
3. **Built on [InterPlanetary File System (IPFS)](https://ipfs.io/)**

   Using Filecoin directly requires technical skills, protocols can be built on top of Filecoin and IPFS ([adds economic incentives to store files on IPFS](https://docs.filecoin.io/about-filecoin/ipfs-and-filecoin/)). These protocols make interacting with the blockchain easier.
4. **The Filecoin protocol runs on an advanced and novel proof system**

   A blockchain that incentivizes its miners (i.e. node operators) to store other users data in return for block rewards paid in Filecoin (FIL) tokens using a combination of [Proof of Spacetime (PoSt) and Proof of Replication (PoRep)](https://filecoin.io/filecoin.pdf), to provide unmatched efficiency and reliability. The miners store data and have to provide frequent cryptographic proofs for it. Users can verify that their data is stored correctly by looking at the cryptographic proofs on the blockchain.

Over the previous decade, advances in blockchain technology have enabled applications that were not possible before. Storing valuable data including sensitive information on another machine may appear suspicious at first glance. It is feasible to establish a large-scale data storage network utilizing modern blockchain technology, where it is practically difficult to modify the stored data without breaking the chain.

With Filecoin, they breaks down the data before storing it to ensure that attackers cannot access the data saved by anyone anywhere in the network. As a result, if a malicious actor attempts to access a file stored in the system, they will only see nonsensical data fragments.

![How the Filecoin network operates](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/msIY7ysRjR7zTdVnq7Rp_.png?height=705&width=1160)

There is an enormous amount of data information available, and it is critical to be able to authenticate its veracity. For example, government documents, laws and other legal documents, scientific data and reports, cultural heritage, etc. Moreover, many people’s trust in institutions, governments, and companies has diminished, creating a demand for trustless ways of storing data.

The global cloud storage market is dominated by large tech companies such as Amazon, Microsoft, and Google. These companies’ cloud infrastructure services’ combined yearly revenue exceeds 100 billion USD, although this number includes both storage and computing.

![Circulating market caps of notable cloud storage services built on blockchain](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dA2cYo9tiamfBVXAWz25A.png?height=832&width=1456)

Filecoin competes with large tech companies, conventional tech startups, and other blockchain protocols. Its on-chain competitors include Akash Network, Arweave, Siacoin, and Storj. Filecoin is the largest cloud storage service built on blockchain as measured by storage capacity or valuation, but how much do we have to play with?

## F\*undamentalizatorrrr

Filecoin generates revenue by charging fees for computation, storage, and transactions on the blockchain. The fees are paid in FIL. A fraction of the fees are burnt to reduce the supply of FIL, while the remaining is paid to miners. Potential future revenue streams for storage providers may include other fees, such as fees from smart contract apps or decentralized compute services. 

![Distribution of FIL](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tf0WwlCdqdaXbWL7cgp2T.png?height=832&width=1456)

The maximum supply of FIL is 2 billion, of which 220 million are in circulation. As indicated in the diagram above, the tokens are allocated to miners, Protocol Labs, investors, and the Filecoin Foundation. Protocol Labs, investors, and the Filecoin Foundation are on a 6-year linear vesting schedule. The miners will receive the tokens allocated to them as block rewards over several decades depending on network usage. The price of FIL, shown in the figure below, peaked in April 2021 and has since fallen near its ICO price.

![Price of FIL](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EksswnGvRZd6IjjWZK2ZQ.png?height=413&width=992)

The figure below shows Filecoin’s circulating market cap (i.e. the amount of FIL in circulation multiplied by its price) and total revenue (i.e. fees paid). Filecoin’s revenue also peaked in April 2022 with 264% growth as active storage deals grew 128% and network storage capacity grew 7%. However it’s still whopping 74% lower on year-over-year basis.

![Filecoin’s circulating market cap and total revenue](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jgSxnEfvMJwP8Gy9zX9of.png?height=439&width=994)

Filecoin’s relatively low current revenue is partially explained by a [protocol upgrade](https://filecoin.io/blog/posts/filecoin-v13-hyperdrive-network-upgrade-unlocks-10-25x-increase-in-storage-onboarding/) that increased the blockchain throughput by an order of magnitude (a mechanism to scale throughput to 10–25x of its original capacity) and by the Chinese authorities’ crackdown on cryptocurrency mining. 

A key implication protocol upgrade was that storage proofs were aggregated, which significantly reduced congestion and freed up blockspace. While the protocol upgrade benefited most network participants, it hurt the protocol revenue because it led to a reduction in transaction fees.

The network’s storage capacity has also kept growing, increasing the supply of storage and reducing its cost. The figure below shows how the fees are split between the protocol (i.e. FIL tokenholders) and supply-side participants (i.e. miners). Burning a portion of the fees is comparable to a share buyback and thus counted as protocol revenue, although, supply-side revenue decreased 4% in FIL terms year-over-year, corresponding to a 48% decline in USD terms. Near-zero storage fees impacted supply side revenue since it limited storage providers revenue to just block rewards and tips. 

![Distribution of revenue between the protocol and supply-side participants.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YCkCMc-rG2o_u61Kx82IO.png?height=832&width=1456)

Regardless of overall market conditions, Filecoin’s committed storage capacity has [grown steadily during the past year](https://filecoin.io/blog/posts/filecoin-news-46/) reached over 17.8EiB. This network capacity is equivalent to more than centralized entity. Filecoin’s storage capacity is supplied by over 4,000 decentralized storage providers distributed around the globe (supply dynamics tell only one side of the story about the network activity. The other side is told through Filecoin demand in the context of actively stored data).

## Catasthrope

Filecoin continue to onboard demand, it stands a chance to be a prominent provider of decentralized storage and cloud services for Web3 and traditional apps. While decentralized storage is still in its early days, the Filecoin ecosystem continues to thrive, as over +1460 projects are currently being built on Filecoin. Filecoin is being leveraged by several use cases, including:

* NFTs
* Web3
* Gaming
* Metaverse 
* Audio/Video.

In the future, the adoption of decentralized storage solutions and the integration of smart contracts built on top may open the door to novel applications. Open data initiatives and decentralized compute may enable the next generation of apps beyond storage. Filecoin’s main goal is to prove its reliability as a storage provider and potentially become an enabler of a wide range of data-intensive services.

title: 从Web2.0到Web3.0，社交网络图谱聚合变迁三步曲
body:
## .1.Web2.0垄断的另一面：聚际必散

**当互联网从Web1.0走向Web2.0，从只可读、以内容为中心的“信息门户”转变得可读可写可交互，开始体现出“社交网络”的特征**；并且随着大数据算法、索引推荐等技术的不断优化，社交网络媒体变得更加智能和具有粘性，这种变化不仅加速了用户、数据的持续集中和沉淀，也加速了个人及企业“朋友圈”在同一社交平台的形成和壮大，交织出强大的社交网络图谱。

以“社交网络图谱”为核心，Web2.0社交网络平台成为了各类产品、服务以及行业KOL进行信息传递、价值布道、品牌建设、营销传播、粉丝互动、流量变现等的主战场。至此，“社交网络平台”成为Web2.0的圣杯，并以其庞大的用户规模、强关联的社交关系、海量的大数据等为资源，假以各种智能新兴技术，被挖掘出巨大的商业价值，成就了诸如Facebook、Twitter、微信等超万亿规模的商业帝国。

毋庸置疑，社交网络在互联网Web2.0时期发挥出了巨大的商业价值，但随着“中心化”特征愈加明显，用户丧失个人数据自主权，资源垄断扼杀小微创新，大数据算法“杀熟”等等问题越来越受到谴责和质疑。不断有人发声“天下苦Web2.0久矣”，打破这种局面逐渐成为越来越强烈的共识。

区块链及Web3.0的出现，为“破局”带来希望的曙光。随着区块链及Web3.0的出现，去中心化和中心化之间产生了强烈的碰撞，去中心化思想和技术已经表现出强大的创造力和“破坏性”，并从Web2.0底层开始解构。越来越多的人开始认识到，Web2.0社交网络必然走向“聚际必散”，那么以区块链为底层技术，**在Web3.0发展趋势之下，社交网络会发生怎样的变化，是否会给带来更大的想象空间？**

## .2.理想丰满 ，但现实有点尴尬

### 1.DApp+中心化平台=割裂的业务闭环

BTC的出现带来了加密数字货币的创新和区块链的发展，而ETH作为通用的智能合约和去中心化应用平台，则将创新延展到了更广泛的商业应用领域。特别是DeFi、GameFi、NFT以及元宇宙的相继火爆，似乎让人看到了Web3.0 DApp发展的春天。

各类DApp一方面致力于专业应用上的创新，同时也格外重视社区的发展，可以说社区建设成为DApp健康发展的基本要素。但我们发现，诸如Uniswap、Compound、YFI这类现象级应用，他们的社区用户几乎都是集聚在Twitter 、Telegram、Discord、微信等第三方中心化的社交网络平台。DApp的用户似乎已经习惯在Twitter上去追踪项目方动态，在Discord里聊聊跟代币经济有关的话题，在项目方微信群里进行大水漫灌。而当要进行抵押、借贷、提供流动性等操作时，还是不得不回到DApp的操作界面里去。至今，没有一个DApp能够做到基于自身业务层面建立完整的业务闭环。就如某知名钱包创始人讲到过，虽然Web3.0网络可以实现用户的数据确权，但是确权的数据离开了网络和关系，价值将会受到巨大的损失，因此用户和项目方还是难以离开web2.0平台。

割裂的业务闭环，显而易见的弊端是用户群体都被封闭在中心化的社交网络平台，社群无法自由迁移，在某些情况下很可能被中心化平台“制裁”而毫无还手之力！

DApp需要在中心化社交媒体中建立用户群体，这对于倡导去中心化的Web3来说，是极具讽刺的事情！究其根本原因是--加密世界缺乏原生的、无需许可的去中心化社交网络。很显然，这是一个问题，当然也是一次难得的机遇。

### 2.加密世界缺失原生的社交网络

Web2.0时代的产品和服务主要是围绕“用户需求”而展开，这是商业价值最后落地的闭环，所以“人”在其中占据核心地位，因此社交网络得到显著重视和卓越发展。

**而在Web3.0中，“协议”成为核心基本要素**，首要考虑如何建立机器、软件之间的信任和互联互通。“中心化、信任以及许可”，这些特征似乎都跟人或由人组成的机构密切相关，而“去中心化、去信任以及无需许可”从一开始就把人边缘化了（当然这是策略问题，最终还是为了服务于人），加密世界倡导“Code is the law”，带来的结果就是：货币协议化，实现了资产层面的广泛连接；链上行为智能合约化（协议化），实现了协议的自由组合和可扩展；底层基础设施层协议化，构建了可信网络、可信计算和可信存储，从互联网底层实现了可信的互联互通。但作为“人”或者“人际网络”，在原生的加密世界，似乎已经丢失了他的主体地位。我们认可Web3.0去中心化的思想，所以可以去掉人的“中心化主导”，但不是要去掉人这个“主体”。我们非常清楚，离开了人，这个世界的意义在哪里？

当前，借力中心化社交网络平台的高效支撑，DApp的发展仍然十分迅猛，但谁能确保“中心化”不作恶？Web3.0去中心化的目的不就是要减少中心化风险吗？所以是时候关注去中心化社交网络的发展了。

## .3.在去中心化状态下的“精准狙击”

Web2.0是典型的中心化平台经济，平台“一对多”聚合着生态各方。因为中心化的特征，平台在资源、效率、用户流量等方面具有单边优势，因此掌握着“话筒”的话语权。对于App来说，利用好这种优势可以在引导用户流量转化、营销传播等方面获得巨大的加持。

但是Web3.0因为去中心化，首先去掉了“平台”这个中心，使得资源、资产、用户等呈现分布式、碎片化状态，相互关系变成“点对点”，每个碎片似乎变得“孤立、游离”。在这种情况下，DApp如何形成凝聚力？

这就需要依靠共识！在区块链引发的加密世界里，共识是一切的基础，具有强大的力量，正如网络上流行的一句话：SX的共识也是共识。那么共识怎么获得呢？当然，一切围绕“利益”而展开。

“话筒”移交到了DApp的生态社区，这是一个利益相关者形成的自治网络。无论是开发者、投资方、贡献者还是用户，每个参与者都是利益相关者，这是一种精准的“颗粒度”。很显然Web3.0试图化解Web2.0中心化带来的风险，同时也丧失了中心化资源规模优势，却捕获了利益相关者，这算不算是“精准狙击”呢？而接下来要做的，就是找到一把“狙击枪”，将这些分散但精准的“颗粒”连接起来，并变得有效，推动形成强大的去中心化共识力量。我们认为，时值DApp发展在即，唯有去中心化社交网络图谱在围绕“人”勾织协议网络，并无需许可集成到DApp中，赋能DApp社交属性，将堪当重任。

## .4.社交网络图谱聚合变迁三步曲

接下来，我们以图形化的方式来表达社交网络从Web2.0到Web3.0的聚合变迁。

Web2.0社交网络平台凭借着自己对技术基础设施的控制权，牢牢把控了平台数据的所有权、控制权和价值分配权，如图4-1所示：

![图4-1 Web2.0社交网络平台的运作模式](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1SmIfJRPU0uzmJJxoUrId.png?height=774&width=750)

其优势来自于底层技术结构的“中心化”支撑，所以解决“将所有权还给用户”这个问题的核心是如何去掉中心化的平台。但去掉中心化的平台，在操作上并不是直接去解构它，而是从建设社交网络图谱之初，不再依赖于中心化平台，而是自下而上的进行，这种感觉有点像“悄悄的进村，打枪的不要”。不依赖中心化的平台，意味着从一开始用户身份、内容以及社交关系等数据资源是分布、游离、碎片化的，不仅用户之间相互失去关联，用户的数据也会跟用户自己失去关联。但这是去中心化迈出的第一步，如图4-2所示。

![图4-2 第一步：去掉中心化平台后用户数据的状态](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bzURnhaaRi5-vApD855dZ.png?height=751&width=664)

很显然这不是我们想要的结果。怎么办呢？中心化平台是通过注册，填写用户昵称、头像、电话以及邮件等授予用户一个平台内的身份，这个身份其实也不真正属于用户。而在Web3.0中却是利用区块链地址去唯一标识用户，用户的身份、内容、数字资产、社交关系、链上行为都跟这个地址关联。只要拥有这个地址的私钥，你就拥有这个地址的一切数据，从而再次建立起用户跟自己身份、数据的关联。这是第二步，如图4-3所示。

![图4-3 第二步：用区块链地址标识并关联用户身份和数据](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Yn2w5Vfq8RJDruLJPmWVE.png?height=908&width=678)

至此，中心化平台已经不能任意的控制用户的身份和数据了，用户已经获得自主权，可以控制、管理自己的链上数据，但仍未展现出“去中心化社交网络图谱”最基本的原型，因为用户之间还未建立联系和交互。就如Uniswap、Compound、AAVE这些现象级的DeFi应用，虽然拥有大量的用户，但项目方仍然需要回到Twitter、微信这样的中心化平台去获取用户、运营社区，而用户之间也不能在Dapp业务层面直接交流互动。

接下来需要解决的问题就变得显然，就是如何建立起用户之间的“去中心化社交关系”，从而呈现“去中心化社交网络图谱”原型。这里介绍的就是目前大多数社交网络协议采用的方法--NFT模块化。这是第三步，如图4-4所示。

![图4-4 第三步：以NFT模块化用户身份、数据和社交关系](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fI8qrJNCLtam2LMrGYViN.png?height=833&width=650)

NFT是非同质化代币（Non-Fungible Token）的缩写,意思是每一个Token都是不一样的。这种特性非常适合将用户地址、身份、创作的内容、链上行为、数字资产以及社交关系等链上数据整体打包为一个NFT，不仅将“所有权还给用户”，真正实现用户拥有、用户控制，并且可以随着用户链上数据、行为变化而动态变化。更重要的是，NFT本身是加密数字资产，可以实现用户身份及数据资产化，继而参与流通和交易，为用户创造价值、价值变现和获得价值分配开启一条有效的途径。

**在这里，去中心化社交网络图谱包含三个基本的组成部分，即Profile（身份）、Follower（关注者）以及Following（关注）：**

* Profile用NFT表达为ProfileNFT,包含用户地址、个人信息、创作内容以及数字资产等；
* 而Follower NFT记录了他人关注你而产生的社交关系,如张三以地址A关注了你，张三就铸造了一个跟地址A关联的你的Follower NFT;这个NFT被张三拥有，但你可以控制发行数量及内容等。
* Following NFT则记录你关注别人而产生的社交关系，你拥有的Following NFT数量代表你关注了多少其他人。

通过以上三步，我们构建出“用户身份+好友关系”的去中心化社交网络图谱基本原型。基于这个原型，社区用户可以开始构建属于自己的社交网络，内容创作者可以发布拥有版权并获得价值分配的创作内容，开发者则可以专注DApp的开发，并无需许可集成社交网络图谱而快速获得用户规模增长。当然这个原型要对用户、开发者更友好，功能更强大，则需要基于其上添加其他“乐高”模块，这部分内容将在其他文章中详细分析，请关注公众号BluemountainLabs发布的相关内容。

## .5.展望：社交网络图谱将为DApp带来强劲增长

我们引用一张架构图以帮助读者更好地理解社交网络图谱协议在整个加密行业中所处的位置,并对社交网络图谱协议对DApp的作用进行总结性的梳理。

![图5-1 加密行业整体架构图（图片来自IOBC Capital）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vykb-zi4JeQfX-1K0ae78.png?height=535&width=1001)

在如图5-1所示“加密行业整体架构”的拼图中，从下往上各个层级仍在持续扩展和完善，去中心化社交网络图谱是整个拼图中非常重要的基础组件，并在去中心化身份（DID）、数据所有权、社交关系、价值传导等方面为DApp注入新的生命力，赋能DApp的发展。

1. **用户拥有去中心化统一身份**

   在Web2.0中，用户并不真正拥有自己的身份。每个产品的账户信息都是孤立的，用户必须在每个网站或应用程序上创建数十个账户和密码对，不安全、无法迁移、不方便且低效。

   在诸如5Degrees、Cyberconnect这样的Web3.0社交网络协议中，提供了Profile NFT，以此建立统一的去中心化身份系统，不再依赖于任何应用平台。Profile NFT是一种表达身份概况信息的NFT，其包含了钱包地址、头像、昵称、Twitter账户、邮箱地址以及个人资料等，用户可以编辑、控制自己的Profile NFT，拥有完全的自主权。
2. **将数据所有权还给用户**

   Web2.0社交网络都是从其中心化数据库中读取数据，用户的个人资料、创建的内容和社交关系将存储在特定网络中并归运营商所有，缺乏可移植性和可控性。

   去中心化社交网络中，个人数据和资产是跟钱包地址关联的。当用户跟某一个中心化平台或去中心化DApp交互时，产生新的数据，这些数据虽然也跟平台和DApp有关，但会成为跟该钱包地址紧密关联的数据记录。这些数据记录可以在该地址对应的浏览器中查询，也可以授权一些专门的数据或者资产管理平台进行管理，成为个人拥有的行为、数据或者资产记录。
3. **数据资产化**

   用户身份、个人资料、创作内容以及社交关系等作为跟用户强关联的数据，如果不能整体化，是很难释放出数据的价值。而去中心化社交网络图谱本质上是一个用户数据所有权协议，通过该协议可以将用户核心数据资产化（即NFT化），以此将数据所有权还给用户，打开用户捕获价值的空间，也为DApp创新带来更多可行性。
4. **价值创造和分配**

   去中心化社交图谱协议让用户数据资产化，使得用户主动创造具有所有权和控制权的数据资产变得可行，并在数据资产流通中获得收益分配。比如迈克尔•乔丹限量发行1000个超级VIP Profile NFT，每个NFT需要10万美金铸造。一方面迈克尔•乔丹实现个人数据资产总价值1亿美金的回报；另一方面，授权NFT铸造者某些商业运作权利，并规定从商业回报中获取10%的利润分配。
5. **开放的社交网络**

   中心化社交网络在跨平台社交方面是封闭的，具体表现比如Meta（原Facebook）中的用户身份和社交关系是无法直接带入微信朋友圈的，跨越平台，意味着身份和关系重建。

   在去中心化社交图谱中，用户可以因为自己和他人关注而铸造出Follower NFT和Following NFT，形成用户拥有和控制的社交关系网络。用户可以添加、修改、删除、授权相关内容和权限，并自由地在各种DApp之间转移自己的社交网络，真正做到“我创建、我拥有、我控制、我收益”。
6. **Web2.0的用户迁移桥梁**

   Web3.0是未来，Web2.0是现实，Web3.0的发展不应也不能抛开Web2.0而独立发展，相反Web2.0的“他山之石”可以“攻Web3.0之玉”。

   去中心化社交网络可以担当起Web2.0与Web3.0用户迁移的桥梁。比如在5Degees中可以看到“Web3.0社交桥梁”这一应用，这是Web2.0 用户（如Twitter用户）进入Web3.0的门户，也为现有的Web3.0用户提供了将Web2.0人脉资源连接到Web3.0 的渠道。

   成功的用户获取和留存可以显著提高Web3系统对开发人员和贡献者的内在激励，从而为系统带来更大的价值、最终吸引更多的用户等。
7. **聚合链上链下数据**

   去中心化社交网络还可以聚合链上链下数据。比如Cyberconnect Indexer可以索引来自IPFS网络、区块链网络（如Ethereum和Solana）的原始数据，并从Rarible、Twitter、NFTBank等平台获取链下数据。从而为DApp构建完整的数据图谱。
8. **社交网络+DApp**

   去中心化社交网络图谱作为基础组件协议有助于推动“社交网络+”模式，加速与多链生态各种应用集成。各类初创DApp借助社交图谱可以快速获得用户，完成冷启动，从而只需专注于应用的构建。同时各类现象级DApp背后都有巨大流量，所以去中心化社交图谱集成DApp其实就是增加商业渠道，批量引流，快速扩大社交网络规模，相互形成正向循环。

最后，我们还是需要提醒一下，虽然去中心化社交网络是目前的热门赛道，受到越来越多的投资方和开发者的重视，出现了诸如5Degrees、Lens Protocol、Cyberconnect、RSS3、Relation等不错社交网络图谱协议，其发展前景可期。但目前该赛道仍然处于初期阶段，在用户规模、进入门槛、用户友好、应用场景等方面还有很大的提升空间，去中心化还有相当长的路要走。这个赛道跟整个加密行业一样，每天都在快速变化，风险和机遇并存，困难与成就随行。作为web3.0社交网络的研究和实践者，我们会持续关注该领域项目及团队的进展，努力为大家呈现出清晰的概念以及演化路径。当然，文中若有陈述有误、表达不清或者有异议的地方也欢迎大家批评指正，期待与您一起收获行业发展和自我成长的价值。

title: TARS Biweekly Newsletter: June 27 to July 10,2022 - TARS Protocol 🪐
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*HepgJnd8GWT2PHWa7rMLWA.jpeg)

Greetings from the TARS Team!

Over the past few weeks we have crossed milestones and received huge support from the entire TARS community. We have covered some noteworthy events during the past weeks and would like to share the same with the community. [**TARS**](https://tars.pro/?utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)** aims to provide a simple, safe, and collaborative infrastructure for crypto users to rebuild influence and trust on Web3.**

Here is a quick synopsis of all that happened in the past weeks at TARS Protocol!

## **Operational Updates**

**TARS collaborated with CyberConnect**

On Jun 26, TARS collaborated with **CyberConnect**, which is a decentralized social graph protocol that shall help dApps adapt the network effects and help build a personalized social experience.

Click [here](https://twitter.com/tarsprotocol/status/1541112374488203264?s=20\&t=f_duQJRks2tfUQOnmn1\__w\&utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to read more about the collaboration.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*lF0lP3pvsH8Ahk2NpMg3yQ.jpeg)

**TARS Rewards Distribution**

The distribution of rewards for the **TARS Protocol Airdrops** took place on July 4 and the campaign has been completed successfully!

1000 Random winners’ wallet addresses were collected, 50 referrers’ wallet addresses and 100 lucky wallet addresses for the distribution of NFTs.

A total of **2,500 BUSD & 100 NFTs** were distributed in terms of rewards.

Where in the BUSD Airdrops were done and the NFTs shall be sent out soon. Stay tuned for the upcoming updates.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*V7UP1CUqABcCNSIJwYSFwA.jpeg)

**TARS issued a Biweekly Newsletter**

A recap of the newly introduced **TARS Biweekly Newsletter** for the following two weeks- June 13 to June 26.

Don’t forget to check out all the interesting events that took place in the past two weeks at TARS Protocol and don’t forget to subscribe to the Newsletter.

Click [here ](https://blog.tars.pro/tars-biweekly-newsletter-june-13-june-26-2022-df233e37fb2a?utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)to read more.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*i8v2bRmr-XVgUWGVCUy08w.jpeg)

**Major Milestones**

**TARS Launched Claimer**

We’re delighted to share this big news with the entire community that we have made an official announcement about the launch of our another killer feature “**Claimer**” powered by Dynamic Penalty Function (DPF).

With TARS Claimer you can easily create your own claiming rules without any coding skills and the feature shall be officially launched next week.

So excited to share the news with the entire community! Stay Tuned!

title: The four most time-wasting things in life, are you doing it?
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pZzq4HX1LVtjciYBTpYlU.png?height=266&width=462)

If you say that doing something is a waste of time, then it specifically means that you can neither gain anything nor solve the real problem by doing it, and waste time and energy in vain. If this is the case, why do it? Stop it, a finite life cannot be an infinite waste of time.

worry

Being mediocre is embarrassing yourself, making yourself tense and worrying every day, and it will only make you physically and mentally exhausted. There will always be variables in life, there will always be wind and rain, and no one can predict everything in advance. So, instead of worrying and worrying about yourself, it is better to let yourself live every day with ease, let nature take its course, face everything calmly, and don’t let worry imprison your body and your heart.

complain

A life full of complaints will gradually drift away from happiness. Dissatisfaction with the environment, dissatisfaction with others, dissatisfaction with fate, dissatisfaction with reality, and finally dissatisfaction with your own choices and decisions... Complaining will weaken your strength to struggle, hinder your progress, and make you fall into negative emotions and cannot extricate yourself. . Try to let yourself face all the wind and rain bravely and calmly, accept every decision you make, even if the process is full of hardships, don't give up easily, let alone hold back and feel sorry for yourself.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DpTOOCOyyGvEz8CMLd6O4.png?height=266&width=420)

complain

When things go wrong, blame others first; if things go wrong, complain about conditions first. This is a passive attitude towards life and a manifestation of lack of responsibility. Complaining doesn't help at all, it just makes you lose sight of your own problems and your mistakes. Smart people will know how to reflect on themselves first and find answers from themselves. Only with this positive attitude to face the problems encountered in life can you learn lessons, gain experience, and make you go more smoothly in your future life.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e__fpckfYEaewDO-DiHgJ.png?height=266&width=420)

Compare

In life, it is the right way to feel happy or unhappy, satisfied or unsatisfied, or happy or unhappy. Don't get caught up in constant comparisons with others, don't disrupt your pace because of others. Everyone has their own opportunities and blessings, and they will also encounter their own ups and downs. Don’t compare the achievements and glory of others with your own, don’t blindly follow or imitate other people’s lifestyles and forget your original intentions and pursuits. Listen more to your heart, think more about your own needs, walk your own way, and live your own life.

title: Fewer new single-family homes in the pipeline
body:
### Fewer new single-family homes in the pipeline

The drop in construction starts was most concentrated among single-family units, which were down 15.7% from a year ago.

The number of permits for construction of single-family homes and some multi-family buildings also fell in June from May, on a seasonally-adjusted basis. All new building permits fell 0.6% from May while single-family permits dropped more significantly by 8%. Compared to a year ago, all permits are actually up 1.4%, but those for single-family homes are down 11.4%

Multi-family building continues on largely because rents are so high.

"Given that nationwide rents have grown by 14% or more year-over-year in each month of 2022 so far and that active for-sale inventory is 28% higher than last year, it's unsurprising that builders are currently more keen on multi-family rental construction," said Berner.

This construction slowdown comes even as the price of lumber bottomed out in June, Berner said. But the relief in those prices might not last long.

"With lumber prices creeping back up in July and homebuyer demand being stifled by the rising cost of financing a home purchase, it's unlikely that much progress will be made toward closing the housing supply gap any time soon," Berner said. "In the meantime, prospective first-time homebuyers who are taking a pause from their search may find more options to rent if multifamily projects continue to receive more attention from builders."

title: Builders/Wells
body:
Home builders are hitting the brakes as building costs rise and prospective buyers get priced out of the market.

June housing starts, a measure of new home construction during the month, fell 2% month-over-month and 6.3% from a year ago, according to the US Census Bureau.

Meanwhile, a separate survey released Monday found builder confidence this month plunged to its lowest level since the spring of 2020. The National Association of Home Builders/Wells Fargo Housing Market Index is meant to gauge market conditions and looks at current sales, buyer traffic and the outlook for sales over the next six months.

* 

"Production bottlenecks, rising home building costs and high inflation are causing many builders to halt construction because the cost of land, construction and financing exceeds the market value of the home," said Jerry Konter, NAHB chairman and a home builder and developer from Savannah, Georgia.

* 

The building slowdown comes as rising mortgage rates and home prices continue to discourage potential buyers, said Joel Berner, senior economic research analyst for Realtor.com.

title: But this design
body:
But this design element ended up making the keyboards prone to trapping dust and debris. Customers have long complained about the apparent faultiness of the keyboards and its sticky or easily-broken keys. An intentionally typo-ridden Wall Street Journal column in 2019 famously [slammed the keyboards' flaws](https://www.wsj.com/graphics/apple-still-hasnt-fixed-its-macbook-keyboard-problem/), and an influential tech blogger called the keyboards the ["worst products in Apple history"](https://daringfireball.net/linked/2019/03/27/strn-kyboard) that same year.

* 

Under the proposed settlement, customers who had to replace multiple keyboards can expect payouts up to $395 and those who had a single keyboard replaced can expect around $125, according to the filing. Customers who had obtained key cap replacements can expect a $50 payout.

* 

Apple did not immediately respond to CNN Business' request for comment Tuesday. As part of the settlement agreement, Apple denied any wrongdoing and denied that any MacBooks are defective.

title: these homes
body:
"Significant segments of the homebuying population are priced out of the market," said Robert Dietz, NAHB's chief economist. "Policymakers must address supply issues to help builders produce more affordable housing."

As builders halt or slow new construction, it will weigh even further on the housing market. Housing inventory was already extremely tight, pushing home prices higher. Slowing the supply of new homes will make it even worse.

New homes that are on the market are selling swiftly in 2.4 months. The norm is around 3 to 4 months, said Lawrence Yun, chief economist at the National Association of Realtors.

"Homebuilders have been facing supply-chain disruptions and many homes started multiple months ago have yet to be completed," said Yun. "Homebuilders are waiting to see how these homes will sell before starting new construction.

* 

But overall affordability constraints may push more buyers into renting, he said.

"Housing supply challenges will continue in the coming months and into next year," said Yun.

1. 每个人可以设置邀请链接，每邀请一个新人完成一笔任意的转账就可以提升你的推荐人等级
2. 推荐人等级关乎到你和新人的返佣。最高是白金返佣比例80%（推荐人60%，新人20%）
3. **现在是属于3倍返佣的情况，所以现在刷是最划算的！**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OUFpAA2RxO-zouede1zL9.png?height=454&width=1400)

### 操作思路：

账号准备：准备1个主钱包w1，n个子钱包w2-wn，子钱包可以直接从小狐狸钱包生成。

w1先做一次跨链，推荐把Eth在Aritrum、Optimism、Polygon之间跨，成本比较低。

w1做完跨链然后去Rewards生成一个推广链接，记到小本本上，后面的小号都是从这个推广链接进入，加下来就是小号开刷。

大概思路就是w1操作完跨链后，资金转到w2，钱包切换到w2；重新开一个页面用w1的链接进入，连接w2的钱包，操作跨链。资金转到w3，钱包切换到w3...以此类推

### 实操步骤：

1. w1钱包eth从Op跨到Arb，跨链完成后断开钱包连接，关掉页面。

![跨链](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6w7vrGr7avg5bGmLR7LfN.png?height=1800&width=3124)

![查看进度](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WvFtGnF52i6h2yPex5TqC.png?height=802&width=3296)

2\. 钱包网络从Op切换到Arb，把eth转到下一个钱包。

**3. 用推广链接打开新的页面**，重新链接钱包w2。把eth从Arb跨到Op，跨链完成后断开钱包连接，关掉页面。

![链接钱包](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RvxjYtxp1Rx9mi6sSI5u0.png?height=1218&width=902)

4\.钱包网络从Arb切换到Op，把eth转到下一个钱包w3。以此往复..

title: Control emotion
body:
You're driving to work when a car cuts into your driveway and nearly hits your car. You go crazy right away, and it starts you off with a bad omen.
​​

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jVRpeQYIirSNbMjW0RFuq.png?height=270&width=384)


A colleague of yours called and said he was sick again, which means you'll be doing double work for the third time this month. Your own life has piled up, and you have to finish hers. You head to the manager's room, ready to explode.
​​
You bought a ticket to watch it with your family, but the dark clouds above your head are getting thicker and thicker, which disrupts your plans. Your child is disappointed, and you curse God for ruining your day.
​​
It would be great if you could control your emotions and get rid of these or other similar things that might happen, wouldn't it? It's natural to feel annoyed when things don't go as planned. But often, we overreact and create a domino effect that keeps us from seeing the bright side of things.
​​

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1zgY1108W-J7pWvC9b0vR.png?height=270&width=390)


Former world heavyweight boxing champion George Foreman had a good point: "Being angry and unhappy with someone is like letting it live in your head for free."
​​
Controlling emotions is a challenge for people of all ages. But it's totally doable! You are the only one directly responsible for your emotions. You are responsible for your actions and responses, and no one can make you respond a certain way.
​​
"The greatest discovery of my generation is that people can change the outer aspects of their lives by changing the inner attitude of their minds." The American philosopher William James once said at the end of the 19th century. Obviously, this problem has existed for a long time.
​​
Fortunately, there are some very effective ways to manage your emotions. Of course, this takes practice. But the payoff is unmistakable, and you will thank yourself for it. Here are a few areas to practice:
​​

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dlP3XfHgpl8iDlptW7037.png?height=270&width=373)

1. Develop good self-care habits. Take care of your physical, emotional and spiritual needs. People who do this regularly will be better able to deal with negativity. And will not pose a threat to others.
   ​​
2. Identify feelings of anger and frustration - mentally and physically. The chances of acting recklessly are much greater if one is disconnected from one's own feelings.
   ​​
3. Get out of the tension and go for a walk. Take the necessary time to process feelings and emotions. Time may be enough for a deep breath, or a slow count of 10.
   ​​
4. Confess your emotions to those who are willing to listen but not judge.
   ​​
5. Find a temporary distraction to do. This refers to doing something that gets your mind off the topic.
   ​​
6. Take action. Think about how you can positively change the situation, and then take action to solve the problem.
   ​​
7. Talk to those who can help you achieve change about your desire to make a change.
   ​​
8. The mind should be "right", not "wrong".
   ​​
   Here is a story worth thinking about: a shop run by a gardener, handed down by their family for generations. It is remembered that this generation of shop owners and previous generations were very positive people. Most people think it's because they run a successful store. In fact, the opposite is true.
   ​​
   The shop has a tradition that the owner always wears a large badge on the lapel with the words "Business is good" on it. Although they are going through tough times just like everyone else, the attitude and badge of the shopkeeper never change.
   ​​
   When everyone sees this badge for the first time, they all ask, "How good is the business?"
   ​​
   After the badge sparked a conversation, the flower shop owner would tell a lot about the positive aspects of his business and work. Even people who feel miserable will feel much happier after listening to a few minutes of this infectious and optimistic shopkeeper.
   ​​
   It's hard to give a measure of this attitude, but in a way, it may be a self-fulfilling prophecy. The owner once said frankly: "With this badge, good business will follow." In fact, when it comes to our lives and our lives, why not?

### 活动详解

1. 每个人可以设置邀请链接，每邀请一个新人完成一笔任意的转账就可以提升你的推荐人等级
2. 推荐人等级关乎到你和新人的返佣。最高是白金返佣比例80%（推荐人60%，新人20%）
3. **现在是属于3倍返佣的情况，所以现在刷是最划算的！**
4. 返佣等级升级规则如下图（邀请新人和交易量达标任选其一完成即可提升）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OUFpAA2RxO-zouede1zL9.png?height=454&width=1400)

### 操作思路：

账号准备：准备1个主钱包w1，n个子钱包w2-wn，子钱包可以直接从小狐狸钱包生成。

w1先做一次跨链，推荐把Eth在Aritrum、Optimism、Polygon之间跨，成本比较低。

w1做完跨链然后去Rewards生成一个推广链接，记到小本本上，后面的小号都是从这个推广链接进入，加下来就是小号开刷。

大概思路就是w1操作完跨链后，资金转到w2，钱包切换到w2；重新开一个页面用w1的链接进入，连接w2的钱包，操作跨链。资金转到w3，钱包切换到w3...以此类推

### 实操步骤：

1. w1钱包eth从Op跨到Arb，跨链完成后断开钱包连接，关掉页面。

![跨链](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6w7vrGr7avg5bGmLR7LfN.png?height=1800&width=3124)

![查看进度](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WvFtGnF52i6h2yPex5TqC.png?height=802&width=3296)

2\. 钱包网络从Op切换到Arb，把eth转到下一个钱包。

**3. 用推广链接打开新的页面**，重新链接钱包w2。把eth从Arb跨到Op，跨链完成后断开钱包连接，关掉页面。

![链接钱包](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RvxjYtxp1Rx9mi6sSI5u0.png?height=1218&width=902)

4\.钱包网络从Arb切换到Op，把eth转到下一个钱包w3。以此往复..

title: Weeks after Daily
body:
Weeks after Daily Harvest announced the [voluntary recall](http://www.cnn.com/2022/06/27/tech/daily-harvest-recall-influencers/index.html) of its French Lentil and Leek Crumbles, the company said on Tuesday that it had identified the ingredient suspected to be causing the [mysterious illness](https://www.cnn.com/2022/07/01/tech/daily-harvest-recall-lawsuits/index.html) reported by hundreds of customers.

"At this time, we have identified tara flour as the cause of the issue," Daily Harvest founder and CEO Rachel Drori said in a [company blog post](https://www.daily-harvest.com/content/french-lentil-leek-crumbles-advisory#) Tuesday afternoon. Tara flour is made from the seeds of tara trees, which are native to South America.

"This was the first and only time we've used tara flour, which has been available and used in the North American market as a plant-based source of protein prior to our use," Drori added. "Our investigation team will continue working with the \[US Food and Drug Administration\], the tara flour producer and others to help determine what specifically made people sick."

* 

The FDA said in a statement last week that its "investigation is ongoing" into the reports of illness linked to the product.

title: 收入 = 感动×人数
body:
松浦弥太郎先生说：“收入 = 感动×人数”。

人数即市场，感动即创意。
收入不是你付出多少，而是你感动人数的多少。
过去，对商品的价格不是成本决定，而是需求决定的，这句话深信不疑。
其实决定商品价格和我们收入的是，感动的人数。

因为，需求是可以被创造出来的，如果乔布斯没有创作出苹果手机这个需求，我们那里知道我们会需要这个玩意儿。
如果不是被苹果的电子产品，惊艳，感动到我们怎么会不惜去卖肾，也要拥有它呢？

如果不是演员感动的人数足够多，他们怎么会有巨额收入呢？
最夸张的足球明星，动辄上千万上亿的转会费，为什么？
因为，他们感动了全世界，让全世界为之疯狂，所以收入也很让人感动。

以前，有人告诉我，想要在你的工作中更值钱，最好的方法是，成为一个不可替代的人，或者最少是一个不容易被替代的人，尽量不要去做，别人稍加训练，就能做的工作，比如，保洁、外卖员。

现在，发现让自己更值钱的方法只有一个，就是增加自己的影响力，让自己触达，感动更多人，比如，写文章、短视频、直播。

当我们工作时，想一想怎么让我们的工作，触达更多人，感动更多人。
想一想，你的产品和服务，怎么触达和感动更多人。

title: AltLayer团队介绍
body:
参考资料：[AltLayer中文小助手](https://medium.com/@AltLayerCN?source=post_page-----8e3f74d47f6--------------------------------) [Altlayer官方medium](https://medium.com/@altlayer)

引言：2022.7.1日消息Altlayer完成了**由 Polychain Capital、Breyer Capital 和 Jump Crypto 牵头的 720 万美元种子轮融资。**

项目背景可谓相当丰富令人振奋：

***前 Coinbase 首席技术官和 a16z GP Balaji Srinivasan，Circle 联合创始人兼 USDC 架构师 Sean Neville，以太坊联合创始人兼 Parity Technologies 首席执行官 Gavin Wood，Messari 创始人 Ryan Selkis，Synthetix 联合创始人 Kain Warwick 和 Jordan Momtazi（Bodhi Ventures），前 Polychain GP Tekin Salimi (DAO5)*** 等也以天使身份参与投资\*\*\*。\*\*\*

**团队**

AltLayer 项目由 Parity Asia 前总监、Zilliqa 联合创始人/CTO 贾耀奇博士领导。该团队由区块链资深人士和屡获殊荣的研究人员组成，他们曾在 Parity、Zilliqa 和 Synthetix 工作过。

### 关于创始人的背景，这里值得单独一提，在2022年之前，他还是在Parity Asia任职总经理，为他进入Web3提供了很好的资源。Yaoqi曾在2019年入选福布斯30以下亚洲30强榜单，他曾参与过东南亚的加密货币交易所等项目。

      在2018年以前，他是新加坡国立大学的研究员，拥有计算机博士学位。他的介绍中说：他的研究兴趣涵盖区块链安全、分布式系统安全、网络安全/隐私和网络安全等领域。他已经从网络和系统两个角度提出了保护网络基础设施的解决方案，例如，解决网络覆盖中的隐私/共识问题以及识别网络浏览器中的新攻击/漏洞。与此同时，Yaoqi的研究工作已发表在 CCS、USENIX Security、PETS、RAID、ESORICS 等。获得了 W2SP (2014) 和 ICCCS (2014) 的最佳论文奖。他的工作得到了包括谷歌和苹果在内的多家供应商的认可（Chrome 为 CVE-2014–7948，Safari 为 CVE-2015–5907），并受到了 Dailydot、Gizmodo 和 Techspot 等媒体的关注。

    由此看来，Alt Research（AltLaehyzer的开发团队）是一个很年轻的团队。

**投资人对Altlayer的评价：**

Polychain的合伙人**Ben Perszyk**评论了这项投资：“通用链提供了一个共享的区块空间模型，这通常会导致一个流行的 dApp 为自己消耗不成比例的区块空间份额，而其他 dApp 的用户由于增加汽油费和结算时间。我们相信，特定于应用程序的执行层为流行的 dApp 面临的可扩展性挑战提供了一种模块化、可定制的解决方案。因此，我们很高兴能够支持 AltLayer 团队的愿景，即为整个生态系统中的 dApp 开发人员带来独特的汇总即服务扩展解决方案。”

         **Breyer Capital**创始人**Jim Breyer**表示：“ AltLayer正在为 web3 公司构建独特的扩展解决方案——帮助他们更好地为用户服务，甚至在区块链上部署 Web2 应用程序。我们很高兴成为这一轮的一部分，我们期待支持该公司，因为他们渴望成为多链世界的领导者。”

      既然这么多行业头部机构纷纷看好并拿出现金进行了支持投资，我们有理由看好并积极参与到项目中来。

title: tea drinker
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dWdPGtWc2PPGEahOa7t0D.png?height=266&width=474)

I have been idle at home recently, sometimes a small dish of peanuts, a few good songs, and a few magazines can have a comfortable afternoon. Sometimes I occasionally step into a teahouse not far from my home to feel the different leisure and elegance.
​​
The tea is fragrant and the guzheng is lingering. There are many people who come here to taste tea, including some urban young people. They wear masks in their daily life and experience too much flattery, intrigue, and only It can make their hearts calm like the tea in this cup.
​​
The two elders sat opposite each other, and in front of them was an unfinished chess game. I think, here, for them, they may not only taste the tea in their hands, but also play the chess in front of them.
​​
In addition to drinking tea, I often hear: "Life is a dream, and tears are a thousand lines." then. Someone else said: "I've been wandering all my life, and it's almost sunset. I feel homesick and heartbroken. I dare to ask where is the road?" Yes, where is the road? What do teahouses and tea mean to tea drinkers?
​​
Perhaps, for urban youth, the teahouse is their post station;
​​
Perhaps, for the weather-beaten old people, tea is the precipitation of their years!
​​
Sometimes people who mix tea come to mix tea, look at the cup of tea that is getting full, and finally can't hold it, it overflows, I understand it, I finally understand, it turns out that the cup is only so big, and it can only hold so much. , it will only overflow for a long time, and the cup of tea in your hand will gradually fade and become dull. Life, why not? Don't hesitate when it's time to let go, but people think that the overflow is superfluous, but it's not, that's called giving up.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WKYveFbiyMDKZzYjfVIWW.png?height=270&width=378)


​​
Those who know how to give up are those who truly know how to cherish!
​​
In fact, from the first time a tea drinker tastes tea, it is not only the tea in their hands, but also the long-lasting tea in life. And people who taste tea can only taste two words for a lifetime: cherish.

title: ERC-4519: Non-Fungible Tokens Tied to Physical Assets (SmartNFT)
body:
Have you ever thought to have an NFT for your house? Maybe NFTs for your cars so you can sell your car using only NFTs, and not going to government for selling your cars. 

Every day smart assets are being introduced to world using Internet of Things (IoT) devices. Houses are now smart, cars are smart, phones are smart, watches are smart, etc. These smart houses can do many things, like providing homeowners security, comfort, convenience and energy efficiency by allowing them to control smart devices, often by a smart home app on their smartphone or other networked device. Smart cars can do many things like “Communicating” Systems for Cars, System of 3D Gestures, Car Integration with Smartwatch, System for Automated Parking, Integration with different Apps, Full Integration with Phones. 

Most important point of them all is “owning”. Owning an asset like a phone or a house has many different aspects. In our “centralised” world owning an asset is having the rights by the government. Government gives you the rights to sell, rent, or even destroy your asset. But in the decentralised world, government is not there to give you rights. Rights of sell, rent, and destroy or other things in the decentralised world is given to you by owning that asset. Owning in this world means differently from the centralised world. Owning an asset is having the asset in your wallet address. 

In the world of decentralisation, a virtual asset is an NFT that you own in your wallet. But what if you want to own your house or car as an NFT? ERC 721 or ERC 1155 that are described in [this article](https://mirror.xyz/0x2d209040c031d4e2D4d9cb4D3aabf18F52260AB0/YLdBJP9rIqzVc2vYH4LTC5rUwSdAst96F5IN8QhpWIw) cannot fulfil this action. They can not tie to real assets in the world. So another Ethereum standard is needed to tie NFTs to real assets. 

This standard is the [ERC 4519](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4519) standard, or as the call it “SmartNFT”. A SmartNFT is tied to a physical asset that can check if the tie is authentic or not. The SmartNFT can include an Ethereum address of the physical asset and, consequently, the physical asset can sign messages or transactions. The physical asset can operate with an operating mode that is defined by its SmartNFT with an attribute named state. The token state can define if the token owner or the token user can use the asset or not. A cryptographically secure mutual authentication process can be carried out between the physical asset and its owner or its user. SmartNFTs extend [ERC 721](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-721) non-fungible tokens, which only allow representing assets by a unique identifier, but not by an Ethereum address. Moreover, SmartNFTs extend ERC 721 NFTs to include users in addition to owners.

This SmartNFT was developed because the ERC 721 NFT does not include the users of an asset (only include the owners) and does not include the Ethereum address of the asset. Smart assets (for example, IoT devices) are increasing nowadays. If smart assets are tied to SmartNFTs then they can be managed in a secure and traceable way. The reason is that SmartNFTs, unlike ERC 721 NFTs, allow establishing secure communication channels between the physical asset and its owner and its user. In this way, assets, owners and users can be assured of exchanging information with trusted parties.

title: 不知不觉中，有些资产已经在熊市涨了一个月
body:
**注：本文仅为学习参考之用，不形成投资建议，且代表分享者个人观点及其利益立场。投资有风险，请评估个人风险承受能力，审慎做出投资决策。**

**作者：0x499｜推特@0x499**

**7 月 19 日，0x499 举行 了Twitter Space 线上直播，本期是加密货币行情专场，主题是“不知不觉中，有些资产已经在熊市涨了一个月”，共邀请了五位嘉宾参与圆桌讨论，分别是：Bill（Co-founder of DeCentralized VC）、潜水观察员（@connectfarm1）、匿名博士（Chris_Defi）、Jimmy（@CryptosLaowai）、大君（加密分析师）。这是0x499旗下 DeTalks 栏目第 24 期，主持人是 Linda Jiang（MEXC Global Listing Manager）。**

**Linda Jiang（MEXC Global Listing Manager）**

大家好，我是 Linda ，主要在 MEXC 负责 Global Listing 的工作，欢迎大家来到今天由 0x499 举办的 Twitter Space。我们知道比特币已经在 20000 美金横盘很久，后续会是一个什么样的行情走向，今天邀请几位嘉宾来共同参与讨论，首先请他们来进行以下自我介绍。

**Bill（Co-founder of DeCentralized VC）**

大家好，我是从 2020 年中期开始 DeFi 的第一批玩家，目前主要是做一些分析研究工作，寻找好的投资标的。很高兴今天有机会跟大家交流，一个是如何在熊市中生存下来，另外是如何在下一波牛市来临的时候获得最大回报。

**大君（加密分析师）**

大家好，我也是 0x499 的老朋友了，目前是一个加密分析师，之前是每天在微信视频做直播，给大家分析行情和一级二级市场，现在是每周四做一次，平时输出主要在 Twitter 和 视频号。

**潜水观察员（@connectfarm1）**

大家好，我是一个种子投资基金的联合创始人，也是 Avatar DAO 的联创之一，我们主要关注一级市场项目，我个人的喜好是 NFT，是一些项目的早期参与者。

**Linda Jiang（MEXC Global Listing Manager）**

我们看到 BTC 已经在 20000 美金附近横盘很久了，作为加密市场的风向标，BTC 仍然占据整个加密货币市值的 40% 以上，大家都很关心接下来的行情走向，各位嘉宾怎么看？

**Bill（Co-founder of DeCentralized VC）**

对于 BTC 的价格行情走势来说，我觉得如果你是长期价值投资者，可能不是太重要，你可以采取定投或者越低越买的策略来进行操作。比特币的走势首先是受整个大经济环境的影响，第二是目前加密货币行情走势很低，BTC 在美股里面算一支大型股票，同时又完全没有监管，我觉得是很容易被人操控的。对于这样的资产，无论你是去套用周期理论还是技术分析，都会产生有的时候对、有的时候不对的结果，到最后发现无论如何都很难去解释。在这种情况下我们去预测一周、两周甚至一个月的走势是很难的，但是从减半节点、经济带宽等相对长远的指标来分析的话，相对来说会更加准确一点。

我用的分析方法都是采信至少三年以上的。因此短期来说很难判断，长期来说比如 2024 年减半会是一个比较好的话题，通常是牛市信号比较明确的时间点。作为长期价值投资者，你应该把握住减半前半年的时间点入场，做好自己的策略去执行投资行为。

**潜水观察员（@connectfarm1）**

虽然我个人基本不碰二级市场，但是通过观察二级市场，能够给一级市场很多指导。我记得当时在 6 月 26 号的时候，我们认为七八月份会有一波行情，研判的依据也比较简单，就是情绪和人心，情绪是投资者对市场上所有信息的终极反应，当时推特上有些人就已经低落到聊生死大事了，这个情况下肯定是个低谷，如果你问这一轮熊有没有到位，我觉得还没有，如果大家都觉得熊市结束、牛市要回来的时候，我会非常果断地去做一个波段。

我们自己是长期持有 BNB 和 ETH，这不在我们操作仓位里面。我觉得之后的行情还是受大环境影响很明显的，像美股和美国经济、中国房地产、印度外汇，全球各个国家有各自的问题。如果这一轮金融去杠杆没有完完全全地到位，这种情况我认为不会迎来一个根本性转变，我们依然要去观察传统金融市场的走向，比如美国还没有大型银行发生倒闭挤兑，那这一轮危机可能就没结束，中国仅仅是二三线城市房地产暴跌、一线城市还在涨，再加上疫情的影响，大环境依然很动荡，我觉得最多到年底，不管是以太坊 2.0 是否落地，这一轮反弹都将告一段落，接下来随着整体市场的恶化，会导致进入一个新的混乱期，这是我的判断。

**大君（加密分析师）**

我从合约和期权两个角度分析一下接下来的行情，仅供大家参考。

这两天 ETH 上涨了 40%，原因是 The Merge 在 7 月 14 号的一个利好，还有就是 1.3k-1.5k 期权的购买，整个操盘手是在 FTX，顺带拉爆了其他交易所的合约。我前两天也是发了一个推特，预测 ETH 这一波上涨在 1.3-1.5 附近，昨天是够到了 1.6k，但是没有到 1.7k，实际上技术指标是 1.7 附近。

比特币跟以太坊不一样，受整体大行情影响，它是一个非常成熟的投资标的，最近的利好来自欧债危机，最近欧元指数和美元指数差不多持平了，美元一直在看涨，最近出现了回调，各大股指上涨，特别是美股指数和期货黄金指数，这跟比特币基本上是相对的调整方向。

所以以太坊是由市场行情推动上涨的，比特币是由整体大行情上涨出现了回调。所以这两个是不同阶段涨的，而且涨的逻辑也不一样。接下来的走势我认为还是维持一个熊市的整体局面。上次我来 0x499 参加活动预测的回调价格是 18k，因为这是大旷工舍弃“挖、提、卖”的一个价格。最近的话我觉得可以关注一下 22-25 这个点，但还是提醒大家要注意止损，因为目前整体依然是熊市。

**Linda Jiang（MEXC Global Listing Manager）**

这一波熊市中，ETH回撤力度也非常大，基本上跌去了三分之二。应该来说发展这么多年， ETH 已经是和 BTC 完全不同的应用和估值逻辑，但是 ETH 的价格和一众 ERC20 Token 还是受 BTC 波动的影响很大，你认为未来有可能改变吗？

**匿名博士（Chris_Defi）**

我们看到比特币的市占率在下降。过去如果行情走到深熊的话，一般比特币的市占率是往上走的，虽然这一轮熊市多了很多新的玩法，无论是 DeFi、GameFi 还是公链，但是我依然觉得单一地去看比特币市占率的剧本已经过去了，可能未来我们要看比特币市占率和以太坊市占率的结合，最近的行情都在围绕 2.0 在讲故事，这是以太坊本身内部的叙事。

在这一轮回调之前，其实整个加密货币的行情一直是跟着标普 500 走的，基本上美股现货价格都是由期权推动，现在期权在 3900 多，下方的 3700 有一个非常强的防守位。所以美股也是在一个区间内围绕着一个价格做无规律波动，从周线级别来看，美股最近还没有完全走出来，整个 8 月是处于事件空窗期，9 月可能会有一些大事件。只要美股没有大的下跌动作，或者在某个区间去徘徊的话，加密货币可能就会有一个像样的反弹，我个人倾向于下周会有一个回调，8 月份可能还会继续开启一个反弹。

**Jimmy（@CryptosLaowai）**

我是在中国生活的混血，在北京长大，2016 年大四开始炒币，也是经历过一轮超级大牛市和恶心的熊市这么一个完整的周期。我是一名交易员和分析师，一般都是炒现货，熊市会抄一些期货，但是期货只做空，如果看涨的话会分批买入现货的操作方式。预测对我来说是一个工具，比如说看到在上涨或者下跌 20% 的时候会有很多人暴涨，那我会在那个价格点附近开单，这时候流动性就非常好。另外刚刚 Bill 说的情绪面我觉得也是非常重要的，我主要是看 Twitter 和 Telegram 大群，这里面散户的情绪是非常重要的，一般行情是跟情绪反着走的，这是熊市逻辑，牛市是大家都赚钱，因为大饼是越摊越大。但是熊市主要是场内资金在相互博弈，所以我的思路是跟主流作对，但是这个也分时候。

长期来看，我认为目前是熊市初期，马上要不如熊市中期。初期大家都不认为是熊市，认为是正常回调，反正没有跌破去年 519 的底部，现在还是牛市，在 3w 以上，3.3w-4.8w 那一波震荡，大部分人还是看牛市的。后来我观测的情绪是跌破 2.8w 以后，基本上所有人都默认我们在熊市中，这个没有错。但是当大家都这样转变过来思路的时候，这是熊市中间会出现的“牛陷阱”，在大家觉得牛市就要来了的时候，就是开一个低倍空的时候。

目前这个位置，尤其是前两周，散户的情绪是集体看空，都认为大环境极差，加密圈就是美股，所以你炒币的还看什么 BTC，就看标普 500。但是明显上周出现一些变化，以太坊 2.0 的合并叙事出现了，两三周前我们也说过这件事情，大部分人那个时候觉得 7 月份还是不好的，但是我说可以观测 LDO 这个币，因为它是目前以太 2.0 最大的质押代币，如果这个币技术指标上进入日线级别下跌通道，如果跌破这个通道，肯定就是以太 2.0 叙事开始，所以我在 0.6 的位置特别关注以太坊的动作，果然汇率起来了，差不多是昨天和前天都在找这一波上涨的理由，这就是 2.0 叙事出现了。

我的观点一直没变，七八月份是第一波涨，以太在 2200-2400 之间，9 月合并很有可能会推迟导致回调，这时候大概率会有一个极具看空的情绪，这个其实很好理解，过去六个月从 4800 跌到 880，好不容易有一个利好回弹，结果发现被骗了，这时候可能会跌到四五百，之后再开始反弹，就有一个牛市看涨的情绪了。这个画在图上就是一个 ABC 的三浪调整，我觉得这是一个非常好的工具。

另外我是不看美股指标的，但是我知道这些时间和数据的时间点，但这是一个滞后的指标，反应的是已经发生的数据，一般这些数据放出来，价格会有一个明显波动。对加密圈来说，这主要是一个催化行情的作用，而不会改变行情的方向。

我认为以太和大饼的关系已经发生一个脱钩，这是一个非常好的事情。大饼是没有故事讲的，唯一的就是 ETF，没有升级空间，算是加密圈最稳定的资产。但是以太是有各种各样的发展和用例，我相信在做很多人都没有比特币钱包，有的都是一些老韭菜，以太的用户特别多，网络效应特别强，以太出现独立叙事是标志着币圈在美股之前反弹了，但是大饼比较滞后，大饼没有涨，所以其他的也不会涨，这是一些人唯一看空的理由。

所以 ETH 反弹我认为预示着后半年会有一个比较好的行情，走一个简单的预测，我认为大饼 11 月份会有一个 48000-53000 之间，明年再跌到八九千；ETH 涨到大概 3000-3600 之间，明年会跌到 390，这个跌幅有点大，但是我觉得币圈远远没有跌够，在场还赚钱的人太多了，基本上要回撤 90%，这个熊市才会结束。

所以总体而言我是看好今年，不看好明年，然后 2024-2025 大周期会起来。另外减半不减半对于比特币的价格我认为影响很小，因为币圈是 24 小时交易，不像股市每天只交易几个小时，币牛熊转换周期会很快，熊市大概都是 16-28 个月，跟减半没关系，只是刚好对上。

**大君（加密分析师）**

我并不认为以太会跟大饼脱钩，底层还是以 BTC 作为一个头，因为它毕竟是加密圈底层共识。那这次以太反弹，很多人就会问后续到底是怎么走，看涨还是看跌。首先以太的话，我个人肯定是看好的，今年出来的新项目资金势力都不错，包括 Layer2 的 OP 啊等等，只要以太挺住了，这些代币的价格都不多。另外 ETC 是跟 The Merge 相关的，还有 APE，包括刚刚提到的 LDO，大家都可以去多观察，后续牛市的时候有可能成为新星。但是像之前 Luna 崩盘，我觉得还是跟 BTC 有很大关系。

**Bill（Co-founder of DeCentralized VC）**

对于以太坊，不管是 Layer0、Layer1 或者 Layer2 的前景，我们可能要反过来看。每一波牛市的开启都有它不一样的叙事方式，比如说上一轮的 ICO、这一轮的 Defi，如果下一轮大牛市在两年之后，那个时候叙事方式是从哪个领域出来，这个是很重要的。

根据这个预测，我们可以反推一下有哪些东西还是欠缺的，尤其是在基础公链方面。我们作为散户很多时候是欠缺的，我们可以更加多地以来大 VC 的分析判断，他们经过了 N 多个牛熊的人，创始人是最早一批成功的人，同时扶持了大量的早期项目，所以我相信他们的感觉是比较准的。如果担心只依赖一个 VC 的眼光可能会出错，那可以看多个 VC 有没有共同押宝的赛道。

目前现在大的 VC 都在投 web3。现在 web3 的雏形项目有一些欠缺的东西，第一个是钱包入口的易用性方面，第二个是很多项目在说的公链吞吐量并发量，第三个钱包安全也是非常头疼的问题，这是像 A16Z 等 VC 希望从这些方面能够在未来有所突破。

至于说现在看到的比特币和以太，他们是两种不一样的资产类型，比特是共识堆积起来的价值存储方式，把它类比于黄金是现阶段比较好理解的；以太更多是生态建设催化剂的角色。这两者发展上脱钩是完全有可能的，目前币圈整个 TVL 还很小，如何能够真正吸引大资金进来，假设外汇交易市场有个 20%-50% 用区块链的方式去交易，成本更低效率更高，未来的数字货币市场就完全不一样了，体量是现在的 N 倍。到那种情况下，以太坊作为出圈的价值，潜力会更加大。

**0x499**

在 2021 年的牛市中，很多挑战以太坊的新公链获得了惊人的市值增长，个别公链比如 Solana 依靠链游的成功塑造了高性能的差异化定位，同时近期基于以太坊 Layer2 的项目代币热度很高，是否说明对于公链而言，高 TPS 和高可拓展性依然是支撑估值的关键？

**潜水观察员（@connectfarm1）**

我个人觉得 Layer2 现在是一个打问号的赛道。我没想明白为什么以太坊要转 2.0，更没想明白未来这么多公链有什么用。甚至不以成败论英雄的话，我觉得 ICP 和 Filecoin 提出的东西会更加 make sense 一点。所以终究这是一个情绪和预期主导的世界。比如大家之前说以太坊 2.0 是一个利空，这两天又是一个利好，过段时间又是一个利空。任何一个公链和底层技术都是随机性的，我们今天使用的互联网之前，在它之前可能由另一套协议表现更好，但是人类历史发展是由很多随机性组成的，我在想是不是以太坊当年出来的时候，在世界的另一个角落有一套智能合约技术和框架比以太坊优秀，只是恰好终于跑起来了。

我觉得最重要的一点，是你的生态中究竟能吸引多少人口，如果你从这点来判断，甚至中国的联盟链都有机会。像前两天王老吉这种消费类巨头直接发 NFT，我们看到各种传统势力和巨头不断进来这个行业，最终胜出的未必是现在的以太坊，甚至未必是出自币圈。所以在我看来币圈长线命题不太成立。

我们在思考 web3.0 投资的时候，会更多去想激励层而不是去中心化。比如说 DAO 有多大几率在未来会代替公司，而不是思考一个事情底层能去中心化成为一个什么东西。

**Jimmy（@CryptosLaowai）**

我觉得关键是公链的经济模型，比如 Solana 手续费非常低，但是需要通过无限制增发或者通货膨胀的方式 SOL 代币去给维护网络的节点，如果没有足够多的人去接盘的话，就很难维持价格坚挺。所以我觉得公链更多是 VC 的产物，它不是一个币圈原生的东西。

下一个牛市肯定有 Layer1 故事可讲，在以太坊没有实现分片技术之前，以太坊是 VC 大面积踏空的一个项目，另外那些拿了 VC 钱的项目可能涨了一两轮就涨不动了，但是以太坊可以一直涨下去。这个可能也跟我自己的偏见有关，我在 17 年的时候投了 NEO，后来几乎归零。

我非常同意 Bill 的观点，可以去看 VC 在做什么，我在上一轮牛市中买的币都是听一个 VC 朋友说的，所以大家看到团队特别好的项目可以在不怎么了解的时候，可以放很小的资金去买一点，然后设定一个一到两年的退出周期。

相比于 Layer1，我更看好 Layer2，因为 Layer2 要比 Layer1 容易构建，尤其是 Optimisitic Layer2，比如某一个游戏完全可以把 OP 分叉一个，受益于以太坊的网络效应和安全性，所以 Layer2 会吸引特别多的资金过去。

**0x499**

其他一些板块，比如 NFT、GameFi、元宇宙概念的代币，在熊市结束之前有没有一些结构性投资机会？

**Bill（Co-founder of DeCentralized VC）**

熊市是最好的投资和建设时机，如果你在牛市或者牛市中后期再去投资，通常都会是一个韭菜。以这种投资理念来说，熊市是一个好机会。首先在熊市的时候，有些二级的价格要低于一级的价格，所以你作为一个散户，可以去割 VC 的韭菜，从这个方面来说无论是 NFT、GameFi 还是元宇宙，都可以在深熊的时候可以找到很好的标的。

另外 NFT 项目和 NFT 平台是要区分来看的。图片的话在我看来觉得大多数都是归零的，每天 Opensea 上出来的项目太多了，压中的概率是非常小的，除非你真的把握住背后的团队和文化，一般散户在这方面是蛮难的。所以对 NFT 市场更加建议关注基础建设和工具类产品，熊市是一个最佳时机。比如说 GameFi 里面使用 NFT 的数量是最大的，比如说 Flow 承载了 100 个 NFT 项目，即便是大部分都死掉了，只有一两个跑出来，Flow 依然可以吃到项目增长的红利。

第二个是可以找新的机会，做一级市场，我是传统投资做一级市场出来的，以前传统做一级失败的概率是很高的，但利润优势最丰厚的，如果你看准项目和团队，所以在熊市里面我不会放弃去找优质团队和项目的机会。一级的判断是相当难的，直接去做对方向、人的把握是挑战非常大的，我用的衡量标准就是找这些创业团队的发起人，要求至少在圈里面 4 年以上的连续创业者，选择的方向至少要符合下一个赛道有最大流量增长的那个，那我们就可以去搏一把，同时也要做好评估，不要把鸡蛋放在一个篮子里面，熊市的好处是估值比较低，一般你可以找市场影响力的 VC 一起投，每个 VC  的成本不会很高。

熊市很长的时候，我们可以慢慢看，不像牛市的时候要在 24 小时内定下来，抢不到就没了。目前我手里面也有很多这样的团队，如果有些项目越到熊市越起劲，那你就要多给些关注的。所以这是二级和一级两种方法并用起来，在熊市中找投资机会的方法。

**大君（加密分析师）**

我认为 GameFi 还是有非常大的机会，去年 VC 大概一共往 GameFi 赛道投了 40 亿，现在是 100 亿。我最近也在做一个 GameFi 的 IGO，可以看到整个游戏页面和画质都比之前有很大增长，这些项目的一级打新还是有一定机会的。

另外 NFT 我研究了一些巨鲸，他们基本上人手 3000 多个甚至 1w 个都有，现在玩法还是以土狗为先，大户是能够拿出一些现金流来玩 NFT 的，比如说 30 个 ETH，最后拿到 150-180 ETH，这种情况是存在的。但是 NFT 玩家基本都是长期 holder，基本都是 46 天以上，因为 NFT 流动性是要挂单拍卖。

其他我看到行业里面一些赚钱机会，一个是元宇宙，即便是在熊市里面也是能够发光发热。当然也有一些别的，比如说空投的 OP 等等。所以熊市里面也会有很多一级的机会，该赚钱的还是会赚钱，但肯定是要大浪淘沙，一定要沉下心来看。

title: Starbucks said last
body:
Starbucks may [not be done closing stores](https://www.cnn.com/2022/07/12/business-food/starbucks-store-closures/index.html) over safety concerns.

"We are beginning to close stores," because of safety issues, [interim CEO Howard Schultz](https://www.cnn.com/2022/03/16/business/starbucks-ceo-howard-schultz/index.html) said in a video [posted to Twitter last week](https://twitter.com/thehoffather/status/1547308330929963008). "This is just the beginning. There are going to be many more."

Starbucks said last week that it is closing 16 stores over safety concerns. Around that time, Debbie Stroud and Denise Nelson, both senior vice presidents of US operations at the company, outlined the efforts that Starbucks is taking to make stores safer in an open letter.

* 

Workers are "seeing firsthand the challenges facing our communities — personal safety, racism, lack of access to healthcare, a growing mental health crisis, rising drug use, and more," they wrote, adding that "with stores in thousands of communities across the country, we know these challenges can, at times, play out within our stores too."

* 

The effort to make workers feel safer could result in more closings, according to Schultz's video, which was first reported by [Insider](https://www.businessinsider.com/starbucks-ceo-howard-schultz-says-more-store-closures-are-coming-2022-7).

title: In cases where it
body:
In cases where it isn't able to create a safe environment in a store, Starbucks will close it permanently, the letter continued. In those instances, the company will move employees to neighboring stores.

* 

"One of the primary concerns that our retail partners have is their own personal safety," Schultz said in the video, which was taken during a meeting last week discussing these efforts, according to a spokesperson.

The company also [may close restrooms to the public](https://www.cnn.com/2022/06/10/business-food/howard-schultz-starbucks-bathrooms/index.html), overturning a [2018 policy](https://money.cnn.com/2018/05/20/news/companies/starbucks-bathroom-policy/index.html).

The focus on safety is part of Schultz's broader efforts to revamp the company as it tries to fend off a growing unionization drive.

"We need to reinvent Starbucks for the future," he wrote in an open letter last week, noting that the company must "radically" improve employee experiences. He added that based on feedback from employees, the company will strive to create "safety, welcoming and kindness for our stores."

title: 通才，天才和专才
body:
通才也和天才一样，可遇而不可求。

我们应该努力的是，学会善用那些专精于某一领域的人。

提高有效性不是寻找通才和天才，而是学会善用于专精于某一领域的人。

汉朝开国皇帝刘邦，肯定是一个卓有成效的管理者。

汉高帝曰：“夫运筹策于帏幄之中，决胜于千里之外，吾不如子房；镇国家、抚百姓、给饷馈、不绝粮道，吾不如萧何；连百万之军，战必胜，攻必取，吾不如韩信。三者皆人杰也，吾能用之，此吾所以有天下也。” 所以，人要有一技之长，然后，才会有用武之地。 一技之长，是我们的立身之本，是我们行走江湖的“刀”。 人在江湖漂，你要有把刀。

找到立身之本，每日拿出“刀”，擦亮它，磨快它。

title: AltLayer团队介绍
body:
参考资料：[AltLayer中文小助手](https://medium.com/@AltLayerCN?source=post_page-----8e3f74d47f6--------------------------------) [Altlayer官方medium](https://medium.com/@altlayer)

引言：2022.7.1日消息Altlayer完成了**由 Polychain Capital、Breyer Capital 和 Jump Crypto 牵头的 720 万美元种子轮融资。**

项目背景可谓相当丰富令人振奋：

***前 Coinbase 首席技术官和 a16z GP Balaji Srinivasan，Circle 联合创始人兼 USDC 架构师 Sean Neville，以太坊联合创始人兼 Parity Technologies 首席执行官 Gavin Wood，Messari 创始人 Ryan Selkis，Synthetix 联合创始人 Kain Warwick 和 Jordan Momtazi（Bodhi Ventures），前 Polychain GP Tekin Salimi (DAO5)*** 等也以天使身份参与投资。

**团队**

AltLayer 项目由 Parity Asia 前总监、Zilliqa 联合创始人/CTO 贾耀奇博士领导。该团队由区块链资深人士和屡获殊荣的研究人员组成，他们曾在 Parity、Zilliqa 和 Synthetix 工作过。

### 关于创始人的背景，这里值得单独一提，在2022年之前，他还是在Parity Asia任职总经理，为他进入Web3提供了很好的资源。Yaoqi曾在2019年入选福布斯30以下亚洲30强榜单，他曾参与过东南亚的加密货币交易所等项目。

在2018年以前，他是新加坡国立大学的研究员，拥有计算机博士学位。他的介绍中说：他的研究兴趣涵盖区块链安全、分布式系统安全、网络安全/隐私和网络安全等领域。他已经从网络和系统两个角度提出了保护网络基础设施的解决方案，例如，解决网络覆盖中的隐私/共识问题以及识别网络浏览器中的新攻击/漏洞。与此同时，Yaoqi的研究工作已发表在 CCS、USENIX Security、PETS、RAID、ESORICS 等。获得了 W2SP (2014) 和 ICCCS (2014) 的最佳论文奖。他的工作得到了包括谷歌和苹果在内的多家供应商的认可（Chrome 为 CVE-2014–7948，Safari 为 CVE-2015–5907），并受到了 Dailydot、Gizmodo 和 Techspot 等媒体的关注。

由此看来，Alt Research（AltLaehyzer的开发团队）是一个很年轻的团队。

**投资人对Altlayer的评价：**

**Polychain**的合伙人**Ben Perszyk**评论了这项投资：“通用链提供了一个共享的区块空间模型，这通常会导致一个流行的 dApp 为自己消耗不成比例的区块空间份额，而其他 dApp 的用户由于增加汽油费和结算时间。我们相信，特定于应用程序的执行层为流行的 dApp 面临的可扩展性挑战提供了一种模块化、可定制的解决方案。因此，我们很高兴能够支持 AltLayer 团队的愿景，即为整个生态系统中的 dApp 开发人员带来独特的汇总即服务扩展解决方案。”

**Breyer Capital**创始人**Jim Breyer**表示：“ AltLayer正在为 web3 公司构建独特的扩展解决方案——帮助他们更好地为用户服务，甚至在区块链上部署 Web2 应用程序。我们很高兴成为这一轮的一部分，我们期待支持该公司，因为他们渴望成为多链世界的领导者。”

既然这么多行业头部机构纷纷看好并拿出现金进行了支持投资，我们有理由看好并积极参与到项目中来。

title: Regarding that store
body:
Regarding that store closure, a company spokesperson said at the time that Starbucks opens and closes stores as part of its regular operations, without offering specific reasons.

"Our local, regional and national leaders have been working with humility, deep care and urgency to create the kind of store environment that partners and customers expect of Starbucks," the Starbucks spokesperson said in June. "Our goal is to ensure that every partner is supported in their individual situation and we have immediate opportunities available in the market."

* 

During its most recent fiscal year, Starbucks closed 424 US company-operated stores, or about 5% of its total, while opening 449 new locations. There are roughly 9,000 company-operated Starbucks stores in the United States.

title: Some efforts are just the harvesting process
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aBreEPVnM5k_dhwJYhwz9.png?height=270&width=346)

In the vast sea of ​​people, there are always people who sigh for the failure of their efforts, and there are always people who feel depressed because they work hard but fail. In fact, life is only a process, come naked, go naked, everyone is the same, just go to the world naked to experience life. The results of all efforts belong only to each station in the life process. It's just that we are all working hard and paying to be as fruitful as possible on the road of life. We set goal after goal and then run toward it, eager to get results, to be successful. Including academic qualifications, diplomas, including money, status, including love, marriage, and social recognition. But not every effort will be rewarded, not every effort can be treated fairly, not every persistence will get what you want, and not every sincerity can be accepted. As a result, some people are in pain, some people are sad, and some people even give up on themselves. Life is ups and downs, if you care about the success or failure of each life site, life will inevitably be tangled and pessimistic. People are often attracted and even shocked by the glory of successful people, but often ignore the failures they have experienced and the bloodstains they once had. The success of a certain life site of the successful person is actually the accumulation of the process. Success does not come from chance, but the necessity of experience. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rK5N_ezZUjz8QUMxuuSUo.png?height=270&width=357)

A long life, some hard work, just the harvesting process. Bill Gates dropped out of Harvard to put his own money into his first business, a program called "Traf-O-Data," which ended in failure. Churchill didn't go to school when he was in sixth grade. Every office he held was a failure. They are well-known and famous, and there have been some efforts without seeing results, but they have become the biggest successes in people's hearts. Don't worry too much about working hard, and don't care too much about the results of your efforts. Correct attitude, the most important thing in life is not a certain result, but the process of life. Just like in a play, knowing that every play will eventually end, the actors in the play still perform very hard. After the performance, whether there is applause or not, the curtain must be drawn. Only the performance is the most important. As long as you work hard and try your best, you will not regret it, and even if you fail, you will not regret it. What you have experienced is part of your life, and it is the accumulation of your future life. 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rqyX1uUZQP1-b1cSPIhcq.png?height=266&width=418)

Whether this process is exciting, meaningful and valuable depends entirely on one's own attitude and understanding. I saw a piece of news earlier, Lisa and Alex, the adventurous British couple traveled to 50 countries, changed into local clothes in each country, re-made the bride and groom again, and photographed a fusion of different The photos of the customs and wedding customs allow each country to witness their union and love, and a total of 52 marriages have been married. The hardships they pay are more meaningful in the process and in their own hearts. Give life a happy process, a fulfilling process, more than anything else. Even if you can't dominate the objective environment or change the reality, you must at least learn to dominate your own mind. No matter what the result of your efforts, you can smile and reap the process of your own efforts.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/SkDJ5fYGXwCJSTx-IquXx.png?height=270&width=291)

title: Global supply
body:
Global supply chains are still a snarled mess, disrupting deliveries of goods, adding to headaches for businesses and feeding the worldwide surge in inflation.

The good news: There are some indications that the situation is beginning to get better. The bad news: Huge risks — from [another spike in coronavirus cases](https://edition.cnn.com/2022/07/08/health/omicron-vaccine-coronavirus-wellness/index.html) to labor disputes involving US rail workers — make it difficult to assume much confidence, clouding the outlook for the global economy.

What's happening: The recovery from the pandemic unleashed a wave of demand that manufacturers and the network of players that move items around the world weren't equipped to handle. But after 18 months of pain, there are some signs conditions are starting to improve.

* 

Cargo is flowing more smoothly, and the transit of goods has mostly recovered from the initial shock of the war in Ukraine, Konstantin Krebs, managing partner at Capstan Capital, an investment banking firm that works with investors in containers and container shipping, told me.

* 

"Containers are coming back onstream, and you can feel that," Krebs said.

The [Global Supply Chain Pressure Index](https://www.newyorkfed.org/research/policy/gscpi#/interactive) from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York declined between April and June, though it remains "at historically high levels."

title: meaningful and interesting
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/15GtLEdegSPWltUy4wCJZ.png?height=241&width=436)

There are four kinds of things in the world: things that are meaningful and interesting, things that are meaningless and meaningless, things that are meaningful but meaningless, things that are meaningful but meaningless. The first two are easy to decide, and the latter two are more difficult.
​​
Many units have a fixed half-day business study every week, which is very meaningful and necessary, and is of great benefit to improving skills and enhancing quality. However, because the form is simple and the content is boring, it has become a very boring thing in some units. People try to escape the meeting, or the left ear enters the right ear and the effect is greatly reduced.
​​
Teenagers especially like to play video games, because the form is lively, the content is rich, the pictures are beautiful, and it is very interesting to play. Some children are almost obsessed, forgetting to eat and sleep, day and night, skipping school and skipping school. But this kind of very interesting thing is really meaningless. Indulging in it can only be a waste of life and wasted time.
​​

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jKoTLmsba9Q2KTTadHm4X.png?height=270&width=396)


A happy person is doing something meaningful and interesting. Marx has been doing meaningful and interesting things all his life, forgetting to eat and sleep. Engels' ambition was also to study theories, but in order to make a living, and most importantly, to finance the lives of Marx's family, he had to engage in "boring" business until he entered old age and his life with Marx was guaranteed to a certain extent. He was finally able to devote himself to theoretical research that was both meaningful and interesting in his own eyes, and co-founded the theory of the proletariat with Marx.
​​
The cartoonist Fang Cheng, who is 96 years old this year, was asked the secret of longevity, and the answer was: "I do things I like and meaningful every day." Smart people are good at turning meaningful things into interesting things, and turning boring things into interesting things. Boring things become interesting things. This requires being eclectic, daring to innovate, advancing with the times, and boldly reforming. Learning from Lei Feng is a very meaningful activity, which can cultivate a noble personality and lead the social atmosphere. However, due to the outdated and rigid forms of activities in some places, which are not suitable for the interests and temperaments of young people, this very meaningful thing has become a boring thing. The most exaggerated thing is that on March 5, nearly a dozen students from a nursing home came to learn from Lei Feng, and some elderly people had their feet washed several times a day. In fact, with a lot of brains, learning Lei Feng's activities can be very lively and interesting. For example, making cartoons about Lei Feng's deeds, designing game software that learns from Lei Feng, and composing popular songs about learning from Lei Feng, etc.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0z5hqUFhyzBXvMBwdji5v.png?height=266&width=457)


​​
A philosophical person can adjust himself in time, adjust his interests, adjust his emotions, and turn the originally meaningless things into interesting things. Generally speaking, the meaning of things is objective and will not change, while the meaning of things is subjective and can be cultivated. Shen Congwen originally wrote novels, which was both meaningful and interesting in his mind. However, later on, the situation changed and he had to change his career to study ancient costumes. Although this was a very meaningful thing, it was very uninteresting to him. He got into a new job with the unyielding stubbornness of Hunan people, calmed down, calmed down, and slowly fell in love with clothing research, and eventually became a famous ancient clothing research expert.
​​

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3Ai01-yo-yuhVMJpUBOJ1.png?height=270&width=397)


Life is often faced with choices. If we can choose to do something meaningful and interesting, it is a great blessing in life, and we will never tire of it. If the conditions do not allow it, then you might as well learn from Shen Congwen, do one line of love, one line of excellence, and one line of excellence, so as to turn meaningful and "uninteresting" things into "interesting" things, and then become famous and make life worthwhile. As for those things that are "interesting but meaningless", such as playing video games, as long as you are not addicted to them, you can play them, but you must do so in moderation, so as not to lose your mind and waste your time in "interesting" play. I feel like I've lived a "meaningless" life.

title: 内心强大的人：习惯独来独往，懂得悲喜自渡，简直是“人间清醒”
body:
### 世间喧嚣，人情如霜，那些活得通透明亮的人，都渐渐褪去一身浮华，习惯独来独往，始终悲喜自渡，把日子过得云淡风轻。

时光的河流悄无声息，在生命中静静流淌，带到了沧海桑田，也带走了年少轻狂，徒留两鬓双白。

一个人在红尘中跋涉，万水千山，经历太多酸甜苦辣，也看透了尔虞我诈。往后余生，只想在平淡中度日如年，把日子过得一尘不染。

世界纷纷扰扰，人心惶恐不安，无论功成名就也好，是非成败也罢，一切终将付之流水。只想怀揣着一颗平静的心，在车水马龙的城市，把日子过得不惊不扰。

人生最好的状态是褪去一身浮华，远离尔虞我诈，以一颗虔诚不染的心，去面对人生的变迁。不管平湖秋雨也好，惊涛骇浪也罢，都能够淡定自然，内心宠辱不惊，始终独自独当一面，在孤独中保持一份自由。

随着年龄的增长，愈加发现名利并不重要，爱情不过是镜花水月，金钱也是身外之物，只求身体健康，全家安康幸福，便是此生最大的幸运。

01

### 看淡一切，随缘而落

人到中年要学会善繁从简，拒绝那些华而不实的东西，远离灯红酒绿的生活，始终内心丰盈而清澈，在生活中沉淀自己，才能找回本真。

人生道路坎坷，那些悲欢离合都是人生的风景，千万不要有太深的执念，就让一切随缘。生活中保持一份平和的心态，逐渐去修炼自己的灵魂，与朗朗清风为伴，赏人间烟火，看天边云卷云舒，把握生命美好的瞬间。

人生是一场花开花落的过程，既有绚烂极致的美丽，也有花落枯萎的凄凉。我们终将要独自品味，在岁月中治愈自己，始终向阳而行。

02

### 悲喜自渡，向阳而生

生活不易，我们要学会在风雨中砥砺前行，努力绽放属于自己的光芒，不要被眼前的风困难迷住双眼。放下心中的执念，撑大自己的格局，在磨难中砥砺前行。

在这个世界上，没有什么能够感同身受，该释怀的一定不要强求。学会淡然处事，内心不慌不乱，始终静若繁花。

风雨流年，岁月匆匆，在彼此的生命中，我们都成了过客。一路风雨相送，看过花开花谢，最后终将孑然一身，那些昔日的老朋友，各自去追寻自己的命运。那些情深缘浅的遇见，只留下回忆在心海蔓延，曾说好闯天下的人，后来都变成了回忆中的风景。

03

### 知足常乐，远离喧嚣

人生锦衣玉食也好，山间野菜也罢，都不如远离名缰利锁，在平湖烟雨中寻一处静谧之地，一个人煮茶观花，听小溪潺潺流过，等一场春暖花开，把日子过风轻云淡，何其潇洒快活。

世间喧嚣不止，太多人只追求繁华的表面，忽略了自己的灵魂，最后再也找不回原来的自己。只有那些内心强大的人，才不会随波逐流，他们倾尽所有奋斗，只为了追求内心的碧海蓝天。

往后余生，愿你做一个内心强大的人，习惯独来独往，懂得悲喜自渡，活成人间清醒，不必去看谁的脸色，也不用过尔虞我诈的生活。

title: Schultz, who
body:
Schultz, who [stepped into the CEO role for the third time in April](https://www.cnn.com/2022/03/29/business/starbucks-leadership-howard-schultz/index.html), has been trying to stave off growing unionization efforts. As of June 24, over 130 stores with more than 3,400 employees have had their unions certified by the National Labor Relations Board, or NLRB. The board has certified decisions against unionization at 15 locations through that date. And dozens of other stores are holding elections.

Union organizers have in the past pointed to store closures as a way to intimidate workers.

in June, Starbucks ([SBUX](https://money.cnn.com/quote/quote.html?symb=SBUX&source=story_quote_link)) workers at an Ithaca, New York, store [claimed their location was being shut down in retaliation for their union activism](https://www.cnn.com/2022/06/05/business/starbucks-ithaca-store-closure/index.html). The worker committee said at the time that it was filing an Unfair Labor Practice charge with the NLRB, alleging that Starbucks was making a "clear attempt to scare workers across the country."

title: Manta Network 2022上半年度项目报告
body:
在刚刚过去的2022年上半年度，Manta Network 将重点放在产品发展、品牌意识/增长以及团队扩张三个方面。这些对于未来 Calamari Network 和 Manta Network 链上隐私产品的成功上线都有着重要意义。** 
 **

**主要进展包括：**

1. **产品进展 — Dolphin 测试网发布及持续更新, 为波卡生态带来隐私链上隐私转账；**
2. **品牌意识及增长 — 团队越来越多亮相国际会议和活动，社区参与度持续增加；**
3. **团队扩张及融资 — 为实现 Web3愿景持续招募全球优秀人才；**

# 

# 一、产品进展

* **v1版本 Dolphin 测试网**

自去年12月份 v1版本 Dolphin 测试网上线以来，隐私转账突破6万笔，独立钱包地址达6000个。我们同时收到了约500份反馈，用户对测试网产品给出了4.5分的平均分（总分为5）。

* **v2版本 Dolphin 测试网**

用户对于 v1版本测试网的反馈对于我们持续的产品开发至关重要。2022年5月，我们发布了 v2版本测试网。v2版本让用户可以更加快速、安全地体验隐私支付；同时我们还增加可可重复使用隐私地址，更合规的功能以及更加优化的用户界面。

![Dolphin Testnet V2](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/I71w7zljxmkQT22KW7UAO.png?height=787&width=1400)

v2测试网发布仅仅一个月，隐私转账就超过了15万笔，Manta Signer 下载次数超过2万。团队发布的新版 manta signer 及 dolphin dApp 让零知识证明生成速度大大提升，新账户创建的同步时间也减少了一半。 
 

* **Calamari XCM**

 
 

2022年上半年，波卡完成了最备受期待的里程碑之一：发布了“跨共识”消息格式 XCM，成为一个完全具有可操作性的多链生态系统。

这让波卡平行链资产的隐私化更进了一步。4月份，我们在测试网上与 Moonbeam 测试网成功完成了 XCM 部署。之后，我们又持续完成了 Calamari 与 Karura Network、Moonriver 间的 XCM 整合，并提出了与 Khala Network 开通双向 HRMP 通道的提案。同时团队也正与更多平行链团队进行合作，敬请期待。

 
 

* Calamari Collator 节点计划

团队同时持续进行多方面的开发，其中有一半的核心工程师团队聚焦测试网，另外一半工程师致力于通过 Calamari 社区 Collator 节点计划将社区进一步去中心化。Calamari 社区 Collator 节点计划的目的是维护网络的安全性和去中心化程度。在第一季度，我们的节点计划有10位 collator，第二季度末，collator 数量已经达到了20位。我们计划在三季度再增加15位 collator，如果你也对我们的节点计划感兴趣，可以访问<https://docs.manta.network/docs/collator/CommunityCollatorProgram> 了解更多。

 
 

* OpenZL

** 
 **

最后，在零知识证明的开发方面，[团队发起了开源零知识证明（ZK）库 OpenZL 倡议](http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzkxMDAwMjM2Nw==&mid=2247484475&idx=1&sn=7ae4cd875944c4b36ebffcf1cc030205&chksm=c13355ebf644dcfd402e02714be30829a18b4c4ef5a205acbc1160c3d7d77fd976dad7652497&scene=21#wechat_redirect)。这个开源库项目将帮助没有密码学背景的开发者也可以便捷地在应用中构建零知识证明，更多关于OpenZL的信息请访问 <https://github.com/OpenZkLib/openzl/blob/main/proposal.md>

 
 

* 体验 v2版本 Dolphin 测试网(附带激励计划)

我们邀请您体验 v2版本的测试网，同时通过表格给我们提供反馈还有机会获得激励。对于 v1版本测试网，我们没有提供激励计划，因为 v1版本的目标是为了从社区尽可能多地收集反馈。在收到的500多份反馈中，大部分都在 v2版本中得到了采纳。

我们希望通过 v2 版本Dolphin 测试网来触达到更广泛的社区，从更多的新用户那里获得反馈，并向那些从未听说过 Manta 或 Calamari 的朋友展示波卡/Kusama 生态的隐私支付。

v2 版本测试网教程请参考：

<https://mirror.xyz/0xeB125d270FC135DDD3CC8E1C466873a4f37682d5/ZO3UyB9swTQI7hrrISb2nEuC6BBMgSAP-OYd1BAg0aU>

激励计划请参考：

<https://gleam.io/ye0bg/dolphin-testnet-v2-airdrop>

 
 

# 二、品牌意识及增长

 
 

* **ETHDenver**

Manta 团队在今年通过参加各种大型 Web3会议与更多的生态参与方有了交流的机会。在 ETHDenver 期间，我们举办了线下活动，与来自 Binance、Polychain、Moonbeam 以及 Polkadot 的嘉宾一起讨论了 Web3隐私，并通过 Binance Live 进行了在线直播。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nwq-TkVykkqOoltd_MhMI.png?height=900&width=1600)

* **ETHAmsterdam、DevConnect 和 AmsterDOT**

我们通过去中心化的方式参与了 [ETHAmsterdam](http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzkxMDAwMjM2Nw==&mid=2247484411&idx=1&sn=d2166c2a3cfaa46823ae090ddc19d68f&chksm=c133522bf644db3d3218ed79ea3a3354c02af8b175911005b9fbf1bfb68c9e559894c5021221&scene=21#wechat_redirect)、DevConnect、AmsterDOT ，并组织了各种周边活动，将整个 Web3生态成员和社区凝聚在一起。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ieDQkFfDQRImpXiD8KbHH.jpeg?height=960&width=1280)

* **DCentral**

在 DCentral, Manta Co-Founder Kenny Li 发表关于隐私的主题演讲《Manta Network 如何解决 Web3中的隐私问题》，完整视频可点击：<https://youtu.be/ccVe1t0oEwU>

* **Polkadot 全球黑客松系列之——北美**

Manta Network 核心贡献者 Shumo Chu 和 Brandon Gomes 在 Polkadot 北美黑客松期间担任了导师和评委。波卡为参赛队伍提供了27万美金的奖励赞助。

更多详情请点击：

<https://www.polkadotglobalseries.com/?utm_source=MantaNetwork&utm_medium=partner&utm_campaign=launch>

 
 

* **NFT NYC**

NFT NYC 期间，Manta 与 Arpa Official、Kucoin、Infinity Ventures Crypto、Phala Network 以及 RMRK 联合举办了线下 meetup。

最后，[Manta Network 核心团队分别在柏林、纽约和杭州三地深度参与了 年度最大波卡社区会议](http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzkxMDAwMjM2Nw==&mid=2247484500&idx=1&sn=225efe403b5e54644aba4857f48dbc5d&chksm=c1335584f644dc928547565fa2d132cc125dad740404b1fab0c3a990f336cc3e99dad6caefd2&scene=21#wechat_redirect)—— Polkadot Decoded 并赞助了多场周边活动。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hptQNkxneNDyzZw9mwvzG.png?height=675&width=1200)

* ZPrize 竞赛

今年5月份，Manta Network 联合21家行业领先公司及机构共同发起 [ZPrize 竞赛](http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzkxMDAwMjM2Nw==&mid=2247484417&idx=1&sn=4d0de1dfc06f466fec88de021696431e&chksm=c13355d1f644dcc7ce41810a5fd524471454ca9909fbdb298cf1b14b436968e517138f61bb67&scene=21#wechat_redirect)，将提供超700万美元奖金以加速零知识证明技术在区块链行业的采用。

Manta Network 设立的挑战也得到了 Polkadot Pioneers Prize 的赞助，同时我们也在 ZK Summit 期间发起了零知识证明挑战。这些都将有助于波卡生态内零知识证明技术的发展。 
 

* **生态基金**

一季度，Manta Network 与 Acala 以及其它7个平行链团队联合推出2.5亿美元生态基金以支持早期创业项目在波卡或 Kusama 生态中构建稳定币应用场景。 
 

* **社区增长**

今年上半年，Manta 社区增长强势，twitter 官方帐号粉丝数突破了70,000，telegram 用户数达到了30,000，discord 用户数达到了40,000，我们同时启用了论坛<https://forum.manta.network/>，未来论坛将主要用于技术和治理方面的讨论。

欢迎大家通过线上/线下各种方式来和团队进行沟通。

 
 

**三、团队扩张及融资**

Manta 团队核心贡献者从去年的20位（17位工程师，3位市场运营）增加至32位，其中包括24位工程师以及市场运营的8位同事。

在融资层面, Manta Network 宣布了[来自 Binance Labs 的战略投资](http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzkxMDAwMjM2Nw==&mid=2247484319&idx=1&sn=cf26db057814df86905c2a72997e7899&chksm=c133524ff644db59a889ea1a599e7ce4f244be48a73691b9cbe585bf83328bedaadc6005aacd&scene=21#wechat_redirect)。

 
 

# 四、展望 Q3/Q4

 
 

有了2022上半年的各种进展，我们对于下半年更加充满期待。未来，团队的重心将继续放在产品开发、品牌增长以及团队扩张上。 

产品方面，一旦 Dolphin 测试网产品成熟, 我们将转向 Calamari 和 Manta Network 主网开发。Dolphin 测试网的隐私转账产品在 Calamari 和 Manta Network 主网上的产品将分别为 MariPay 和 MantaPay 。同时，我们也将与更多的波卡/Kusama 平行链团队开启 XCM 跨链整合,为包括 $DOT 、$KSM 在内的生态资产带去链上隐私保护。

** 
 关于 Manta Network**

Manta Network 致力于通过隐私保护构建一个更好的 Web3 世界。Manta 的产品设计从第一性原理出发，通过 zkSNARK 等领先的密码学架构为区块链用户提供端对端的隐私保护。在保障隐私的同时，Manta 兼具互操作性、便捷性、高性能以及可审计性，允许用户进行任意平行链资产间的隐私转账和交易。Manta 的愿景是为整个区块链世界提供更便捷的隐私保护服务。

Manta 的创始团队由多位加密货币资深人士，教授和学者组成，他们的经验包括哈佛大学，麻省理工学院和 Algorand。Manta 的投资机构包括 Polychain、ParaFi、Binance Labs、Multicoin、CoinFund、 Alameda、DeFiance 以及 Hypersphere 等。Manta 也是波卡官方 Web3 基金会资助获得者，Substrate Builder Program 成员，伯克利大学区块链加速器成员。

title: Rising infections tied
body:
Rising infections tied to the BA.5 Omicron subvariant could cause another wave of worker shortages and clogged ports, Krebs said. The potential for fresh sanctions on Russia or another round of lockdowns in China also needs to be monitored.

Rail service disruptions are also causing friction at key throughways like the Port of Los Angeles. President Joe Biden last week [took action](https://edition.cnn.com/2022/07/15/business/railroad-strike-threat/index.html) to prevent US railroad workers from going on strike, which would have brought nearly 30% of the nation's freight to a screeching halt, but the clock is ticking for parties to reach a longer-term solution.

A global recession, meanwhile, would reduce pressure dramatically. A plunge in demand would curb supply chain traffic much sooner than expected.

Step back: How quickly supply chains return to normal will have major consequences for inflation, which has been spurred in part by limited access to the supply of goods. Trends will help dictate the path ahead for policymakers like the Federal Reserve.

我们希望通过 v2 版本Dolphin 测试网来触达到更广泛的社区，从更多的新用户那里获得反馈，并向那些从未听说过 Manta 或 Calamari 的朋友展示波卡/Kusama 生态的隐私支付。
